40001001	abrhaminte putrnaydaviidinteputrnayyeshuvinte vamshavali :
40001002	abraham yisahakyine janippichau ; yisahak yakyobine janippichau ; yakyob yehoodayeyum avante sahodaranmareyum janippichau ;
40001003	yehoodtamarill paresineyum sarahineyum janippichau ; pares heresane janippichau ; heresan aaramine janippichau ;
40001004	aaram ammiinadabine janippichau ; ammiinadab nahashone janippichau ; nahashon shalemane janippichau ;
40001005	shaleman rahabill bovasine janippichau ; bovas roottill oabedine janippichau ; oabed yishshayiye janippichau ;
40001006	yishshayi daviid rajavine janippichau ; daviid uriiyavinte bhayarryayirunnavallill shalomone janippichau ;
40001007	shalomon rehabayame janippichau ; rehabayam abiiyave janippichau ; abiiyavu aasaye janippichau ; aasyoshaphattine janippichau ;
40001008	yoshaphat yoramine janippichau ; yoram ussiiyave janippichau ;
40001009	ussiiyavu yothamine janippichau ; yotham aahasine janippichau ; aahas hiskiiyave janippichau ;
40001010	hiskiiyavu manashshaye janippichau ; manashshaamosine janippichau ; aamos yoshiiyave janippichau ;
40001011	yoshiiyavu yekhonayaveyum avante sahodaranmareyum babell prvasakalattu janippichau .
40001012	babellprvasam kajhyinjidtu yekhonayvu sheyalatiiyeline janippichau ; sheyalatiiyell serubaabeline janippichau ;
40001013	serubaabell abiihoodine janippichau ; abiihood elayakyiimine janippichau ; elayakyiim aasorine janippichau ;
40001014	aasor sadokyine janippichau ; sadok aakhiimine janippichau ; aakhiim eliihoodine janippichau ;
40001015	eliihood eliiyasare janippichau ; eliiyasar matthane janippichau ; matthan yakyobine janippichau .
40001016	yakyob marriyayude bhattravayyosephine janippichau . avallillninu krisatu enu perullyeshu janichau .
40001017	ingane talamurrakall aake abrahammutall daviidvare patinnalum daviid mutall babellprvasattollam patinnalum babellprvasammutall krisatuvinollam patinnalum aakunu .
40001018	ennall yeshukrisatuvinte jananam ivannm aayirunu . avante ammyaymarriyyosephinu vivaham nischayikyppedtsheksham avar koodivarum mube parishuddhatmavinall gabharinniyayi enu kandu .
40001019	avallude bhattravayyoseph niitimanakakondum avallkyu lokapavadam varuttuvan avanu manassillaykakondum avalle gooddhamayi upekshippan bhavichau .
40001020	ingane ninachairikyuboll kattravinte dootan avanu spttill prtaykshanayi : daviidinte makanayyosephe , ninte bhayaaryaymarriyaye chettrukollvan shakkikyenda ; avallill ulpaditamayatu parishuddhatmavinall aakunu .
40001021	avall oru makane prsavikyum ; avan tante janatte avarude papangallill ninu rakshippanirikykondu nii avanu yeshu enu per idennam enu parranju .
40001022	" kanaykgabharinniyayi oru makane prsavikyum . avanu daivam nammodu koode ennatthrmullimmanuvell enu per villikyum . "
40001023	enu kattravu prvachakan mukhantaram arullicheeyattu nivrattiyakuvan itokyeyum sambhavichau .
40001024	yoseph urrakym unnanur kattravinte dootan kalpichaatu pole cheyatu , bhayaarye chettrukondu .
40001025	makane prsavikyum vare avan avalle parigrhichaill . makanu avan yeshu enu per villichau .
40002001	herodrajavinte kalattu yeshu yehoodayyile bettelhemill janichasheksham , kijhyakyuninu vidanmar yerooshalemill etti :
40002002	yehoodanmarude rajavayi pirrannavan evide ? njangall avante nakshatrm kijhyakyu kandu avane namaskarippan vannirikyunu enu parranju .
40002003	herodarajavu atu kedtidtu avanum yerooshalem okyeyum bhrmichau .
40002004	janattinte mahapurohitanmareyum shasrtimareyum ellam koodtivarutti : krisatu evide aakunu janikyunnatu enu avarodu chodichau .
40002005	avar avanodu : yehoodayyile bettelhemilltanne :
40002006	" yehoodaydeshattile bettelheme , nii yehooday prbhuky nmarill odtum cherrutall ; ente janamayyisrayeline meypanulltalavan ninnill ninu purrappedtuvarum . " enningane prvachakan mukhantaram ejhyutiyirikyunu enu parranju .
40002007	ennarre herodavu vidanmare rahasaymayi villichau , nakshatrm vellivaysamayam avarodu sookshmayi chodichaarrinju .
40002008	avare bettelhemilekyu ayachau : ningall chenu shishuvinekyurrichau sookshmayi anevkshippin ; kandettiyall njanum chenu avane namaskarikyendatinu , vanu enne arriyippin enu parranju .
40002009	rajavu parranjtu kedtu avar purrappedtu ; avar kijhyakyu kandnakshatrm shishu irikyunnsthlattinu miite vanu nilkyuvollam avakyrumumbayi poykyondirunu .
40002010	nakshatrm kandatukondu avar atayntam santokshichau :
40002011	aviidtill chenu , shishuvine ammyaymarriyayodukoode kandu , viinnu avane namaskyrichau ; nikshepapatrngalle turranu avanu ponum kunturukyvum moorum kvechau .
40002012	herodavinte adukyll madangippokarutu enu spttill arullappadundayidtu avar verre vajhyiyayi sdeshattekyu madangippoyi .
40002013	avar poyasheksham kattravinte dootan yosephinu spttill prtaykshanayi : nii ejhyunnettu shishuvineyum ammyeyum koodtikyondu misryiimilekyu oadippoyi , njan ninnodu parrayumvare avide pakyurka . herodavu shishuvine nashippikyendatinu avane anevkshippan bhavikyunu enu parranju .
40002014	avan ejhyunnettu shishuvineyum ammyeyum ratriyill tanne koodtikyondu purrappedtu misryiimilekyu poyi .
40002015	herodavinte marannattollam avan avide pattru : " misryiimillninu njan ente makane villichau varutti " enu kattravu prvachakan mukhantaram arullicheeyattu nivrattiyakuvan samgativanu .
40002016	vidanmar tanne kalliyakyi enu herodavu kandu vallare kopichau , vidanmarodu chodichaarrinjkalattinu ottvannm randu vayassum tajhyeyumullaankudtikalle okyeyum bettelhemilum atinte ellatirukallilum aallayachau kollichau .
40002017	" rramayill oru shabdam kedtu , karachaalum valiynilavilliyum tanne ; rrahell makylle cheealli karanju ; avar illaykayall aashasam kaikyollvan manassillatirunu "
40002018	enu yiremayaprvachakan mukhantaram arullicheeytatu anu nivrattiyayi .
40002019	ennall herodavu kajhyinjupoyasheksham kattravinte dootan misryiimillvechau yosephinu spttill prtaykshanayi :
40002020	shishuvinu prannahani varuttuvan nokyiyavar marichaupoyatukondu nii ejhyunnettu shishuvineyum ammyeyum koodtikyondu yisrayelldeshattekyu pokenu parranju .
40002021	avan ejhyunnettu shishuvineyum ammyeyum koodtikyondu yisrayelldeshattu vanu .
40002022	ennall yehoodayyill akyerlayos tante appnayherodavinu pakaram vajhyunu enu kedttukondu avide pokuvan bhayappedtu , spttill arullappadundayidtu galiilprdeshangallilekyu marrippoyi .
40002023	avan nasarrayin enu villikyppedum enu prvachakanmar mukhantaram arullicheeyattu nivrattiyavan takyvannm nasarret enngramattill chenu pattru .
40003001	akalattu yohannan sapakan vanu . yehoodaymarubhoomiyill prsamgichau :
40003002	srggrajaym samiipichairikyyall manasantarappeduvin enu parranju .
40003003	" marubhoomiyill villichau parrayunnavante vakyavitu : kattravinte vajhyi orukyi avante patnirappakyuvin " enningane yeshayaprvachakan parranjvan ivan tanne .
40003004	yohannanu odtkaromam kondulluduppum arayill tollvarrum undayirunu ; avante aaharamo vedtukyilliyum kadtutenum aayirunu .
40003005	anu yerooshalemayrum yehooday deshakyarokyeyum yodtrante irukareyumullellnadtukarum purrappedtu avante adukyll chenu
40003006	tangallude papangalle eettu parranju kondu yodtran nadiyill avanall sanam eettu .
40003007	tante sanattinnayi pariisharilum sadtookayrilum palar varunnatu kandarre avan avarodu parranjtu : sappr rsantatikalle , varuvanullkopatte ojhyinju oadippokuvan ningallkyu upadeshichau tannatu aar ?
40003008	manasantarattinu yogaymayphalam kaypin .
40003009	abraham njangallkyu pitavayidtu undu enu ullam kondu parravan tuniyarutu ; i kallukallillninu abrahaminu makylle ullavakyuvan daivattinu kajhyiyum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40003010	ippoll tanne vrakshangallude chuvadtir kodali vechairikyunu ; nallaphalam kaykyatt vraksham ellam vedti tiiyill idtukallayunu .
40003011	njan ningalle manasantarattinnayi vellattill sanam eelpikyunnateyullu ; entepinnale varunnavano ennekyall balavan aakunu ; avante cherippu chumappan njan matiyayavanalla ; avan ningalle parishuddhatmavilum tiiyilum sanam eelpikyum .
40003012	viishumurram avante kayaill undu ; avan kallatte muttum vedippakyi kotambu kallappurayill koodtivekyyum patir kedatt tiiyill idtu chudtukallakayum cheyaum .
40003013	anantaram yeshu yohannanall sanam eelkyuvan galiilayillninu yodtrankare avante adukyll vanu .
40003014	yohannano avane vilakyi : ninnall sanam eelkyuvan enikyu aavashaym ; pinne nii ente adukyll varunnuvo enu parranju .
40003015	yeshu avanodu : ippoll sammtiky ; ingane sakalaniitiyum nivattrikyunnatu namukyu uchitam enu uttram parranju ; ennarre avan avane sammtichau .
40003016	yeshu sanam eett udane vellattill ninu kayarri ; appoll srggm turranu daivatmavu pravennapole irrangi tante mell varunnatu avan kandu ;
40003017	ivan ente priyaputrn ; ivanill njan prsadichairikyunu enu srggttillninu oru shabdam undayi .
40004001	anantaram pishachinall pariikshikyppeduvan yeshuvine aatmavu marubhoomiyilekyu nadatti .
40004002	avan nalpatu pakalum nalpatu ravum upavasichaasheksham avanu vishanu .
40004003	appoll pariikshakan aduttu vanu : nii daivaputrn ekkill i kallu appmayatiiruvan kalpiky enu parranju .
40004004	" manukshayn appmkondu matrmalla , daivattinte vayillkoodi varunnsakalavachanam kondum jiivikyunu " enu ejhyutiyirikyunu enu uttram parranju .
40004005	pinne pishachu avane vishuddh nagarattill kendupoyi daivalayattinte agrttinmell nirrutti avanodu :
40004006	nii daivaputrn ekkill tajhyattodtu chaduka ; " ninnekyurrichau avan tante dootanmarodu kalpikyum ; avan ninte kall kallinodu tadtatavannm ninne kayaill tangikyollum " enu ejhyutiyirikyunuvalelenu parranju . yeshu avanodu :
40004007	" ninte daivamaykattravine pariikshikyrutu " enum koode ejhyutiyirikyunu enu parranju .
40004008	pinne pishachu avane eettvum uyanneraru malamell koodtikyondupoyi lokattilullsakalrajayngalleyum avayude mahattteyum kannichau :
40004009	viinnu enne namaskyrichaall itokyeyum ninakyu taram enu avanodu parranju .
40004010	yeshu avanodu : sattane , enne vidtupo ; " ninte daivamaykattravine namaskarichau avane matrme aaradhikyavu " enu ejhyutiyirikynuvalelenu parranju .
40004011	appoll pishachu avane vidtupoyi ; dootanmar aduttuvanu avane shushrookshichau .
40004012	yohannan tadavill aayi enu kedtarre avan galiilekyu vangippoyi ,
40004013	nasarret vidtu sebooloonteyum naphataliyudeyum atirukallill kadalkyreyullkaphannarhoomill chenu pattru ;
40004014	" sebooloondeshavum naphatalideshavum kadalkyrayilum yodtrannakyreyumullnadum jatikallude galiilayum
40004015	ingane irudtill irikyunnjanam valiyoru vellichaam kandu ; marannattinte deshattilum nijhyalilum irikyunnavakyru prkasham udichau "
40004016	enu yeshayaaprvachakan mukhantaram arullicheeyattu nivrattiyakuvan idavanu .
40004017	anumutall yeshu : srggrajaym samiipichairikyyall manasantarappeduvin enu prsamgichau tudangi .
40004018	avan galiilakydalpurrattu nadakyubell paretas enu perullshimon , avante sahedaranayarentayas enningane miinpidikyarayrandu sahodaranmar kadalill valaviishunnatu kandu :
40004019	ente pinnale varuvin ; njan ningalle manukshayre pidikyunnavarakyum enu avarodu parranju .
40004020	udane avar valvidtechau avane anugamichau .
40004021	avideninu mubodtu poyarre sebediyude makan yakyobum avante sahodaran yohannanum ennverre randu sahodaranmar padakill irunu appnaysebadiyumayi valnannakyunnatu kandu avareyum villichau .
40004022	avarum udane padakineyum appneyum vidtu avane anugamichau .
40004023	pinne yeshu galiilayill okyeyum chutti sanchrichaukondu avarude pallikallill upadeshikyyum rajayttinte suvisheksham prsamgikyyum janattilullsakaldiinatteyum vayadhiyeyum sekhaymakyukayum cheytu .
40004024	avante shruti surriyayilokyeyum parannu nanavayadhikallalum badhakallalum valanjvar , bhootagrsatr , chandrrogikall , pakshavatakyar ingane sakalavidhdiinakyareyum avante adukyll konduvanu .
40004025	avan avare sekhaymakyi ; galiila , dekyppoli , yerooshalem , yehooday , yodtrnnakyre ennii idangallill ninu vallare puruksharam avane pintudanur .
40005001	avan puruksharatte kandarre malamell kayarri , , avan irunnsheksham shikshaynmar adukyll vanu .
40005002	avan tiruvayemajhyinju avarodu upadeshichaatentennall :
40005003	aatmavill daridrrayavar bhagayvanmar ; srggrajaym avakyrullatu .
40005004	du : khikyunnavar bhagayvanmar ; avakyru aashasam labhikyum .
40005005	semaytayullavar bhagayvanmar ; avar bhoomiye avakashmakyum .
40005006	niitikyu vishannu dahikyunnavar bhagayvanmar ; avakyru trapati varum .
40005007	karunnayullavar bhagayvanmar ; avakyru karunnlabhikyum .
40005008	hradayashuddhiyullavar bhagayvanmar ; avar daivatte kannum .
40005009	samadhanam undakyunnavar bhagayvanmar ; avar daivattinte putrnmar enu villikyppedum .
40005010	niiti nimittm upadrvikyppedunnavar bhagayvanmar ; srggrajaym avakyrullatu .
40005011	ente nimittm ningalle pajhyikyyum upadrvikyyum ningallekyondu elltinmayum kallavayi parrakayum cheyauboll ningall bhagayvanmar .
40005012	srggttill ningallude prtiphalam valutakakondu santokshichaullasippin ; ningallkyu mubeyundayirunnprvachakanmareyum avar anganetanne upadrvichauvalela .
40005013	ningallbhoomiyude uppakunu ; uppu karamillatepoyall atinu entonu kondu rasam varuttam ? purrattukallanjidtu manukshayr chavidtuvan allate mattonninum pinne kollunnatallal .
40005014	ningall lokattinte vellichaam aakunu ; malamell irikyunnpadtnnam marranjirippan padillal .
40005015	villakyu kattichau parrayin kiijhyalltandinmelaretvekyunnatu : appoll atu viidtilullellavakyrum prkashikyunu .
40005016	angane tanne manukshayr ningallude nallprvrattikalle kandu , srggsthnayningallude pitavine mahatppeduttendatinu ningallude vellichaam avarude mumbill prkashikydte .
40005017	njan nayayaprmannatteyo prvachakanmareyo niikyendatinu vanu enu niroopikyrutu ; niikyuvanallnivattrippanaretnjan vannatu .
40005018	sataymayidtu njan ningallodu parrayunu : aakashavum bhoomiyum ojhyinjupokumvare sakalavum nivrattiyakuvollam nayayaprmannattillninu oru valli ekkilum pulli ekkilum orunallum ojhyinjupekayillal .
40005019	aakayall i eettvum cherriykalpanakallill onu ajhyikyyum manukshayre angane patthippikyyum cheyaunnavan srggrajayttill eettvum cherriyavan enu villikyppedum ; avaye aacharikyyum patthippikyyum cheyaunnavanno srggrajayttill valiyavan enu villikyppedum .
40005020	ningallude niiti shasrtimarudeyum pariishanmarudeyum niitiye kaviyunnilelkkill ningall srggrajayttill kadakyyillenu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40005021	kulcheyaarutu enum aarekkilum kulcheyatall nayayavidhikyu yogaynakum enum poovarrnmarodu arullicheeyattu ningall kedtidtundalela .
40005022	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : sahodaranodu kopikyunnavan ellam nayayavidhikyu yogaynakum ; sahodaranodu nissarenu parranjalo nayayadhipasabhayude mumbill nillkyendivarum ; mooddhenu parranjalo inarakattinu yogaynakum .
40005023	aakayall ninte vajhyipadu yagapiitthattikkll kenduvaruboll sahodaranu ninte nere vallatum undenu avidevechau oammrvannall
40005024	ninte vajhyipadu avide yagapiitthattinte mumbill vecheechau , onnamatu chenu sahodaranodu niranu kollka ; pinne vanu ninte vajhyipadu kajhyiky .
40005025	ninte prtiyogiyodukoode vajhyiyill ullappoll tanne vegattill avanodu innangikyollka ; allanjall prtiyogi ninne nayayadhipanum nayayadhipan chevakanum eelpichaidtu nii tadavill aayepakum .
40005026	oduvilatte kashupolum koduttu tiiruvollam nii avide ninu purrattu varikayillenu njan sataymayidtu ninnodu parrayunu .
40005027	vaybhicharam cheyaarutu enu arullicheeyattu ningall kedtidtundalela .
40005028	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : srtiiye mohikyendatinu avalle nokyunnavan ellam hradayam kondu avallodu vaybhicharam cheyatupoyi .
40005029	ennall valakknnu ninakyu idachaarvaruttunu ekkill atine choonneduttu errinjukallaka ; ninte shariiram mujhyuvanum narakattill viijhyunnatinekyall ninte avayavangallill onu nashikyunnatu ninakyu pryojanamareta .
40005030	valakkai ninakyu idachaar varuttunu ekkill atinevedtierrinju kallaka ; ninte shariiram mujhyuvanum narakattill pekunnatine kyall avayavangallill onu nashikyunnatu ninakyu pryojanamareta .
40005031	aarekkilum bharayye upekshichaall avallkyu upekshannapatrm kodukydte enum arullicheeyatidtundalela .
40005032	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : parasamgam hetuvayidtllate bhayaarye upekshikyunnavanellam avallekyondu vaybhicharam cheyaikyunu ; upekshichaavalle aarekkilum vivaham kajhyichaall vaybhicharam cheyaunu .
40005033	kallsataym cheyaarutu enum sataym cheyattu kattravinu nivattrikyennam enum poovaarnmarodu arullicheeyattu ningall kedtidtundalela .
40005034	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : asheksham sataym cheyaarutu ; srggttekyondu arutu , atu daivattinte simhasanam ;
40005035	bhoomiyekyondu arutu atu avantepadapiittham ; yerooshaleminekyondu arutu , atu maharajavinte nagaram .
40005036	ninte talayekyondum sataym cheyaarutu ; oru romavum velluppippano karruppippano ninakyu kajhyikayillalela .
40005037	ningallude vakyu uvau , uvau enum illa , illenum aayirikydte ; itill adhikamayatu dushtanill ninu varunu .
40005038	kanninu pakaram kannum pallinu pakaram pallum enu arullicheeyattu ningall kedtidtundalela .
40005039	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : dushtanodu etikyrrutu ; ninne valatte chekidtttu adikyunnavanu mattetum tirichau kanniky .
40005040	ninnodu vayvaharichau ninte vasrtm eduppan ichchikyunnvanu ninte putappum vidtukoduky .
40005041	oruttn ninne oru najhyikvajhyipekuvan nibaarndichaall randu avanodu koode poka .
40005042	ninnodu yachikyunnavanu koduky ; vayipp vanguvan ichchikyunnavane ojhyinjukallayarutu .
40005043	koodtukarane senhiky enum shatruvine pakeky enum arullicheeyattu ningall kedtidtundalela .
40005044	njano ningallodu parrayunnatu : ningallude shatrukylle senhippin ; ningalle upadrvikyunnavakyru vendi pratthrippin ;
40005045	sggrsthnayningallude pitavinu putrnmarayi tiirendatinu tanne ; avan dushtanmarude melum nallavarudemelum tante sooyaarne udippikyyum niitimanmarudemelum niitikedtvarude melum majhypeyaikyyum cheyaunuvalela .
40005046	ningalle senhikyunnavare senhichaall ningallkyu entu prtiphalam ? chukkkyarum angane tanne cheyaunnillayo ?
40005047	sahodaranmare matrm vandnam cheyatall ningall entu visheksham cheyaunu ? jatikallum angane tanne cheyaunnillayo ?
40005048	aakayall ningallude sggriiypitavu sallgunnapoonnrn aayirikyunnatupole ningallum sallgunnpoonnrrakuvin .
40006001	manukshayr kannendatinu ningallude niitiye avarude mumbill cheyaatirippan sookshippin ; allanjall sggr ttilullningallude pitavinte pakyll ningallkyu prtiphalamillal .
40006002	aakayall bhikshkodukyuboll manukshayrall manam labhippan pallikallilum viithikallilum kapadabhtikyar cheyaunnatu pole ninte mumbill kahallam utikyrutu ; avarkyu prtiphalam kidtippoyi enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40006003	niiyo bhikshkodukyuboll ninte bhikshrahasayttilayirikyendatinu valakkai cheyaunnatu entu enu idakkai arriyarutu .
40006004	rahasayttill kannunnninte pitavu ninakyu prtiphalam tarum .
40006005	ningall pratthrikyuboll kapadabhtikyareppole aakarutu ; avar manukshaykyur villangendatinu pallikallilum terukyonnukallilum ninu kondu pratthrippan ishtappedunu ; avakyur prtiphalam kidtippoyi enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40006006	niiyo pratthrikyuboll arrayill kadanu vatill adechau rahasayttilullninte pitavinodu pratthriky ; rahasayttill kannunnninte pitavu ninakyu prtiphalam tarum .

40010021	sahodaran sahodaraneyum appn makaneyum marannattinu eelpikyum ; ammyappnmakyur etirayi makyll ejhyunnettu avare kollikyum .

40010023	ennall oru padtnnattill ningalle upadrvichaall mattonnilekyu oadippokuvin . manukshayputrn varuvollam ningall yisrayell padtnnangalle sanchrichau tiirukayillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40010024	shikshayn guruvinmiiteyalla ; dasan yajamananu miiteyumallal ;
40010025	guruvineppoleyakunnatu shikshaynu mati ; yajamanane ppoleyakunnatu dasanum mati . avar viidtudayavane beyeebooll enu villichau ekkill viidtukare etr adhikam ?
40010026	atukondu avare bhayappedenda ; marrechauvechaatu onum vellippedateyum gooddhamayatu onum arriyateyum irikyyillal .
40010027	njan irudtttu ningallodu parrayunnatu vellichaattu parravin ; cheviyill parranju kellkyunnatu puramukallillninu ghokshippin .
40010028	dehiyeyum dehatteyum narakattill nashippippan kajhyiyunnavane tanne bhayappeduvin .
40010029	kashinu randu kurikill vilkyunnillayo ? avayill onupolum ningallude pitavu sammtikyate nilattu viijhyukayillal .
40010030	ennall ningallude talayile romavum ellam ennppedtirikyunu .
40010031	aakayall bhayappedenda ; eerriykurikilukallekyallum ningall vishekshatayullavaralela .
40010032	manukshayrude mumbill enne eettuparrayunneevaneyum sggrsthnayente pitavin mumbill njanum eettuparrayum .
40010033	manukshayrude mumbill enne tallipprrayunnavaneyo ente pitavinmumbill njanum tallipprrayum .
40010034	njan bhoomiyill samadhanam varuttuvan vanu enu niroopikyrutu ; samadhanam alla , vall aretvaruttuvan njan vannatu .
40010035	manukshayne tante appnodum makalle ammyodum marumakalle ammaviyammyodum bhedippippanaretnjan vannatu .
40010036	manukshaynte viidtukar tanne avante shatrukyll aakum .
40010037	ennekyall adhikam appneyo ammyeyo priyappedunnavan enikyu yogaynalla ; ennekyall adhikam makaneyo makalleyo priyappedunnavan enikyu yogaynallal .
40010038	tante krooshu eduttu enne anugamikyattvanum enikyu yogaynallal .
40010039	tante jiivane kandettiyavan atine kallayum ; ente nimittm tante jiivane kallanjvan atine kandettum .
40010040	ningalle kaikyollunnavan enne kaikyollunu ; enne kaikyollunnavan enne ayachaavane kaikyollunu .
40010041	prvachakan enuvechau prvachakane kaikyollunnavanu prvachakante prtiphalam labhikyum ; niitiman enuvechau niitimane kaikyollunnavanu niitimante prtiphalam labhikyum .
40010042	shikshayn enuvechau i cherriyavarill oruttnu oru panapatrm tanniir matrm kudippan kodukyunnavanu prtiphalam kidtate pokayillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40011001	yeshu tante pantrndu shikshaynmarodu kalpichau tiinnarsheksham atatu padtnnangallill upadeshippanum prsamgippanum avide ninu purrappedtupoyi .
40011002	yohannan karagrahattill vechau , krisatuvinte prvrattikallekyurrichau kedtidtu tante shikshaynmare ayachau :
40011003	varuvanullavan niiyo , njangall mattoruvane kattirikyyo enu avar mukhantaram avanodu chodichau .
40011004	yeshu avarodu : kurudar kannunu ; mudantar nadakyunu ; kukshtthrogikall shuddhrayittiirunu ; chekidar kellkyunu ; marichaavar uyikyrunu ;
40011005	daridrrodu suvisheksham arriyikyunu enningane ningall kellkyyum kannukayum cheyaunnatu yohannane chenu arriyippin .
40011006	ennall ekkll idarrippokattvan ellam bhagayvan enuttram parranju .
40011007	avar poyasheksham yeshu yohannanekyurrichau puruksharattodu parranjutudangiyatu : ningall entu kanman marubhoomiyilekyu poyi ? kattinall ulayunnoadayo ?
40011008	alla , entu kanman poyi ? madtrvavasrtm dharichamanukshayneyo ? madtrvavasrtm dharikyunnavar rajagrahangalli lalela .
40011009	allentinu poyi ? oru prvachakane kanmano ? ate , prvachakanilum mikechaavane tanne enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40011010	" njan ente dootane ninakyu mumbayi ayakyunu ; avan ninte mumbill ninakyu vajhyi orukyum " enu ejhyutiyirikyunnavan avan tanne .
40011011	srtiikallill ninu janichaavarill yohannan sapakanekyall valiyavan aarum ejhyunnettidtilla ; sggrrajayttill eettvum cherriyavano avanilum valiyavan enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40011012	yohannan sapakante nallukallmutall innevare sggrrajaytte balalkyaram cheyaunu ; balalkyarikall atine pidichaadakyunu .
40011013	sakalprvachakanmarum nayayaprmannavum yohannan vare prvachichau .
40011014	ningallkyu parigrhippan manassundekkill varuvanulleeliiyavu avan tanne .
40011015	kellppan cheviyullavar kellkydte .
40011016	ennall i talamurraye eetinodu upamikyendu ? chantasthlangallill irunu changatikallodu :
40011017	njangall ningallkyayi kujhyalooti , ningall nrattm cheytilla ; njangall vilapam padi , ningall marrattdichailla ; enu villichauparrayunnkudtikallodu atu tulaym .
40011018	yohannan tinukayum kudikyyum cheyaattvanayi vanu ; avanu bhootamundenu avar parrayunu .
40011019	manukshayputrn tinum kudichaum kondu vanu ; tinniyum kudiyanumaymanukshayn ; chukkkyarudeyum papikalludeyum senhitan enu avar parrayunu ; njanamo tante prvrattikallall niitiikarikyppedtirikyunu .
40011020	pinne avan tante viiyaaarprvrattikall mikytum nadannpadtnnangall manasantarappedaykayall avaye shasichautudangi ;
40011021	korasiine , ninakyu hkashtam ; betsayide , ninakyu hkashtam ; ningallill nadannviiyaarprvrattikall sorilum siidonilum nadannirunu ekkill avar pandu tanne radtilum venniirrilum manasantarappedumayirunu .
40011022	ennall nayayavidhidivasattill ningallekyall sorinum siidonum sahikyavatakum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40011023	niiyo kaphannarhoome , sggrttollam uyannaririkyumo ? nii patallamvare tannupokum ; ninnill nadannviiyaar prvrattikall sodomill nadannirunu ekkill atu inuvare nilkyumayirunu .
40011024	ennall nayayavidhidivasattill ninnekyall sodomayrude nadtinu sahikyavatakum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40011025	asamayattu tanne yeshu parranjtu : pitave , sggrttinum bhoomikyum kattravayullove , nii itu njanikallkyum vivekikallkyum marrechau shishukyllkyu vellippeduttiyatukondu njan ninne vajhyttunu .
40011026	ate , pitave , inganeyalelninakyu prsadam tonniyatu :
40011027	ente pitavu sakalavum ekkll bharamelpichairikyunu ; pitavallate aarum putrne arriyunnilla ; putrnum putrn vellippeduttikyoduppan ichchikyunnavanum allate aarum pitavine arriyunnatumillal .
40011028	addhvanikyunnavarum bharam chumakyunnavarum aayullore , ellavarum ente adukyll varuvin ; njan ningalle aashsippikyum .
40011029	njan semaytayum tyum ullavan aakayall ente nukam eettukondu ennodu patthippin ; ennall ningallude aatmakyllkyu aashasam kandettum .
40011030	ente nukam mraduvum ente chumadu laghuvum aakunu .
40012001	akalattu yeshu shabaattill villabhoomiyill koodi kadanupoyi ; avante shikshaynmar vishannidtu katir parrichau tinutudangi .
40012002	pariishar atu kandidtu : ita , shabaattill vihitamallatttu ninte shikshaynmar cheyaunu enu avanodu parranju .
40012003	avan avarodu parranjtu :
40012004	daviid tanikyum koodeyullavakyrum vishannappoll cheyattu entu ? avan daivalayattill chenu , purohitanmakyur matrmallate tanikyum koodeyullavakyrum tinman vihitamallatt kyappm tinu enu ningall vayichaidtillayo ?
40012005	alla , shabaattill purohitanmar daivalayattill vechau shabaattine lamghikyunu ekkilum kuttmillate irikyunu enu nayayaprmannattill vayichaidtillayo ?
40012006	ennall daivalayattekyall valiyavan ivide undu enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40012007	yagattilalla , karunnayill areta , njan prsadikyunu ennullatu entu enu ningall arrinjirunu ekkill kuttmillattvare kuttm vidhikyyillayirunu .
40012008	manukshay putrno shabaattinu kattravakunu .
40012009	avan avidam vidtu avarude palliyill chennappoll , kai varandoru manukshayne kandu .
40012010	avar avanill kuttm chumattendatinu shabaattill sekhaymakyunnatu vihitamo enu avanodu chodichau .
40012011	avan avarodu : ningallill oruttnu oru aadundu ennirikydte ; atu shabaattill kujhyiyill viinnall avan atine pidichau kayattukayillayo ?
40012012	ennall manukshayn aadinekyall etr vishekshatayullavan . aakayall shabaattill nanmcheyaunnatu vihitam tanne enu parranju .
40012013	pinne amanukshaynodu : kai niidtukenu parranju ; avan niidti , atu mattetupole sekhaymayi .
40012014	pariishanmaro purrappedtu avane nashippippan vendi avanu virodhamayi tammill aalochichau .
40012015	yeshu atu arrinjidtu avidam vidtupoyi , vallare per avantepinnale chenu ; avan avare okyeyum sekhaymakyi ,
40012016	tanne prsiddhmakyrutu enu avarodu apichau .
40012017	" ita , njan tiranjedutt ente dasan , ente ullam prsadikyunnente priyan ; njan ente aatmavine avante mell vekyum ; avan jatikallkyu nayayavidhi arriyikyum .
40012018	avan kalahikyyilla , nilavillikyyilla ; aarum terukyllill avante shabdam kellkyyumillal .
40012019	chatanj oadavan odichaukallakayilla ; pukayunntiri keduttukallakayilla ; avan nayayavidhi jayattollam nadattum .
40012020	avante namattill jatikall prtayashavekyum "
40012021	enningane yeshayaaprvachakanmukhantaram arullicheeytatu nivrattiaakuvan samgativanu .
40012022	anantaram chilar kurudanum umanumayoru bhootagrsatne avante adukyll konduvanu ; uman samsarikyyum kannkkyum cheyvan takyvannm avan avane sekhaymakyi .
40012023	puruksharam okyeyum visyichau : ivan daviidputrn tanneyo enu parranju .
40012024	atu kedtidtu pariishanmar : ivan bhootangallude talavanaybeyeeboolinekyondallate bhootangalle purrattakyunnillenu parranju .
40012025	avan avarude niroopannam arrinju avarodu parranjtu : oru rajaym tannill tanne chidrichau ekkill shoonaymakum ;
40012026	oru padtnnamo grahamo tannill tanne chidrichau ekkill nilanilkyyilla . sattan sattane purrattakyunuvekkill avan tannill tanne chidrichau poyalela ; pinne avante rajaym engane nilanilkyum ?
40012027	njan beyeeboolinekyondu bhootangalle purrattakyunu ekkill , ningallude makyll aarekyondu purrattakyunu ? atukondu avar ningallkyu nayayadhipanmar aakum .
40012028	daivatmavinall njan bhootangalle purrattakyunu ekkilo daivarajaym ningallude adukyll vannettiyirikyunu spashtam .
40012029	balavane pidichau kedtiidtllate balavante viidtill kadanu avante koppu kavanurkallavan engane kajhyiyum ? pidichau kedtiyall pinne avante viidu kavachaar cheyaam .
40012030	enikyu anukoolamallattvan enikyu prtikoolam aakunu ; ennodukoode chekyrattvan chitarrikyunu .
40012031	atukondu njan ningallodu parrayunnatu : sakalapapavum dookshannavum manukshayrodu kshamikyum ; aatmavinu nereyulldookshannamo kshamikyyillal .
40012032	aarekkilum manukshayputrnu nere oru vakyu parranjall atu avanodu kshamikyum ; parishuddhatmvinu nere parranjalo i lokattilum varuvanullatilum avanodu kshamikyyillal .
40012033	onnukill vraksham nallatu , phalavum nallatu enu veppin ; allaykill vraksham chiitt , phalavum chiitt enu veppin ; phalam kondalelvraksham arriyunnatu .
40012034	sappr santatikalle , ningall dushtarayirikye nallatu samsarippan engane kajhyiyum ? hradayam nirranju kaviyunnatill ninnalelvay samsarikyunnatu .
40012035	nallmanukshayn tante nallnikshepattillninu nallatu purrappeduvikyunu ; dushtamanukshayn dunnarikshepattillninu tiiyatu purrappeduvikyunu ;
40012036	ennall manukshayr parrayunneetu nissaravakyinum nayayavidhidivasattill kannakyu bodhippikyendivarum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40012037	ninte vakyukallall niitikarikyppedukayum ninte vakyukallall kuttm vidhikyppedukayum cheyaum .
40012038	appoll shasrtimarilum pariishanmarilum chilar avanodu : guro , nii oru adayallam cheyatukanman njangall ichchikyunu enu parranju . avan avarodu uttram parranjtu :
40012039	dokshavum vaybhicharavumulltalamurradayallam tirayunu ; yonaprvachakante adayallamallate atinu adayallam labhikyyillal .
40012040	yonkadalanayude vayattill moonu ravum moonu pakalum irunnatupole manukshayputrn moonu ravum moonu pakalum bhoomiyude ullill irikyum .
40012041	niinevekyar nayayavidhiyill i talamurrayodu onnichau ejhyunnettu atine kuttm vidhikyum ; avar yonayude prsamgam kedtu manasantarappedtu valela ; ita , ivide yonayilum valiyavan .
40012042	tekye ri nayayavidhiyill i talamurrayodu onnichau uyitterjhyunnettu atine kuttm vidhikyum ; avall shalomonte njanam kellppan bhoomiyude arrutikallill ninnu vannuvalela ; ivide ita , shalomonilum valiyavan .
40012043	ashuddhatmavu oru manukshayne vidtu purrappedtsheksham niirillatt sthlangallillkoodi tannuppu anevkshichaukondu sanchrikyunu ; kandettunnillatanum .
40012044	njan purrappedtuponnente viidtilekyu madangicheellum enu avan parrayunu ; udane vanu atu ojhyinjtum adichauvari alakkrichaatumayi kannunu .
40012045	pinne avan purrappedtu , tannilum dushtatayerriyverre eejhyu aatmakylle koodtikyonduvarunu ; amanukshaynte pinnatte sthiti mumbilatte tilum vallate aakum ; i dushtatalamurrekyum angane bhavikyum .
40012046	avan puruksharattodu samsarichaukondirikyyill avante ammyum sahodaranmarum avanodu samsarippan aagrhichau purrattu ninu .
40012047	oruttn avanodu : ninte ammyum sahodaranmarum ninnodu samsarippan aagrhichau purrattu nilkyunu enu parranju .
40012048	atuparranjvanodu avan : ente amm aar ente sahodaranmar aar enu chodichau .
40012049	shikshaynmarude nere kai niidti : ita , ente ammyum ente sahodaranmarum .
40012050	sggrsthnayente pitavinte ishtam cheyaunnavan ente sahodaranum sahodariyum ammyum akunu enu parranju .
40013001	anu yeshu viidtillninu purrappedtu kadalarike irunu .
40013002	vallare puruksharam avante adukyn vanu koodukakondu avan padakill kayarri irunu ; puruksharam ellam karayill irunu .
40013003	avan avarodu palatum upamakallayi prsatavichaatentennall ; vitekyunnavan viteppan purrappedtu .
40013004	vitekyuboll chilatu vajhyiyarike viinnu ; parravakall vanu atu tinu kallanju .
40013005	chilatu parrasthlattu eerre mannillatt idattu viinnu ; manninu tyillaykayall kshannattill mullechauvanu .
40013006	sooyaarn udichaarre choodutadti , ver illaykayall atu unnangippoyi .
40013007	mattuchilatu mullinnidayill viinnu ; mullu mullechau vallanur atine njerukyikyllanju .
40013008	mattuchilatu nallnilattu viinnu , noorrum arrupatum mupptum meniyayi villanju .
40013009	cheviyullavan kellkydte .
40013010	pinne shikshaynmar adukye vanu : avarodu upamakallayi samsarikyunnatu entu enu avanodu chodichau .
40013011	avan avarodu uttram parranjtu : sggrrajayttinte mammrngalle arrivan ningallkyu varam labhichairikyunu ; avakyerlabhichaidtillal .
40013012	ullavanu kodukyum ; avanu samraddhiyundakum ; illattvnodo avanullatum koode eduttukallayum .
40013013	atukondu avar kandidtu kannateyum kedtidtu kellkyateyum grhikyateyum irikyyall njan upamakallayi avarodu samsarikyunu .
40013014	" ningall cheviyall kellkyum grhikyyilltanum ; kannall kannum dasharikyyilltanum . i janattinte hradayam tadichairikyunu ; avar chevikondu mandmayi kellkyunu ; kannu adechairikyunu ; avar kannu kannateyum chevi kellkyateyum hradayamkondu grhikyateyum tirinju kollateyum njan avare sekhaymakyateyum irikyendatinu tanne . "
40013015	enu yeshayaavu parranj prvachakattinu avarill nivratti varunu .
40013016	ennall ningallude kannu kannunnatu kondum ningallude chevi kellkyunnatu kondum bhagaymullava .
40013017	eerriyprvachakanmarum niitimanmarum ningall kannunnatu kanman aagrhichaidtum kandill ningall kellkyunnatu kellppan aagrhichaidtum kedtillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40013018	ennall vitekyunnavante upamkedtukollvin .
40013019	oruttn rajayttinte vachanam kedtidtu grhikyanjall dushtan vanu avante hradayattill vitekyppedttu eduttukallayunu ; itaretvajhyiyarike vitekyppedttu .
40013020	parrsthlattu vitekyppedtto , oruttn vachanam kedtidtu udane santokshattode kaikyollunnatu aakunu . ekkilum verillatirikyyall avan kshannikanareta .
40013021	vachanam timittm njerukymo upadrvamo neridtall avan kshannattill idarrippokunu .
40013022	mullinnidayill vitekyppedtto , oruttn vachanam kellkyunu ekkilum ilokattinte chintayum dhanattinte vanchnayum vachanatte njerukyiidtu nikshphalanayi tiirunnatakunu .
40013023	nallanilattu vitekyppedtto oruttn vachanam kedtu grhikyunnatu aakunnu ; atu villanju noorrum arrupatum mupptum meni nalkunnu .
40013024	avan mattoru upamavakyru parranju koduttu : sggrrajaym oru manukshayn tante nilattu nallvittu vitechaatinodu sadrashamakunu .
40013025	manukshayr urranguboll avante shatru vanu , kotambinte idayill kallvitechau poykyllanju .
40013026	njarru vallanur katirayappoll kallayum kannayvanu .
40013027	viidtudayavante dasanmar avante adukyll chenu : yajamanane , vayalill nallvittllayo vitechaatu ? pinne kallevideninu vanu enu chodichau .
40013028	itu shatru cheyattakunu enu avan avarodu parranju . njangall poyi atu parrichaukoodtuvan sammtamundo enu dasanmar avanodu chodichau .
40013029	itinu avan : illa , pakshe kallparrikyuboll kotambum koode pijhyutu pokum randum koode koyttollam vallaradte ;
40013030	koyttu kalattu njan koyaunnavarodu mube kallparrichau koodti chudtukallayendatinu kedtukallayi kedtuvanum kotambu ente kallappurayill koodtiveppanum kalpikyum enu parranju .
40013031	mattoru upamavan avakyru parranju koduttu : sggrrajaym kadukumanniyodu sadrasham ; atu oru manukshayn eduttu tante vayalill idtu .
40013032	atu ellvittilum cherriyatekkilum vallanur sasayngallill eettvum valutayi , aakashattile parravakall vanu atinte kombukallill vasippan takyvannm vrakshamayi tiirunu .
40013033	avan mattoru upamavarodu parranju : sggrrajaym pullichamavinodu sadrasham ; atu oru satii eduttu moonu parrmavill ellam pullichauvaruvollam adakyivechau .
40013034	itu okyeyum yeshu puruksharattodu upamakallayi parranju ; upamkoodate avarodu onum parranjillal .
40013035	" njan upamprsatavippan vay turrakyum ; lokasthapanam mutall gooddhamayatu uchaarikyum " enu prvachakan parranjtu nivrattiyakuvan samgativanu .
40013036	anantaram yeshu puruksharatte parranjyachaidtu viidtill vanu , shikshaynmar avante adukyll chenu : vayalile kallayude upamtelliyichau tarennam enu apekshichau .
40013037	atinu avan uttram parranjtu : nallvittu vitekyunnavan manukshay putrn ; vayall lokam ;
40013038	nallvittu rajayttinte putrnmar ; kalldushtante putrnmar ;
40013039	atu vitechashatru pishachu ; koyttu lokavasanam ; koyaunnavar dootanmar .
40013040	kallkoodti tiiyill idtu chudumpole lokavasanattill sambhavikyum .
40013041	manukshayputrn tante dootanmare ayakyum ;
40013042	avar avante rajayttill ninu ellidachaarkalleyum adhammrrrrm prvattrikyunnavareyum koodticheettru tiichaoollayill idtukallakayum , avide karachaalum pallu kadiyum undakum .
40013043	anu niitimanmar tangallude pitavinte rajayttill sooyaarne ppole prkashikyum . cheviyullavan kellkydte .
40013044	sggrrajaym vayalill ollichauvechanidhiyodu sadrasham . atu oru manukshayn kandu marrechaidtu , tante santokshattall chenu tanikyullatokyeyum vittu avayall vangi .
40013045	pinneyum sggrrajaym nallmuttu anevkshikyunnoru vayapariyodu sadrasham .
40013046	avan vilayerriyoru muttu kandettiyarre chenu tanikyullatokyeyum vittu atu vangi .
40013047	pinneyum sggrrajaym kadalill idunnatum ellavakmiinum pidikyunnatumayoru valayodu sadrasham .
40013048	nirranjppoll avar atu valichau karekyu kayatti , , irunukondu nallatu patrngallill koodtivechau , chiitt errinju kallanju .
40013049	angane tanne lokavasanattill sambhavikyum : dootanmar purrappedtu niitimanmarude idayill ninu dushtanmare vertirichau tiichaoollayill idtu kallayum ;
40013050	avide karachaalum pallukadiyum undakum .
40013051	itellam grhichauvo ? ennatinu avar uvau enu parranju .
40013052	avan avarodu : atukondu sggrrajayttinu shikshaynayi ttiinnar eetu shasrtiyum tante nikshepattill ninu putiyatum pajhyayatum eduttu kodukyunnoru viidtudayavanodu sadrashanakunu enu parranju .
40013053	i upamakalle parranju tiinnarsheksham yeshu avidam vidtu tante pitranagarattill vanu , avarude palliyill avakyru upadeshichau .
40013054	avar visyichau : ivanu i njanavum viiyaarprvrattikallum evideninu ?
40013055	ivan tachaante makan allayo ? ivante amm marriyennavallallayo ? ivante sahodaranmar yakyob , yose , shimon , yoodennavar allayo ?
40013056	ivante sahodarikallum ellam nammodu koode illayo ? ivanu itu okyeyum evide ninu enu parranju avakkll idarrippoyi .

40013058	avarude avishasam nimittm avide vallare viiyaar prvrattikalle cheyatilla .
40014001	akalattu idaprbhuvayherodavu yeshuvinte shruti kedtidtu :
40014002	avan yohannan sapakan ; avan marichaavarude idayill ninu uyittru ; atukondakunu i shtikall avanill vayaparikunnatu enu tante bhrataynmarodu parranju .
40014003	herodavu tante sahodaranayphiilipposinte bhayaar heroday nimittm , avall ninakyu bhayaaryayirikyunnatu vihitamallenu yohannan avanodu parranjtukondu tanne ,
40014004	avane pidichau kedti tadavill aakyiyirunu .
40014005	avane kolluvan manassundayidtum puruksharam avane prvachakan enu ennukayall avare bhayappedtu .
40014006	ennall herodavinte janandivasam aayappoll herodayyude makall sabhamaddhey nrattm cheyatu herodavine prsadippichau .
40014007	atukondu entu chodichaalum avallkyu kodukyum enu avan sataym cheyatu vakyu koduttu .
40014008	avall ammyude upadeshprkaram : yohannan sapakante taloru talattill tarennam enu parranju .
40014009	rajavu du : khichau ekkilum cheyat sataytteyum virunukareyum vicharichau atu koduppan kalpichau ;
40014010	aallayachau tadavill yohannane shirachedam cheyaichau .
40014011	avante taloru talattill kondu vanu balekyu koduttu ; avall ammekyu kondupoyi koduttu .
40014012	avante shikshaynmar chenu udall eduttu kujhyichaidtu : pinne vanu yeshuvine arriyichau .
40014013	atu kedtidtu yeshu avidam vidtu padakill kayarri nijjarnamayoru sthlattekyu verridtu vangippoyi ; puruksharam atu kedtu padtnnangallill ninu kallnadayayi avante pinnale chenu .
40014014	avan vanu valiypuruksharatte kandu avarill manasslinju avarude rogikalle sekhaymakyi .
40014015	vaikunneramayappoll shikshaynmar avante adukyll chennu : i sthlam marubhoomiyalela , neravum vaiki ; puruksharam gramangallill poyi bhakshannasadhanangall kollendatinu avare parranjyakyennam enu parranju .
40014016	yeshu avarodu : avar pokuvan aavashaymilla ; ningall avarkyu bhakshippan koduppin enu parranju .
40014017	avar avanodu : anchu appvum randu miinum allate njangallkyu ivide onum illenu parranju .
40014018	atu ingu kondu varuvin enu avan parranju .
40014019	pinne puruksharam pullin mell irippan kalpichau ; anchu appvum randu miinum eduttu , sggrttekyu nokyi vajhytti , appm nurrukyi , shikshaynmarude pakylum shikshaynmar puruksharattinum koduttu .
40014020	ellavarum tinu trapatrayi ; shekshichakakshannam pantrndu kodt nirracheeduttu .
40014021	tinnavaro srtiikalleyum paitangalleyum koodate eekadesham ayaayiram purukshanmar aayirunu .
40014022	udane yeshu tan puruksharatte parranjyakyunnatinnidayill shikshaynmar padakill kayarri , tanikyu mumbayi akyrekyu pokuvan avare nibaarndichau .
40014023	avan puruksharatte parranjyachaidtu pratthrippan taniye malayill kayarrippoyi ; vaikunneram aayappoll eekanayi avide irunu .
40014024	padako karavidtu palnajhyikdoorattayi , kattu prtikoolamakakondu tirakallall valanjirunu .
40014025	ratriyile nalam yamattill avan kadalinmell nadanu avarude adukyll vanu .
40014026	avan kadalinmell nadakyunnatu kandidtu shikshaynmar bhrmichau : atu oru bhootam enu parranju pedichau nilavillichau .
40014027	udane yeshu avarodu : dhaiyaarppeduvin ; njan aakunu ; pedikyendenu parranju . " njan idayane vedtum aadukall chitarrippokum " enu ejhyutiyirikyunuvalela .
40014028	atinu paretas : kattrave , nii aakunu ekkill njan vellattinmell ninte adukye varendatinu kalpikyennam enu parranju .
40014029	varikenu avan parranju . paretas padakill ninu irrangi , yeshuvinte adukyll chelluvan vellattinmell nadanu .
40014030	ennall avan kattu kandu pedichau mungittudangukayall ; kattrave , enne rakshikyenname enu nilavillichau .
40014031	yeshu udane kai niidti avane pidichau : alpavishasiye , nii entinu samshayichau enu parranju .
40014032	avar padakill kayarriyappoll kattu amanur .
40014033	padakilullavar : nii daivaputrn sataym enu parranju avane namaskarichau . vayakulappeduvanum tudangi :
40014034	avar akyreyetti , gennesaret deshattu chenu .

40015001	anantaram yerooshalemill ninu pariishanmarum shasrtimarum yeshuvinte adukyll vanu .
40015002	ninte shikshaynmar poovaarnmarude sabrdayam lamghikyunnatu entu ? avar bhakshikyuboll kai kajhyukunnillalelenu parranju .
40015003	avan avarodu uttram parranjtu : ningallude sabrdayam kondu ningall daivkalpanlamghikyunnatu entu ?
40015004	appneyum ammyeyum bahumaniky enum appneyo ammyeyo dookshikyunnavan marikyennam enum daivam kalpichauvalela .
40015005	ningallo oruttn appnodu ekkilum ammyodu ekkilum : ninakyu ennall upakaramayi varendatu vajhyipadu enu parranjall avan appne bahumanikyendenu parrayunu ;
40015006	ingane ningallude sabrdayattall ningall daivvachanatte dubaaarlamakyiyirikyunu .
40015007	kapadbhtikyare , ningallekyurrichau yeshayaavu :

40015009	manukshkalpanakallayupadeshangalle avar patthippikyunnatu kondu enne vaytthrmayi bhajikyunu . " enningane prvachichaatu ottirikyunu .

40015018	vayill ninu purrappedunnato hradayattill ninu varunu ; atu manukshayne ashuddhmakyunu .
40015019	enganeyennall duschinta , kulapatakam , vaybhicharam , parasamgam , mokshannam , kallssakshaym , dookshannam innivhradayattill ninu purrappedtu varunu .
40015020	manukshayne ashuddhmakyunnatu itareta ; kajhyukatt kai kondu bhakshikyunnato manukshayne ashuddhmakyunnillal .
40015021	yeshu avidam vidtu , sor siidon ennprdeshangallilekyu vangi ppoyi .

40015026	avano : makyllude appm eduttu naykyudtikallkyu idtu kodukyunnatu nannallenu uttram parranju .
40015027	atinu avall : ate , kattrave , naykyudtikallum udayavarude meshayill ninu viijhyunnnurrukyukall tinunundalellenu parranju .
40015028	srtiiye , ninte vishasam valiyatu ; ninte ishtam pole ninakyu bhavikydte enu parranju . anajhyikmutall avallude makallkyu sekhaym vanu .
40015029	yeshu avide ninu yatryayi galiilakydalarike chenu malayill kayarri avide irunu .

40016003	aakashattinte bhavam vivechippan ningall arriyunu ; ennall kallakshannangalle vivechippan kajhyikayillayo ?
40016004	dokshavum vaybhicharavumulltalamurradayallam tirayunu ; yonayude adayallamallate atinu adayallam labhikyyilla ; pinne avan avare vidtupoyi .

40016024	pinne yeshu shikshaynmarodu parranjtu : oruttn entepinnale varuvan ichchichaall tannettan tayjichau , tante krooshu eduttu enne anugamikydte .

40017018	yeshu bhootatte shasichau , atu avane vidtupoyi , balanu anajhyikamutall sekhaymvanu .

40017020	avan avarodu : ningallude alpavishasam nimittmareta ;

40017024	avar kaphannarhoomill ettiyarre didrhmppnnam vangunnavar paretasinte adukyll vanu : ningallude guru didrhmappnnam kodukyunnillayo enu chodichaatinu :
40017025	uvau enu avan parranju . avan viidtill vannappoll yeshu avanodu : shimone , ninakyu entu tonunu ? bhoomiyile rajakynmall chukkmo karamo aarodu vangunu ? putrnmarodo anayrodo enu munnidtu chodichaatinu : anayrodu enu avan parranju .
40017026	yeshu avanodu : ennall putrnmar ojhyivullavaralela .
40017027	ekkilum nam avakyru idachaar varuttatirikyendatinu nii kadalilekyu chenu choondall idtu aadaym kidtunnmiinine eduky ; atinte vay turrakyuboll oru chatudrhmppnnam kannum ; atu eduttu enikyum ninakyum vendi koduky enu parranju
40018001	anajhyikayill shikshaynmar yeshuvinte adukye vanu : sggrrajayttill eettvum valiyavan aar enu chodichaau .
40018002	avan oru shishuvine adukye villichau avarude naduvill nirrutti :
40018003	ningall tirinju shishukylleppole aayvarunnillekkill sggrrajayttill kadakyyillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
40018004	aakayall i shishuvineppole tannettan tajhyttunnavan sggrrajayttill eettvum valiyavan aakunu .
40018005	ingineyullshishuvine ente namattill kaikyollunnavan enne kaikyollunu .
40018006	ennill vishsikyunni cherriyavarill oruttnu aarekkilum idachaar varuttiyalo avante kajhyuttill valiyoru tirikyllu kedti avane samudrttinte aajhyattill tajhyttikyllayunnatu avanu nanu .
40018007	idachaar hetuvayi lokattinu ayeekashtam ; idachaar varunnatu aavashaym tanne ; ekkilum idachaar varuttunnmanukshaynu ayeekashtam .
40018008	ninte kayeekalo ninakyu idachaar aayall atine vedti errinju kallaka ; randu kayaum randu kalum ullavnayi nitayiyill viijhyunnatinekyall amgahiinanayidto mudantanayidto jiivanill kadakyunnatu ninakyu nanu .
40018009	ninte kannu ninakyu idachaar aayall atine choonneduttu errinjukallaka ; randu kannullvanayi inarakattill viijhyunnatinekyall ottkynnnayi jiivanill kadakyunnatu ninakyu nanu .
40018010	i cherriyavarill oruttne tuchchiikarikyatirippan sookshichau kollvin .
40018011	sggrttill avarude dootanmar sggrsthnayente pitavinte mukham eppojhyum kannunu enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
40018012	ningallkyu entu tonunu ? oru manukshaynu noorru aadu undu ennirikydte ; avayill onu tetti ujhyanupoyall tonnoottombatineyum vidtechau tettippoyatine malakallill chenu tirayunnillayo ?
40018013	atine kandettiyall tettippokatt tonnoottombatilum adhikam atinekyurrichau santokshikyum enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
40018014	angane tanne i cherriyavarill oruttn nashichau pokunnatu sggrsthnayningallude pitavinu ishtamallal .

40022036	guro , nayayaprmannattill eetu kalpanvaliyatu enu chodichau .

40025036	nnayirunu ningall enne uduppichau ; rogiyayirunu , ningall enne kannan vanu ; tadavill aayirunu , ningall ente adukyll vanu .
40025037	atinu niitimanmar avanodu : kattrave , njangall eppoll ninne vishanukandidtu bhakshippan tarikayo dahichau kandidtu kudippan tarikayo cheyatu ?
40025038	njangall eppoll ninne atithiyayi kandidtu chettru kollkayo nnayi kandidtu uduppikyyo cheyatu ?
40025039	ninne rogiyayidto tadavilo eppoll kandidtu njangall ninte adukyll vanu enu uttram parrayum .
40025040	rajavu avarodu : ente i eettvum cherriysahodarnmarill oruttnu ningall cheyetdattollam ellam enikyu cheyatu enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu arullicheyaum .
40025041	pinne avan idattullallavarodu : shapikyppedtvare , enne vidtu pishachinum avante dootanmakyrum orukyiyirikyunnnitayiyilekyu pokuvin .
40025042	enikyu vishanu , ningall bhakshippan tannilla ; dahichau , ningall kudippan tannilla .
40025043	atithiyayirunu , ningall enne chettrukondilla ; nnayirunu , ningall enne uduppichailla ; rogiyum tadavilum aayirunu , ningall enne kanman vannillenu arullicheyaum .
40025044	atinu avar : kattrave , njangall ninne vishakyunnavano dahikyunnavano atithiyo nno rogiyo tadavilo aayi eppoll kandu ninakyu shashrooksh cheyaatirunu enu uttram parrayum .
40025045	avan avarodu i eettvum cherriyavarill oruttnu ningall cheyaanjedattollamellam enikyu aakunu cheyaanjtu enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu uttram arullum .
40025046	ivar nitaydandnattilekyum niitimanmar nitayjiivakklekyum pokum .
40026001	i vachanangall okyeyum parranju tiinnarsheksham yeshu shikshaynmarodu :
40026002	randu divasam kajhyinjidtu pesahaakunu enu ningall arriyunuvalela ; anu manukshayputrne krooshippan eelpikyum enu parranju .
40026003	anu mahapurohitanmarum janattinte mooppnmarum kayaaphamahapurohitante mandpattill vanukoodi .
40026004	yeshuvine upayattall pidichau kolluvan aalochichau ;
40026005	ekkilum janattill kalahamundakatirippan perunallill arutu enu parranju .
40026006	yeshu bethanayyill kukshttharogiyayirunnshiimonte viidtill irikyuboll
40026007	orusrtii vilayerriyparimallatailam nirranj oru vekkll bharanni eduttumkondu avante adukye vanu , avan pantiyill irikyuboll atu avante talayill ojhyichau .
40026008	shikshaynmar atukandidtu mukshinju : i verrum chilavu entinu ?
40026009	itu vallare vilekyu vittu daridrnmakyur kodukyamayiru nuvalelenu parranju .
40026010	yeshu atu arrinju avarodu : srtiiye asahayppeduttunnatu entu ? avall ekkll nallprvrattiyalelcheyattu .
40026011	daridrr ningallkyu ellayepajhyum adukye undu ; njan ningallkyu ellayepajhyum illatanum .
40026012	avall i tailam ente dehattinmell ojhyichaatu ente shavasamskyarattinayi cheyattakunu .
40026013	lokattill engum , i suvisheksham prsamgikyunnedttellam avall cheyattum avallude oammrkyayi prsatavi kyum enu sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
40026014	anu pantiruvarill oruttnayyoodisavirekyyeerattavu mahapurohitanmarude adukyll chenu :
40026015	ningall entu tarum ? njan avane kannichau taram enu parranju : avar avanu mupptu vellallikyashu tookyikyo duttu .
40026016	anu mutall avane kannichaukoduppan avan takym anevkshichau ponu .
40026017	pullippillatt appttinte onnam nallill shikshaynmar yeshuvinte adukyllvanu : nii pesahkajhyippan njangall orukyendatu evide enu chodichau .
40026018	atinu avan parranjtu : ningall nagarattill innavante adukyll chenu : ente samayam aduttirikyunu ; njan ente shikshaynmarumayi ninte adukyll pesahkajhyikyum enu guru parrayunu enu parravin .
40026019	shikshaynmar yeshu kalpichaatupole cheyatu pesahorukyi .
40026020	sandyyayappoll avan pantrndu shikshaynmarodukoode pantiyill irunu .
40026021	avar bhakshikyuboll avan : ningallill oruvan enne kannichaukodukyum enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
40026022	appoll avar atayntam du : khichau : njano , njano , kattrave , enu ororuttn parranjutudangi .
40026023	avan uttram parranjtu : ennodukoode kai talattill mukyunnavan tanne enne kannichaukodukyum .
40026024	tannekyurrichau ejhyutiyirikyunnatupole manukshayputrn pokunu sataym ; manukshayputrne kannichaukodukyunnmanukshaynno hkashtam ; amanukshayn janikyatirunu ekkill avanu kollallayirunu .
40026025	ennarre avane kannichaukodukyunnyood njano rrabi , enu parranjtinu : nii tanne enu avan parranju .

40027016	ann barrabaas ennshrutippedtoru tadavukaran undyirunu .

40027020	ennall barrabaasine chodippanum yeshuvine nashippippanum mahapurohitanmarum mooppnmarum puruksharatte sammtippichau .
40027021	naduvajhyi avarodu : i iruvarill eevane vidtutarennmenu ningall ichchikyunu enu chodichaatinu barrabaasine enu avar parranju .

40027023	avan cheyat doksham entu enu avan chodichau . avane krooshikyennam enu avar eettvum nilavillichau parranju .
40027024	aaravaram adhikamakunnatallate onum sadhikyunnillenu piilattos kandidtu vellallam eduttu puruksharam kanke kai kajhyuki : i niitimante rtattill enikyu kuttm illa ; ningall tanne nokyikyollvin enu parranju .
40027025	avante rtam njangallude melum njangallude makyllude melum varadte enu janam okyeyum uttram parranju .

40027030	pinne avantemell tuppi , koll eduttu avante talayill adichau .

40027038	valattum idattumayi randu kallallanmareyum avanodukoode krooshichau .
40027039	kadanupokunnavar talkulukyi avane dukshichau :
40027040	mandiram pollichau moonunallkondu panniyunnavane , ninnettnne rakshiky ; daivaputrn ekkill krooshillninu irrangivenu parranju .

40027042	ivan mattullallavare rakshichau , tannettan rakshippan kajhyikayilla ; avan yisrayelinte rajavu aakunu ekkill ippoll krooshillninu irrangivaradte ; ennall njangall avanill vishsikyum .
40027043	avan daivattill aashryikyunu ; avanu ivanill prsadamundekkill ippoll viduvikydte ; njan daivaputrn enu avan parranjuvalelenuparranju .

40027045	aarrammanni nerammutall ombatammanni neramvare deshattu ellam irudtundayi .
40027046	eekadesham ombatammanni nerattu yeshu : eelii , eelii , lammashabtani ennu urrakye nilavillichau ; ente daivame , ente daivame , nii enne kaividttu entu ennatthrm .
40027047	avide ninnirunnavarill chilar atukedtidtu : avan eeliyave villikyunu enu parranju .

40027049	shekshamullallavar : nilky ; eeliyavu avane rakshippan varumo enu nokyam enu parranju .
40027050	yeshu pinneyum urrakye nilavillichau prannanevidtu .
40027051	appoll mandirattile tirashiilmelltodtu adiyollam randayi chiintippoyi ;
40027052	bhoomikulungi , parrakall pillanur , kallarrakall turranu , nidr prapichavishuddhnmarude shariirangall palatum uyitterjhyunnettu

40027054	shatadhipanum avanodukoode yeshuvine kattuninnavarum bhookambam mutalayi sambhavichaatu kandidtu : avan daivaputrn aayirunu sataym enu parranju eettvum bhayappedtu .
40027055	galiilayillninu yeshuvine shushrookshichaukondu anugamichauvannpalsrtiikallum doorattuninnu nokyikyondirunu .
40027056	avarill magdalakyaratti marriyayum yakyobinteyum yoseyudeyum ammyaymarriyayum sebadiputrnmarude ammyum undayirunu .
40027057	sandyyayappoll arimathaykyaranayyoseph enndhanavan tanum yeshuvinte shikshaynayirikyyall vanu ,
40027058	piilattosinte adukyll chenu yeshuvinte shariiram chodichau ; piilattos atu eelpichaukoduppan kalpichau .
40027059	yoseph shariiram eduttu nimmrlashiilayill potinju ,
40027060	tan parrayill vedtichairunntante putiykallarrayill vechau kallarrayude vatilkyll oru valiyakallu urudtivechaiidtu poyi .
40027061	kalelrrakyu etire magdalakyaratti marriyayum matte marriyayum irunnirunu .
40027062	orukynallinte pitte divasam mahapurohitanmarum pariishanmarum piilattosinte adukyll chenu koodi :
40027063	yajamanane , i chatiyan jiivanodirikyuboll : moonu nall kajhyinjidtu njan uyitterjhyunnelkyum enu parranjprkaram njangallkyu oammr vanu .
40027064	atukondu avante shikshaynmar chenu moshtichaidtu , avan marichaavarude idayillninu uyitterjhyunnettu enu janattodu parrakayum oduvilatte chativu mumbilatte tilum vikshamamayittiirukayum cheyaatirikyendatinu moonnam nall vare kallarrurrappakyuvan kalpiky enu parranju .
40027065	piilattos avarodu : kavallkyoodttte taram ; poyi ningallall aakunnedattollam urrappu varuttuvin enu parranju .
40027066	avar chenu kallinu mudrvechau kavallkyoodttte nirrutti kallarrurrappakyi .
40028001	shabat kajhyinju avadtttinte onnam divasam vellukyuboll magdalakyaratti marriyayum matte marriyayum kallarrkanman chenu .
40028002	pedtenu valiyoru bhookambam undayi ; kattravintedootan sggrttillninu irrangivanu , kallu urudtiniikyi atinmell irunnirunu .
40028003	avante roopam minnalinu otttum avante uduppu himampole vellutttum aayirunu .
40028004	kavalkyar avane kandu pedichau virrechau marichaavareppole aayi .
40028005	dootan srtiiyodu : bhayappedenda ; krooshikyppedt yeshuvine ningall anevkshikyunu enu njan arriyunu ;
40028006	avan ivide illa ; tan parranjtupole uyitterjhyunnettu ; avan kidannsthlam vanukanmin .

41004040	pinne avan avarodu : ningall ingane bhiirukyll aakuvan entu ? ningallkyu ippojhyum vishasamillayo enu parranju .
41004041	avar vallare bhayappedtu : kattum kadalum koode ivane anusarikyunuvalela ; ivan aar enu tammill parranju .
41005001	avar kadalinte akyre gadaradeshattu etti .
41005002	padakillninu irrangiyudane ashuddhatmavullalloru manukshayn kallarrakallill ninu vanu avane etirettu .

41007010	ninte appneyum ammyeyum bahumaniky enum appneyo ammyeyo prakunnavan marikyennam enum moshe parranjuvalela .

41007020	manukshaynillninu purrappedunnataretmanukshayne ashuddhnkyunnatu ;
41007021	akattuninu , manukshayrude hradayattill ninu tanne , duschinta , vaybhicharam , parasamgam , kulapatakam ,

41007023	i dokshangall ellam akattuninu purrappedtu manukshayne ashuddhnakyunu enum avan parranju .
41007024	avan avideninu purrappedtu siidonteyum sorinteyum atirnadtill chenu oru viidtill kadanu ; aarum arriyarutu enu ichchichau ekkilum marranjirippan sadhichailla .

41007030	avall viidtill vannarre , makall kidakymell kidakyunnatum bhootam vidtupoyatum kandu .
41007031	avan viindum sorinte atirvidtu siidonvajhyiyayi dekyppolideshattinte naduvillkoodi galiilakydalpurrattu vanu .

41007035	udane avante chevi turranu navinte kedtum ajhyinjidtu avan shariyayi samsarichau .
41007036	itu aarodum parrayarutu enu avarodu kalpichau ekkilum avan etr kalpichauvo atryum avar prsiddhmakyi :
41007037	avan sakalavum nannayi cheyatu ; chekidare kellkyumarrakyunu ; umare samsarikyumarrakyunu enu parranju atayntam visyichau .
41008001	adivasangallill eettvum valiypuruksharam undayirikye avakyru bhakshippan onum illaykakondu yeshu shikshaynmare adukyll villichau avarodu :
41008002	i puruksharam ippoll moonunallayi ennodukoode pakyrunu ; avakyru bhakshippan onum illaykakondu enikyu avarodu alivu tonunu ;
41008003	njan avare padtinniyayi viidtilekyu ayachaall avar vajhyiyillvechau tallanurpokum ; avarill chilar doorattuninnu vannavaralelenu parranju .
41008004	atinu avante shikshaynmar : ivakyru ivide marubhoomiyill appm koduttu trapativaruttuvan engane kajhyiyum enu uttram parranju .
41008005	avan avarodu : ningallude pakyll etr appm undu enu chodichau . eejhyu enu avar parranju .
41008006	avan puruksharattodu nilattu irippan kalpichau ; pinne aeejhyappm eduttu setatrm cheyatu nurrukyi , shikshaynmarude pakyll villambuvan koduttu ; avar puruksharattinu villambi .
41008007	cherriyamiinum kurre undayirunu ; atum avan anugrhichaidtu , villambuvan parranju .
41008008	avar tinu trapatrayi ; shekshichakakshannangall eejhyuvadti nirracheeduttu .
41008009	avar eekadesham nalayiramper aayirunu .
41008010	avan avare parranjyachudane shikshaynmarodukoode padakill kayarri dalnoothamshangallill etti .
41008011	anantaram pariishanmar vanu avane pariikshichaukondu aakashattuninu oru adayallam anevkshichau avanumayi takyrichau tudangi .
41008012	avan aatmavill njarangi : i talamurradayallam anevkshikyunnatu entu ? i talamurrekyu adayallam labhikyyillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
41008013	avare vidtu pinneyum padaku kayarri akyrekyu kadanu .
41008014	avar appm kondupokuvan marranu poyirunu ; padakill avarude pakyll oru appm matrme undayirunnullallu .
41008015	avan avarodu : nokyuvin , pariisharude pullichaamavum herodavinte pullichaamavum sookshichau kollvin enu kalpichau .
41008016	namukyu appm illaykayall enu avar tammill tammill parranju .
41008017	atu yeshu arrinju avarodu parranjtu : appm illaykayall ningall tammill parrayunnatu entu ? ippojhyum tirichaarriyunnillayo ? grhikyunnillayo ? ningallude hradayam kaduttirikyunuvo ?
41008018	kannu undayidtum kannunnillayo ? chevi undayidtum kellkyunnillayo ? oakyrunnatumillayo ?
41008019	ayaayirampekyru njan anchppm nurrukyiyappoll kakshannangall etrkodt nirracheeduttu ? pantrndu enu avar avanodu parranju .
41008020	nalayiram pekyru eejhyu nurrukyiyappoll kakshannangall etr vadti nirracheeduttu ? eejhyu enu avar avanodu parranju .
41008021	pinne avan avarodu : ippojhyum ningall grhikyunnillayo enu parranju .
41008022	avar betsayidayill ettiyappoll oru kurudane avante adukyll konduvanu avane todennamenu apekshichau .
41008023	avan kurudante kaikyu pidichau avane urinu purrattu kondupoyi avante kannill tuppi avante mell kaivechau : nii vallatum kannunundo enu chodichau .
41008024	avan melepadtunokyi : njan manukshayre kannunu ; avar nadakyunnatu marangallpoleyaretkannunnatu enu parranju .
41008025	pinneyum avante kanninmell kaivechaarre avan sekhaym prapichau mijhyichaunokyi ellam spashtamayi kandu .
41008026	nii urill kadakypolum arutu enu avan parranju avane viidtilekyu ayachau .
41008027	anantaram yeshu shikshaynmarumayi philipposinte kaisayaarkyu adutt urukallilekyu poyi ; vajhyiyill vechau shikshaynmarodu : janangall enne aar enu parrayunu enu chodichau .
41008028	yohannan sapakanenu chilar , eeliiyavenu chilar , prvachakanmarill oruttn enu mattu chilar enu avar uttram parranju .
41008029	avan avarodu : ennall ningall enne aar enu parrayunu enu chodichaatinu : nii krisatu aakunu enu paretas uttram parranju .
41008030	pinne tannekyurrichau aarodum parrayarutenu avan avarodu khanditamayi parranju .
41008031	manukshayputrn palatum sahikyyum mooppnmarum mahapuro hitanmarum shasrtimarum avane tallallikyllanju kollukayum moonunall kajhyinjidtu avan uyitterjhyunne lkyyum vennam enu avare upadeshichautudangi .
41008032	avan i vakyu turranu parranju . appoll paretas avane verridtukondupoyi shasichautudangi ;
41008033	avano tirinjunokyi shikshaynmare kandidtu paretasine shasichau : sattane , enne vidtupo ; nii daivattintetallmanukshayrudetaretkarutunnatu enu parranju .
41008034	pinne avan puruksharatteyum tante shikshaynmareyum arike villichau avarodu parranjtu : oruvan enne anugamippan ichchichaall avan tannettan tayjichau tante kroosh eduttukondu enne anugamikydte .
41008035	aarekkilum tante jiivane rakshippan ichchichaall atine kallayum ; aarekkilum enteyum suvishekshattinteyum nimittm tante jiivane kallanjall atine rakshikyum .
41008036	oru manukshayn savaarlokavum nedukayum tantejiivane kallakayum cheyatall avanu entu pryojanam ?
41008037	alla , tante jiivanuvendi manukshayn entoru marruvilkodukyum ?
41008038	vaybhicharavum papavum ullalli talamurrayill aarekkilum enneyum ente vachanatteyumkurrichau nannichaall avane kyurrichau manukshayputrnum tante pitavinte tejassill vishaddhdootanmarumayi varuboll nannikyum ;
41009001	pinne avan avarodu : daivarajaym shtiyode varunnatu kannuvollam marannam aasdikyattvar chilar i nilkyunnavarill undu enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
41009002	aarrudivasam kajhyinjsheksham yeshu paretasineyum yakyobineyum yohannaneyum koodti oru uyannar malayilekyu tanichau kondupoyi avarude mumbake roopantarappedtu .
41009003	bhoomiyill oru alakyukaranum velluppippan kajhyiyatvannm avante vasrtm atayntamvelluppayi tillangi .

41009005	paretas yeshuvinodu : rrabai nam ivide irikyunnatu nallatu ; njangall moonu kudill undakydte ; onu ninakyum onu moshekyum onu eeliiyavinum enu parranju .
41009006	tan entu parrayendu enu avan arrinjilla ; avar bhayaparavasharayirunu .
41009007	pinne oru meghamvanu avarudemell nijhyalidtu : ivan ente priyaputrn ; ivanu chevikoduppin enu meghttillninu oru shabdavum undayi .
41009008	pedtenu avar chuttum nokyiyarre tangallodukoode yeshuvine matrm allate aareyum kandilla .
41009009	avar malayillninu irranguboll : manukshayputrn marichavarillninu ejhyunnettidtllate i kandatu aarodum arriyikyrutu enu avan avarodu kalpichau .
41009010	marichaavarillninu ejhyunnelky ennullallatu entu enu tammill takyrichaumkondu avar avakyu ullallill samgrhichau ;
41009011	rreeliiyavu mube varendatu enu shasrtimar vadikyunnatu entu enu avar chodichau .

41009014	avan shikshaynmarude adukye vannarre valiypuruksharam avare chutti nilkyunnatum shasrtimar avarodu takyrikyunnatum kandu .
41009015	puruksharam avane kandudane bhrmichau oadivanu avane vandichau .
41009016	avan avarodu : ningall avarumayi takyrikyunnatu entu enu chodichau .
41009017	atinu puruksharattill oruttn : guro , umanayaatmavullallente makane njan ninte adukyll konduvanu .
41009018	atu avane evidevechau pidichaalum avane tallalliyidunu ; pinne avan nurechau pallukadichau varandu pokunu . atine purrattakyendatinu njan ninte shikshaynmarodu parranjidtu avakyru kajhyinjillenu uttram parranju .
41009019	avan avarodu : avishasamullalltalamurraye , etrttollam njan ningallodukoode irikyum ? etrttollam ningalle porrukyum ? avane ente adukyll konduvaruvin enu uttram parranju .
41009020	avar avane avante adukyll konduvanu . avane kandudane aatmavu avane ijhyechau ; avan nilattu viinnu nurechaurundu .
41009021	itu avanu sambhavichaidtu etr kalamayi enu avante appnodu chodichaatinu avan : cherruppm mutall tanne .
41009022	atu avane nashippikyendatinu palappojhyum tiiyilum vellallattilum tallalliyidtidtundu ; ennall vallatum kajhyiyum ekkill manasslinju njangalle sahayikyenname enu parranju .
41009023	yeshu avanodu : ninnall kajhyiyum ekkill enno vishsikyunnavanu sakalavum kajhyiyum enu parranju .
41009024	balante appn udane nilavillichau : kattrave , njan vishsikyunu ente avishasattinu sahayikyenname enu parranju .
41009025	ennarre puruksharam oadikyudunnatu yeshu kandidtu ashuddhatmvine shasichau : umanum chekidanumayaatmave , ivane vidtupo ; ini avanill kadakyrutu enu njan ninnodu kalpikyunu enu parranju .
41009026	appoll atu nilavillichau avane vallare ijhyechau purrappedtupoyi . marichaupoyi enu palarum parravan takyvannm avan marichaapole aayi .
41009027	yeshu avane kaikyu pidichau nivattri , avan ejhyunnettu .
41009028	viidtill vannasheksham shikshaynmar skayaaarmayi avanodu : njangallkyu atine purrattakyuvan kajhyiyatttu entu enu chodichau .
41009029	pratthrnayall allate i jati onninalum purrappedtu pokayillenu avan parranju .
41009030	avideninu avar purrappedtu galiilayillkoodi sanchrichau ; atu aarum arriyarutenu avan ichchichau .

41009032	avakyu avar grhichailla ; avanodu chodippano bhayappedtu .
41009033	avan kaphannarhoomill vanu viidtill irikyuboll : ningall vajhyiyillvechau tammill vadichaatu entu enu avarodu chodichau .

41009035	avan irunu pantiruvareyum villichau : oruvan mumban aakuvan ichchichaall avan ellavarilum odukyttvanum ellavakyurm shushrookshakanum aakennam enu parranju .
41009036	oru shishuvine eduttu avarude naduvill nirrutti annechaukondu avarodu :
41009037	inganeyullallshishukyllill onnine ente namattill kaikyollallunnavan enne kaikyollallunu ; enne kaikyollallunnavano enneyallenne ayachaavane kaikyollallunu enu parranju .
41009038	yohannan avanodu : guro , oruvan ninte namattill bhootangalle purrattakyunnatu njangall kandu ; avan namme anugamikyaykayall njangall avane virodhichau enu parranju .
41009039	atinu yeshu parranjtu : avane virodhikyrutu ; ente namattill oru viiyaarprvratti cheyatidtu vegattill enne dukshichau parravan kajhyiyunnavan aarum illa .
41009040	namukyu prtikoolamallattvan namukyu anukoolamalela .

41009042	ekkll vishsikyunni cherriyavarill oruttnu idachaar varuttunnavante kajhyuttill valiyoru tirikyllu kedti avane kadalill idtukallayunnatu avanu eerre nallu .
41009043	ninte kai ninakyu idachaar varuttiyall atine vedtikyllak

41009045	ninte kall ninakyu idachaar varuttiyall atine vedtikyllak

41009047	ninte kannu ninakyu idachaar varuttiyall atine choonu kallaka ; ottkynnnayi daivarajayttill kadakyunnatu randu kannumullallavanayi inarakattill viijhyunnatinekyall ninakyu nallu .
41009048	avide avarude pujhyu chakunnilltii kedunnatumilla .
41009049	ellavanum tiikondu uppidum .
41009050	uppu nallatutanne ; uppu karamillate poyalo entonninall atinu rasam varuttum ? ningallill tanne uppullallavarum aneyanaym samadhanamullallavarum aayirippin .
41010001	avideninu avan purrappedtu yodtrannakyre yehoodaydeshattinte atirollam chenu ; puruksharam pinneyum avante adukyll vanukoodi , pativupole avan avare pinneyum upadeshichau .
41010002	appoll pariishanmar adukyevanu : bhayaarye upekshikyu nnatu purukshanu vihitamo enu avane pariikshichau kondu avanodu chodichau .
41010003	avan avarodu moshe ningallkyu entu kalpantanu enu chodichau .
41010004	upekshannapatrm ejhyutikyoduttu avalle upekshippan moshe anuvadichau enu avar parranju .

41010007	atukondu manukshayn appneyum ammyeyum vidtu bhayaaar yodu patticheerum ;
41010008	iruvarum oru dehamayittiirum ; angane avar pinne randalloru dehamareta .

41010010	viidtillvechau shikshaynmar pinneyum atinekyurrichau avanodu chodichau .

41010013	avan todendatinu chilar shishukylle avante adukyll konduvanu ; shikshaynmaro avare shasichau .

41010016	pinne avan avare annechau avarudemell kaivechau , avare anugrhichau .

41010018	atinu yeshu : enne nallavan enu parrayunnatu entu ? daivam oruvan allate nallavan aarumilla .
