41010020	avan avanodu : guro , itu okyeyum njan cherruppm mutall prmannichau porunu enu parranju .
41010021	yeshu avane nokyi avane senhichau : oru kurravu ninakyundu ; poyi ninakyullallatu ellam vittu daridrkyru koduky ; ennall ninakyu sggrttill nikshepam undakum ; pinne vanu enne anugamiky enu parranju .
41010022	avan vallare sambattullallavan aakakondu i vachanattikkll vikshadichau du : khitanayi poykyllanju .
41010023	yeshu chuttum nokyi tante shikshaynmarodu : sambattullallavar daivarajayttill kadakyunnatu etr pryasam enu parranju .
41010024	avante i vakyinall shikshaynmar visyichau : ennall yeshu pinneyum makylle , sambattill aashryikyunnavar daivarajayttill kadakyunnatu etr pryasam .
41010025	dhanavan daivarajayttill kadakyunnatinekyall odtkam soochikyoojhyayoode kadakyunnatu elluppm enu uttram parranju .
41010026	avar eettvum visyichau : ennall rakshaprapippan aakyru kajhyiyum enu tammill tammill parranju .
41010027	yeshu avare nokyi ; manukshaykyru asaddhym tanne , daivattinu sakalavum saddhymalelenu parranju .
41010028	paretas avanodu : ita , njangall sakalavum vidtu ninne anugamichairikyunu enu parranju tudangi .
41010029	atinu yeshu : ente nimittvum ente suvisheksham nimittvum viido sahodaranmareyo sahodarikalleyo ammyeyo appneyo makylleyo nilangalleyo vidtall ,
41010030	i lokattill tanne , upadrvangallodumkoode noorrumadangu viidukalleyum sahodaranmareyum sahodarikalleyum ammmareyum makylleyum nilangalleyum varuvanullalllokattill nitayjiivaneyum prapikyattvan aarumillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
41010031	ekkilum mumbanmar palarum pimbanmarum pimbanmar mumbanmarum aakum enu uttram parranju .
41010032	avar yerooshalemilekyu yatrcheykayayirunu ; yeshu avakyru mumbayi nadanu ; avar visyichau : anugamikyunnvaro bhayappedtu . avan pinneyum pantiruvare koodtikyondu avarodu :
41010033	ita , nam yerooshalemilekyu pokunu ; avide manukshay putrn mahapurohitanmarudeyum shasrtimarudeyum kayaill eelpikyppedum ; avar avane marannattinu vidhichau jatikallkyu eelpikyum .
41010034	avar avane parihasikyyum tuppukayum tallukayum kollukayum moonu nall kajhyinjidtu avan uyitterjhyunne lkyyum cheyaum enningane tanikyu sambhavikyanullallatu parranju tudangi .
41010035	sebediyude makyllayyakyobum yohannanum avante adukyll vanu avanodu : guro , njangall ninnodu yachippan pokunnatu njangallkyu cheyatutaru van apekshikyunu enu parranju .
41010036	avan avarodu : njan ningallkyu entu cheyatutaruvan ningall aagrhikyunu enu chodichau .
41010037	ninte mahatttill njangallill oruttn ninte valattum oruttn idattum irikyuvan varam nalkennam enu avar parranju .
41010038	yeshu avarodu : ningall yachikyunnatu innatu enu ningall arriyunnilla ; njan kudikyunnpanapatrm kudippanum njan eelkyunnsanam eelkyuvanum ningallkyu kajhyiyumo enu chodichaatinu kajhyiyum enu avar parranju .
41010039	yeshu avarodu : njan kudikyunnpanapatrm ningall kudikyyum njan eelkyunnsanam eelkyyum cheyaum nischayam .
41010040	ente valattum idattum irippan varam nalkunnato entetalla ; aakyru orukyiyirikyunnuvo avakyru kidtum enu parranju .
41010041	atu sheksham pattuperum kedtidtu yakyobinodum yohannanodum niirasappedtu tudangi .
41010042	yeshu avare adukye villichau avarodu : jatikallill adhipatikallayavar avarill kattrrtm cheyaunu ; avarill mahattukyllayavar avarude mell adhikaram nadattunu enu ningall arriyunu .
41010043	ningallude idayill angane arutu ; ningallill mahan aakuvan ichchikyunnavan ellam ningallude shushrookshakyaran aakennam ;
41010044	ningallill onnaman aakuvan ichchikyunnavan ellavakyrum dasanakennam .
41010045	manukshayputrn shushrookshcheyaippanalla , shushrookshippanum anekakyruvendi tante jiivane marruvilayayi koduppanum aretvannatu .
41010046	avar yerihovill etti ; pinne avan shikshaynmarodu valiypuruksharattodukoode yeriho villninu purrappeduboll timayiyude makanaybattri mayi ennkurudanayoru bhikshakyaran vajhyiyarike irunnirunu .
41010047	nasarrayanayyeshu enu kedtidtu avan daviiduputra , yeshuve , ennodu karunnatonnenname enu nilavillichau tudangi .
41010048	mindatirippan palarum avane shasichaidtum : daviidputra , ennodu karunntonnenname enu avan eettvum adhikam nilavillichau parranju .
41010049	appoll yeshu ninu : avane villippin enu parranju . dhaiyaarppeduka , ejhyunnelky ninne villikyunu enu avar parranju kurudane villichau .
41010050	avan tante putappu idtumkallanju chadiyejhyunnettu yeshuvinte adukyll vanu .
41010051	yeshu avanodu : njan ninakyu entu cheyatutarennamenu nii ichchikyunu enu chodichaatinu : rrabooni , enikyu k prapikyennamenu kurudan avanodu parranju .
41010052	yeshu avanodu : poka ; ninte vishasam ninne rakshichairikyunu enu parranju . udane avan k prapichau yatryill avane anugamichau .
41011001	avar yerooshaleminodu samiipichau oliiv malayarike betphagayilum bethanayyilum ettiyappoll avan shikshaynmarill randupere ayachau avarodu :
41011002	ningallkyu etireyullallgramattill chelluvin ; atill kadannall udane aarum orikylum kayarriidtillatt oru kajhyutkyudtiye kedtiyirikyunnatu kannum ; atine ajhyichau konduvaruvin .
41011003	itu cheyaunnatu entu enu aarekkilum ningallodu chodichaall kattravinu itinekyondu aavashaym undu enu parravin ; avan kshannattill atine ingodtu ayakyum enu parranju .
41011004	avar poyi teruvill purrattu vatilkyll kajhyutakyudtiye kedtiyirikyunnatu kandu atine ajhyichau .
41011005	avide ninnavarill chilar avarodu : ningall kajhyutakyudtiye ajhyikyunnatu entu enu chodichau .
41011006	yeshu kalpichaatupole avar avaroduparranju ; avar avare vidtyachau .
41011007	avar kajhyutakyudtiye yeshuvinte adukyll konduvanu tangallude vasrtm atinmell idtu ; avan atinmell kayarri irunu .
41011008	anekar tangallude vasrtm vajhyiyill virichau ; mattu chilar parrambukallillninu chillikyombuvedti vajhyiyill vitarri .
41011009	mumbum pimbum nadakyunnavar : hoshanna , kattravinte namattill varunnavan vajhyttppedtvan :
41011010	varunnatayrajaym , nammude pitavaydaviidinte rajaym vajhyttppedumarrakadte ; atayunnatangallill hoshannenu aattrukondirunu .
41011011	avan yerooshalemill daivalayattilekyu chenu sakalavum chuttum nokyiyasheksham neram vaikiyatukondu pantiruvarodumkoode bethanayyi lekyu poyi .
41011012	pittennall avar bethanayvidtu poruboll avanu vishanu ;
41011013	avan ilayullellaru attivraksham doorattuninu kandu , atill vallatum kidtumo enu vechau chenu , atinnarike ettiyappoll ilallate onum kandilla ; atu attippjhyattinte kalamallanju .
41011014	avan atinodu : ini nikkllninu ennekyum aarum phalam tinnatirikydte enu parranju ; atu shikshaynmar kedtu .
41011015	avar yerooshalemill ettiyappoll avan daivalayttill kadanu , daivalayattill vilkyunnavareyum vangunnavareyum purrattakyittudangi ; ponvannibhakyrude meshakalleyum prakylle vilkyunnavarude piitthangalleyum marrichaidtukallanju ;
41011016	aarum daivalayattill koodi oru vasatuvum kondupoku van sammtichailla .
41011017	pinne avare upadeshichau : ente aalayam pratthrnalayam enu villikyppedum enu ejhyutiyirikyunnillayo ? ningallo atine kallallanmarude guhayakyi tiittru enu parranju .
41011018	atu kedtidtu mahapurohitanmarum shasrtimarum avane nashippikyendatu engane enu anevkshichau . puruksharam ellam avante upadeshattill atishayikyyall avar avane bhayappedtirunu .
41011019	sandyyakuboll avan nagaram vidtupokum .
41011020	ravile avar kadanu pokuboll attivraksham verode unnangippoyatu kandu ,
41011021	appoll paretasinu oammrvanu : rrabai , nii shapichatti unnangippoyalelenu avanodu parranju .
41011022	yeshu avarodu uttram parranjtu : daivattill vishasamullallavar aayirippin .
41011023	aarekkilum tante hradayattill samshayikyate tan parrayunnatu sambhavikyum enu vashsichaumkondu i malayodu : nii niingi kadalill chadippokenu parranjall avan parranjtupole sambhavikyum enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu .
41011024	atukondu ningall pratthrikyuboll yachikyunnato kyeyum labhichau enu vishsippin ; ennall atu ningallkyu undakum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
41011025	ningall pratthrikyan nilkyuboll sggrsthnayningallude pitavu ningallude pijhyakalle kshamikyendatinu ningallkyu aarodekkilum vallatum undekkill avanodu kshamippin .
41011026	ningall kshamikyanjalo sggrsthnayningallude pitavu ningallude pijhyakalleyum kshamikyyilla .
41011027	avar pinneyum yerooshalemill chenu . avan daivalayattill chuttinadakyuboll mahapurohitanmarum shasrtimarum mooppnmarum avante adukyll vanu ;
41011028	nii entu adhikaramkondu itu cheyaunu enum itu cheyvanullalladhikaram ninakyu tannatu aar enum avanodu chodichau .
41011029	yeshu avarodu : njan ningallodu oru vakyu chodikyum ; atinu uttram parravin ; ennall innadhikaramkondu itu cheyaunu enu njanum ningallodu parrayum .
41011030	yohannante sanam sggrttill ninno manukshayrill ninno undayatu ? ennodu uttram parravin enu parranju .
41011031	avar tammill aalochichau : sggrttill ninu enu parranjall , pinne ningall avane vishsikyanjtu entu enu avan parrayum .
41011032	manukshayrillninu enu parranjalo - ellavarum yohannane sakshall prvachakan enu ennukakondu avar janatte bhayappedtu .
41011033	angane avar yeshuvinodu : njangallkyu arrinjukoodenu uttram parranju . ennall njanum innadhikaram kondu cheyaunu enu ningallodu parrayunnillenu yeshu avarodu parranju .
41012001	pinne avan upamakallall avarodu parranjutudangiyatu : oru manukshayn oru muntirittodtm nadtundakyi chuttum velikedti chakyum kujhyichau nadti gopuravum pannitu kudiyanmare eelpichaidtu paradeshattu poyi .
41012002	kalam aayappoll kudiyanmarodu todtttinte anubhavam vangendatinu avan oru dasane kudiyanmarude adukyll parranjyachau .
41012003	avar avane pidichau talli verrute ayachau kallanju .
41012004	pinne mattoru dasane avarude adukyll parranjyachau ; avane avar talayill murrivelpikyukayum avamanikyyum cheyatu .
41012005	avan mattoruvane parranjyachau ; avane avar konu ; mattu palareyum chilare adikyyum chilare kollukayum cheyatu .
41012006	avanu ini oruttn , oru priyamakan , undayirunu . ente makane avar shakkikyum enu parranju odukym avane avarude adukyll parranjyachau .
41012007	akudiyanmaro : ivan avakashi aakunu ; varuvin ; nam ivane kolluka ; ennall avakasham namukyakum enu tammill parranju .
41012008	avar avane pidichau konu todtttill ninu errinju kallanju .
41012009	ennall todtttinte udayavan entu cheyaum ? avan vanu akudiyanmare nigrhichau todtm mattullallavare eelpikyum .
41012010	" viidu panniyunnavar tallallikyllanj kallu moolakyllayatiinnariri kyunu .
41012011	itu kattravinall sambhavichau . nammude drashtiyill ayaarvumayirikyunu " enntiruvejhyuttu ningall vayichaidtillayo ?
41012012	i upamtangallekyurrichau aakunu parranjtu enu grhichaidtu avar avane pidippan anekshichau : ennall puruksharatte bhayappedtu avane vidtupoyi .
41012013	anantaram avane vakyill kudukyuvan vendi avar pariishanmarilum herodayrilum chilare avante adukyll ayachau .
41012014	avar vanu : guro , nii manukshayrude mukham nokyate daivattinte vajhyi nerayi patthippikyunnatukondu nii satayvanum aareyum gannaymakyattvanum enu njangall arriyunu ; kaisakyru karam kodukyunnatu vihitamo allayo ? njangall kodukyyo kodukyatirikyyo vendatu enu avanodu chodichau .
41012015	avan avarude kapadam arrinju : ningall enne pariikshikyunnatu entu ? oru vellallikyashu konduvaruvin ; njan kannadte enu parranju .
41012016	avar konduvanu . i sroopavum melejhyuttum aarudetu enu avarodu chodichaatinu : kaisarudetu enu avar parranju .
41012017	yeshu avarodu : kaisakyurllallatu kaisakyrum daivattinullallatu daivattinum koduppin enu parranju ; avar avakkll vallare ayaaarppedtu .
41012018	punarutthanam illenu parrayunnsadookayr avante adukyll vanu chodichaatentennall :
41012019	guro , oruttnte sahodaran makyllillate marichau bhayaaar shekshichaall abhayaarye avante sahodaran parigrhichau tante sahodaranu santatiye janippikyennam enu moshe ejhyutiyirikyunu .
41012020	ennall eejhyu sahodaranmar undayirunu ; avarill moottvan oru srtiiye vivaham kajhyichau santatiyillate marichau poyi .
41012021	randamattvan avalle parigrhichau santatiyillate marichau ; moonnamattvanum angane tanne .
41012022	eejhyuvarum santatiyillate marichau ; ellavakyrum oduvill srtiiyum marichau .
41012023	punarutthanattill avall avarill eevanu bhayaaaryakum ? eejhyuvakyrum bhayaaar aayirunuvalela .
41012024	yeshu avarodu parranjtu : ningall tiruvejhyuttukalleyum daivashtiyeyum arriyaykakondallayo tettippokunnatu ?
41012025	marichaavarillninu uyitterjhyunnelkyuboll vivaham kajhyikyyillvivahattinu kodukyppedukayumilla ; sggrttile dootanmareppole aakum .
41012026	ennall marichaavar uyitterjhyunnelkyunnatinekyurrichau mosheyude pusatkattill mullpadapprubhagattu daivam avanodu : njan abrahaminte daivavum yishakyi nte daivavum yakyobinte daivavum enu arullicheeyat prkaram vayichaidtillayo ?
41012027	avan marichaavarude daivamalla , jiivanullallavarude daivamareta ; ningall vallare tettippokunu .
41012028	shasrtimarill oruvan aduttuvanu avar tammill takyrikyu nnatukedtu avan avarodu nallavannm uttram parranj prkaram bodhichaidtu : ellattilum mukhaykalpaneetu enu avanodu chodichau .
41012029	atinu yeshu : ellattilum mukhaykalpanayo : ' yisrayele , kellky ; nammude daivamaykattravu eekkattravu .
41012030	ninte daivamaykattravine nii poonnrhradayattodum poonnratmavodum poonnrmanassodum poonnrshtiyodum koode senhikyennam ' enu aakunu .

41012033	avane poonnrhradayattodum poonnrmanassodum poonnrshti yodumkoode senhikyunnatum tanneppole koodtukarane senhikyunnatum sakalsavaaramgahomangallekyallum yagngallekyallum saramerriyatu tanne enu parranju .
41012034	avan buddhiyode uttram parranju enu yeshu kandidtu : nii daivarajayttodu akannavanallenu parranju . atinte sheksham avanodu aarum onum chodippan tuninjilla .
41012035	yeshu daivalayattill upadeshichaukondu parranjutudngiyatu : krisatu daviidinte putrn enu shasrtimar parrayunnatu engane ?
41012036	" kattravu ente kattravinodu : njan ninte shatrukylle ninte padapiittham aakyuvollam ente valattubhagattiriky enu arullicheyatu " enu daviid tan parishuddhatmavilayi parrayunu .
41012037	daviid tanne avane kattravu enu parrayunuvalela ; pinne avante putrn aakunnatu engane ? ennall valiypuruksharam avante vakyu santokshattode kedtuponu .

41013001	avan daivalayatte vidtu pokuboll shikshaynmarill oruttn : guro , ita , enganeyullallkallu enganeyullallpanni enu avanodu parranju .

41014001	randudivasam kajhyinjidtu pesahayudeyum pullippillatt appttinteyum utsavam aayirunu . appoll mahapurohitanmarum shasrtimarum avane upayattall pidichau kolelndatu engane enu anevkshichau :
41014002	janattill kalaham undakatirippan utsavattill arutu enu avar parranju .
41014003	avan bethanayyill kushtarogiyayshiimonte viidtill pantiyill irikyuboll oru srtii oru venkkll bharanni vilayerriyschchajadamamsi tailavumayi vanu bharanni podtichau avante talayill ojhyichau .
41014004	avide chilar : tailattinte i verrum chelavu entinu ?
41014005	itu munnoorrill adhikam vellallikyashinu vittu daridrkyru koduppan kajhyiyumayirunuvalelenningane ullallill niirasappedtu avalle bhrichau .

41014008	avall tannall aavatu cheyatu : kallarrayile adakyttinnayi ente dehattinu mumbukoodti tailam techau .

41014015	avan viricheearukyiyoru vanmallikkannichau tarum ; avide namukyu orukyuvin enu parranju .

41014017	sandyyayappoll avan pantiruvarodumkoode vanu .
41014018	avar irunu bhakshikyuboll yeshu : ningallill oruvan , ennodukoode bhakshikyunnavan tanne , enne kannichau kodukyum enu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu parranju .
41014019	avar du : khichau , ororuttn : njano njano enu avanodu chodichau tudangi .
41014020	avan avarodu : pantiruvarill oruvan , ennodukoode talattill kai mukyunnavan tanne .
41014021	manukshayputrn pokunnatu tannekyurrichau ejhyutiyirikyunntupole tanne sataym ; manukshayputrne kannichaukodu kyunnmanukshaynno ayeekashtam ; amanukshayn janikytirunu ekkill avanu kollallayirunu enu parranju .
41014022	avar bhakshikyuboll avan appm eduttu vajhytti nurrukyi avakyru koduttu : vanguvin ; itu ente shariiram enu parranju .
41014023	pinne panapatrm eduttu setatrmcholli avakyru koduttu ; ellavarum atillninu kudichau ;
41014024	itu anekakyurvendi choriyunnatayi niyamattinullallente rtam .
41014025	muntirivallalliyude anubhavam pututayi anubhavikyumnall vare njan atu ini anubhavikyyillenu njan sataymayidtu ningallodu parrayunu enu avarodu parranju .
41014026	pinne avar setatrm padiyasheksham olivmalekyu poyi .
41014027	yeshu avarodu : ningall ellavarum idarrippokum ;
41014028	ennall njan uyitterjhyunnettsheksham ningallkyu mube galiilekyu pokum enu parranju .
41014029	paretas avanodu : ellavarum idarriyalum njan idarrukayillenu parranju .
41014030	yeshu avanodu : inu , i ratriyill tanne , kojhyi randuvadtm kookummube nii moonuvadtm enne tallallipprrayum enu njan sataymayidtu ninnodu parrayunu enu parranju .
41014031	avano : ninnodukoode marikyendivannalum njan ninne tallallipprrakayillenu adhikamayi parranju ; angane tanne ellavarum parranju .
41014032	avar getshemanennperullalltodtttill vannarre avan shikshaynmarodu : njan pratthrichautiiruvollam ivide irippin enu parranju .
41014033	pinne avan paretasineyum yakyobineyum yohannaneyum koodtikyondu bhrmippanum
41014034	ente ullallam marannavedanapole atidu : khitamayirikyunu ; ivide pattru unnannaririppin enu avarodu parranju .
41014035	pinne alpam mubodtu chenu nilattu viinnu , kajhyiyum ekkill anajhyikniingippokennam enu pratthrrichau :
41014036	abaa , pitave , ninakyu ellam kajhyiyum ; i panapatrm ekkllninu niikyenname ; ekkilum njan ichchikyunnatallnii ichchikyunnataretaakadte enu parranju .
41014037	pinne avan vanu avar urrangunnatukandu paretasi nodu : shiimone , nii urrangunuvo ? oru najhyikunnannari rippan ninakyu kajhyinjillayo ?
41014038	pariikshayill akappedayvan unnannarirunu pratthrippin ; aatmavu orukymullallatu , jaddamo balahiinamaretenu parranju .
41014039	avan pinneyum poyi avachanam tanne cholli pratthrichau .
41014040	madangivannarre avarude kannukallkyu bharamerriyirunnatu kondu avar urrangunnatu kandu ; avar avanodu entu uttram parrayennam enu arrinjill ;
41014041	avan moonnamatu vanu avarodu : ini urrangi aashsichau kollvin ; mati , najhyikvanu ; ita , manukshayputrn papikallude kayaill eelpikyppedunu .
41014042	ejhyunnelpin ; nam poka ; ita , enne kannichaukodu kyunnavan aduttirikyunu enu parranju .
41014043	udane avan samsarichaukondirikyuboll tanne , pantiruvarill oruttnayyoodayum avanodukoode mahapu rohitanmar , shasrtimar , mooppnmar ennavar ayachoru puruksharavum vallum vadiyumayi vanu .
41014044	avane kannichaukodukyunnavan njan eevane chumbikyu mo avan tanne aakunu ; avane pidichau sookshtayode kondupokuvin enu avakyru oru adayallam parranjukoduttirunu .
41014045	avan vanu udane aduttu chennu : rrabai , enu parranju avane chumbichau .
41014046	avar avante mell kaivechau avane pidichau .
41014047	arike nilkyunnavarill oruvan vall uri mahapuro hitante dasane vedti katu arruttu .
41014048	yeshu avarodu : oru kallallante nere ennapole ningall enne pidippan vallum vadiyumayi purrappedtu vanuvo ?
41014049	njan divasendaivalayattill upadeshichaukondu ningallodukoode irunu ; ningall enne pidichailla ; ekkilum tiruvejhyuttukallkyu nivratti varendatinu ingane sambhavikyunu enu parranju .
41014050	shikshaynmar ellavarum avane vidtu oadippoyi .
41014051	oru balaykyaran verrum shariirattinmell putappu putechaumkondu avane anugamichau ; avar avane pidichau .
41014052	avano putappu vidtu nnayi oadippoyi .
41014053	avar yeshuvine mahapurohitante adukyll kondu poyi . avante adukyll mahapurohitanmarum mooppnmarum shasrtimarum ellam vanu koodiyirunu .

42005012	avan oru padtnnattill irikyuboll kukshttham nirranjoru manukshayn yeshuvine kandu kavinnuviinnu : kattrave , ninakyu manassundekkill enne shuddhmakyuvan kajhyiyum ennu avanodu apekshichau .
42005013	yeshu kainiidti avane todtu : enikyu manassundu ; shuddhmakennu parranju . udane kukshttham avane vidtu marri .
42005014	avan avanodu : itu aarodum parrayarutu ; ennall poyi ninnettnne purohitannu kannichau , avakyru sakshayttinnayi moshe kalpichaatupole ninte shuddhii karannattinnullallvajhyipadu appriky ennu avanodukalpichau .
42005015	ennall avanekyurrichaullallvattrmanam adhikam parannu . vallare puruksharam vachanam kellkyendatinnum tangallude vayadhikallkyu sekhaym kidtendatinnum koodi vannu .
42005016	avano nijjarnadeshattu vangippoyi pratthrichaukondirunnu .
42005017	avan orudivasam upadeshikyuboll galiilayilum yehoodayyilumullallsakalagramattillninnum yerooshalemill ninnum vannpariishanmarum nayayashasrtimarum avide irunnirunnu . sekhaymakyuvan kattravinte shakati avanodukoode undayirunnu .
42005018	appoll chilaallukall pakshavatam pidichoru manukshayne kidakyyill eduttukandu vannu ; avane akattu konduchennu avante mumbill veppan shrmichau .
42005019	puruksharam hetuvayi avane akattu konduchelluvan vajhyi kannanjidtu puramell kayarri oadu niikyi avane kidakyyode naduvill yeshuvinte mumbill irrakyivechau .
42005020	avarude vishasam kandidtu . avan : manukshaya , ninte papangall mochichautannirikyunnu ennu parranju .
42005021	shasrtimarum pariishanmarum daivadookshannam parrayunnivan aar ? daivam oruvan allate papangalle mochippan kajhyiyunnavan aar ennu chintichau tudangi .
42005022	yeshu avarude chintakalle arrinju avarodu : ningall hradayattill chintikyunnatu entu ?
42005023	ninte papangall mochichautannirikyunnu ennu parrayunnato ejhyunnettu nadaky ennu parrayunnato eetakunnu elluppm ennu chodichau .
42005024	ekkilum bhoomiyill papangalle mochippan manukshayputrnnu adhikaram undu ennu ningall arriyendatinnu - avan pakshavatakyaranodu : ejhyunnettu kidaky eduttu viidtilekyu pokennu njan ninnodu parrayunnu ennu parranju .
42005025	udane avar kankke avan ejhyannettu , tan kidannkidaky eduttu daivatte mahatiikarichaumkondu viidtilekyu poyi .
42005026	ellavarum visyampoondu daivatte mahatppedutti bhayam nirranjvarayi : innu nam apoovaarkayaarngalle kandu ennu parranju .
42005027	atintesheksham avan purrappedtu , levi ennu perullellaru chukkkkaran chukksthlattu irikyunnatu kandu ; enne anugamiky ennu avanodu parranju .
42005028	avan sakalavum vidtu ejhyunnettu avane anugamichau .
42005029	levi tante viidtill avannu oru valiyvirunnu orukyi ; chukkkyarum mattum valiyoru puruksharam avarodukoode pantiyill irunnu .
42005030	pariishanmarum avarude shasrtimarum avante shikshaynmarodu : ningall chukkkyarodum papikallodumkoode tinnu kudikyunnatu entu ennu parranju pirrupirruttu .
42005031	yeshu avarodu : diinakyakyrllate sekhaymullallavakyru vaidaynekyondu aavashaymill ;
42005032	njan niitimanmare allpapikalle aretmanasantarattinnu villippan vannirikyunnatu ennu uttram parranju .
42005033	avar avanodu : yohannante shikshaynmar koodakyoode upavasichau pratthrnkajhyichau varunnu ; pariishanmarude shikshay nmarum angane tanne cheyaunnu ; ninte shikshaynmaro tinnukayum kudikyukayum cheyaunnu ennu parranju .
42005034	yeshu avarodu : mannavallan toyjmakyarodukoode ullallappoll avare upavasam cheyaippan kajhyiyumo ?
42005035	mannavallan avare vidtupiriyendunnkalam varum ; annu , akalattu , avar upavasikyum ennu parranju .
42005036	oru upamayum avarodu parranju : aarum kodittunniky ndam kiirriyeduttu pajhyayavasrtttodu chettru tunnumarrilla . tunniyalo putiyatu kiirrukayum putiyakandam pajhyayatinodu cheratirikyyum cheyaum .
42005037	aarum putuviinju pajhyayaturuttiyill pakarumarrilla , pakannarall putuviinju turuttiye pollichau ojhyukippokum ; turuttiyum nashichaupokum ;
42005038	putuviinju putiyturuttiyill aretpakannaru vekyendatu .
42005039	- pinne pajhyayatu kudichaidtu aarum putiyatu udane aagrhikyunnill ; pajhyayatu eerre nallatu ennu parrayum .
42006001	oru shabaattill avan villabhoomiyill koodi kadanu pokuboll avante shikshaynmar katir parrichau kaikondu tirummi tinu .
42006002	pariishanmarill chilar shabaattill vihitamallatttu ningall cheyaunnatu entu enu parranju .
42006003	yeshu avarodu : daviid tanikyum koodeyullallavakyrum vishannppoll cheyattu entu ? avan daivalayattill chenu purohitanmar matrmallate
42006004	aarum tinnarutatt kyappm vangi tinukayum koodeyullallavakyru kodukyyum cheyatu enullallatu ningall vayichaidtillayo enu uttram parranju .
42006005	manukshayputrn shabaattinum kattravu aakunu enu avarodu parranju .
42006006	mattoru shabaattill avan pallalliyill chenu upadeshikyu boll valakkai varandullellaru manukshayn avide undayirunu .
42006007	shasrtimarum pariishanmarum avane kuttm chumattuvan samgati kidtendatinu avan shabaattill sekhaymakyumo enu nokyikyondirunu .
42006008	avarude vicharam arrinjidtu avan varandkayaullallmanukshaynodu : ejhyunnettu naduvill nilky enu parranju ; avan ejhyunnettu ninu .
42006009	yeshu avarodu : njan ningallodu onu chodikydte : shabaattill nanmcheykayo tinmcheykayo jiivane rakshikyyo nashippikyyo eetu vihitam enu parranju .
42006010	avare ellam chuttum nokyiidtu amanukshaynodu : kai niidtukenu parranju . avan angane cheyatu avante kaikyu sekhaym vanu .
42006011	avaro bhrantu nirranjvarayi yeshuvine entu cheyeendu enu tammill aalochankajhyichau .
42006012	akalattu avan pratthrikyendatinu oru malayill chenu daivattodullallpratthrnayill ratri kajhyichau .
42006013	neram velluttppoll avan shikshaynmare adukye villichau , avarill pantrndupere tiranjeduttu , avakyru apposatlanmar enu per villichau .
42006014	avar aarennall : paretasenu avan per villichashimon , avante sahodaranayarentayas , yakyob yohannan , phiilippos , batterlomayi ,
42006015	mattayi , tomas , alphayiyude makanayyakyob erivukaranayshimon ,
42006016	yakyobinte sahodaranayyooda , redahiyayatiinnar i skyoyeeat yoodennivar tanne .
42006017	avan avarodukoode irrangi samabhoomiyill ninu ; avante shikshaynmarude koodtvum yehoodayyill elladattuninum yerooshalemillninum sor siidon ennsamudrtiirangallill ninum avante vachanam kellppanum rogashanti kidtuvanum vannbahupuruksharavum undayirunu .
42006018	ashuddhanmakyll badhichaavarum sekhaym prapichau .
42006019	shti avanillninu purrappedtu ellavareyum sekhaymakyukakondu puruksharam okyeyum avane toduvan shrmichau .
42006020	anantaram avan shikshaynmare nokyi parranjtu : daridrnmarayningall bhagayvanmar ; daivarajaym ningallkyullallatu .
42006021	ippoll vishakyunnavarayningall bhagayvanmar ; ningallkyu trapativarum ; ippoll karayunnavarayningall bhagayvanmar ; ningall chirikyum .
42006022	manukshayputrn nimittm manukshayr ningalle devkshichau bhrshtarakyi nindichau ningallude per vidakyu enu tallalluboll ningall bhagayvanmar .
42006023	anallill santokshichau tullalluvin ; ningallude prtiphalam sggrttill valiyatu ; avarude pitakynmar prvachakanmarodu angane tanne cheyatuvalela .
42006024	ennall sambannanmarayningallkyu ayeekashtam ; ningallude aashasam ningallkyu labhichaupoyalela .
42006025	ippoll trapatnmarayningallkyu ayeekashtam ; ningallkyu vishakyum . ippoll chirikyunnavarayningallkyu ayeekashtam ; ningall du : khichau karayum .
42006026	sakalmanukshayrum ningalle pukajhyttipprrayuboll ningallkyu ayeekashtam ; avarude pitakynmar kallallprvachakanmare angane cheyatuvalela .
42006027	ennall kellkyunnavarayningallodu njan parrayunnatu : ningallude shatrukylle senhippin ; ningalle pakekyunnavkyru gunnam cheyvin .
42006028	ningalle shapikyunnavare anugrhippin ; ningalle dukshikyu nnavakyru vendi pratthrippin .
42006029	ninne oru chekidtttu adikyunnavanu mattetum kannichau koduky ; ninte puteppu eduttu kallayunnavanu vasrtvum tadukyrutu .
42006030	ninnodu chodikyunneevanum koduky ; ninakyullallatu eduttukallayunnavanodu madakyi chodikyrutu .
42006031	manukshayr ningallkyu cheyeennam enu ningall ichchikyunnatu pole tanne avakyrum cheyvin .
42006032	ningalle senhikyunnavare senhichaall ningallkyu entu upacharam kidtum ? papikallum tangalle senhikyunnavare senhikyunuvalela .
42006033	ningallkyu nanmcheyaunnavakyru nanmcheyatall ningallkyu entu upacharam kidtum ? papikallum angane tanne cheyaunuvalela .
42006034	madakyi vangikyollallam enu ningall aashikyunnavakyru kadam koduttall ningallkyu entu kidtum ? papikallum kurrayate madakyi vangendatinu papikallkyu kadamkodukyunuvalela .
42006035	ningallo shatrukylle senhippin ; avakyru nanmcheyvin ; onum pakaram ichchikyate kadam koduppin ; ennall ningallude prtiphalam vallare aakum ; ningall atayunnatante makyll aakum ; avan nandikedtvarodum dushtanmarodum dayaluvalela .
42006036	angane ningallude pitavu manasslivullallavan aakunnatu pole ningallum manasslivullallavar aakuvin .
42006037	vidhikyrutu ; ennall ningalleyum vidhikyyilla . ; shikshekyu vidhikyrutu ; ennall ningallkyum shikshavidhi undakayilla ; viduvin ; ennall ningalleyum viduvikyum .
42006038	koduppin ; ennall ningallkyum kidtum ; amattri kulukyi kaviyunnoru nallallavu ningallude madiyill tarum ; ningall allakyunnallavinall ningallkyum allanu kidtum .
42006039	avan oru upamayum avarodu parranju : kurudanu kurudane vajhyikadtuvan kajhyiyumo ? iruvarum kujhyiyill viijhyukayillayo ?
42006040	shikshayn guruvinu miiteyalla , abhayasam tikanjvan ellam guruvineppole aakum .
42006041	ennall nii sahodarante kannile karadunokyukayum sntkannile koll vicharikyatirikyyum cheyaunnatu entu ?
42006042	allsntakannile koll nokyate : sahodara , nillu ; ninte kannile karadu eduttu kallayadte enu sahodaranodu parravan ninakyu engane kajhyiyum ? kapadabhtikyara , mubesntakannile koll eduttu kallaka ; ennall sahodarante kannile karadu eduttukallavan vedippayi kannumalela .
42006043	aakattphalam kayakyunnnallvrakshamilla ; nallaphalam kaykyunnaakatt vrakshavumilla .
42006044	eetu vrakshatteyum phalamkondu arriyam . mullallill ninu attippjhyam shekharikyukayum njerinjilillninu muntiringparrikyyum cheyaumarrillalela .
42006045	nallamanukshayn tante hradayattile nallnikshepattill ninu nallatu purrappeduvikyunu ; dushtan dokshamayatill ninu doksham purrappeduvikyunu . hradayattill nirranju kaviyunnatalelvay prsatavikyunnatu .
42006046	ningall enne kattrave , kattrave enu villikyyum njan parrayunnatu cheyaatirikyyum cheyaunnatu entu ?
42006047	ente adukyllvanu ente vachanam kedtu cheyaunnavan ellam innavanodu tulayn enu njan kannichau taram .
42006048	aajhyekyujhyichau parramell adisthanamidtu viidu panniyunnmanukshaynodu avan tulayn . vellallappokym undayidtu ojhyukyu viidtinodu adichau ; ennall atu nallavannm pannitirikykondu atu illakippoyilla .
42006049	kedtidtu cheyaattvano adisthanam koodate manninmell viidu pannitmanukshaynodu tulayn ojhyukydichudane atuviinnu ; aviidtinte viiyjchvaliyatumayirunu .
42007001	janam kellkye tante vachanam okyeyum parranjutiinnarsheksham avan kaphannarhoomill chenu .
42007002	avide oru shatadhipanu priiyanaydasan diinampidichau maripparrayirunu .
42007003	avan yeshuvinte vasatutkedtidtu , avan vanu tante dasane rakshikyendatinu avanodu apekshippan yehoodanmarude mooppnmare avante adukyll ayachau .
42007004	avar yeshuvinte adukyll vanu , avanodu talpayaarmayi apekshichau : nii atu cheyatukoduppan avan yogayn ;
42007005	avan nammude janatte senhikyunu ; njangallkyu oru pallalliyum tiipprichautannirikyunu enu parranju .
42007006	yeshu avarodukoode poyi , viidtinodu adupparrayappoll shatadhipan senhitanmare avante adukyll ayachau : kattrave , pryasappedenda ; nii ente purekykattu varuvan njan porattvan .
42007007	atukondu ninte adukyll varuvan njan yogayn enu enikyu tonniidtilla . oru vakyu kalpichaall ente balaykyaranu sekhaym varum .
42007008	njanum adhikarattinu kiijhypedt manukshayn ; ente kiijhyill padayallikall undu ; oruvanodu pokenu parranjall avan pokunu ; mattoruvanodu : varikenu parranjall avan varunu ; ente dasanodu itu cheykenu parranjall avan cheyaunu enu parrayichau .

42007010	shatadhipan parranjyachairunnavar viidtill madangivannappoll dasane sekhayttode kandu .
42007011	pittennall avan nayin ennpadtnnattilekyu pokuboll avante shikshaynmarum vallare puruksharavum koode poyi .
42007012	avan padtnnattinte vatilodu aduttppoll marichau poyoruttne purrattukondu varunu ; avan ammekyu eekajatanaymakan ; avallo vidhavaayirunu . padtnnattile oru valiypuruksharavum avallodukoode undayirunu .
42007013	avalle kandidtu kattravu manasslinju avallodu : karayendenu parranju ; avan aduttu chenu manchm todtu chumakyunnavar ninu .
42007014	balaykyarejhyunnelky enu njan ninnodu parrayunu enu avan parranju .
42007015	marichaavan ejhyunnettu irunu samsarippan tudangi ; avan avane ammekyu eelpichaukoduttu .
42007016	ellavakyrum bhayam pidichau : oru valiyprvachakan nammude idayill ejhyunnettirikyunu ; daivam tante janatte sandrshichairikyunu enuparranju daivatte mahatiikarichau .
42007017	avanekyurrichaullalli shruti yehoodayyill okyeyum chuttu mullallnadengum paranu .
42007018	itu okyeyum yohannante shikshaynmar avanodu arriyichau .
42007019	ennarre yohannan tante shikshaynmarill randupere villichau , kattravinte adukyll ayachau varuvanullallavan niiyo ? allnjangall mattoruttne kattirikyennamo enu parrayichau .
42007020	apurukshanmar avante adukyllvanu : varuvanullallavan niiyo ? alla , njangall mattoruttne kattirikyennamo enu chodippan yohannansapakan njangalle ninte adukyll ayachairikyunu enu parranju .
42007021	anajhyikayill avan vayadhikallum dandngallum duratmakyllum pidichapalareyum sekhaymakyukayum palkurudanmakyrum k nalkukayum cheyatidtu avarodu :
42007022	kurudar kannunu ; mudantar nadakyunu ; kukshttharogikall shuddhrayittiirunu ; chekidar kellkyunu ; marichaavar uyitterjhyunnelkyunu ; daridrnmarodu suvisheksham arriyikyunu enningane ningall kannukayum kellkyyum cheyaunnatu yohannane chenu arriyippin .
42007023	ennall ekkll idarrippokattvan bhagayvan enu uttram parranju .
42007024	yohannante dootanmar poyasheksham avan puruksharattodu yohannanekyurrichau parranjutudangiyatu : ningall entu kanman marubhoomiyilekyu poyi ? kattinall ulayunnoadayo ?
42007025	alla , entu kanman poyi ? madtrvavasrtm dharichamanukshay neyo ? modiyullallvasrtm dharichau sukhabhogikallayi nadakyunnavar rajadhanikallill areta .
42007026	alla , entu kanman poyi ? oru prvachakaneyo ? ate , prvachakanilum mikachaavane tanne enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42007027	" njan ente dootane ninakyu mumbayi ayakyunu ; avan ninte mumbill ninakyu vajhyi orukyum " enu ejhyutiyirikyu nnatu avanekyurrichaakunu .
42007028	srtiikallill ninu janichaavarill yohannanekyall valiyavan aarumilla ; daivarajayttill eettvum cherriyavano avanilum valiyavan enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42007029	- ennall janam okyeyum chukkkyarum kedtidtu yohannante sanam eetttinall daivatte niitiikarichau .
42007030	ekkilum pariishanmarum nayayashasrtimarum avanall sanam eelkyate daivattinte aalochantangallkyu vrathavakyikyllanju .
42007031	- i talamurrayile manukshayre etinodu upamikyendu ? avar eetinodu tulaym ?
42007032	njangall ningallkyayi kujhyalooti , ningall nrattm cheyatilla ; njangall ningallkyayi vilapam padi , ningall karanjillenu chantasthlattu irunu aneyanaym villichau parrayunnkudtikallodu avar tulayr .
42007033	yohannan sapakan appm tinnateyum viinjukudikyteyum vannirikyunu ; avannu bhootam undu enu ningall parrayunu .
42007034	manukshayputrn tinum kudichaum konduvannirikyunu ; tinniyum kudiyanumaymanukshayn chukkkyarudeyum papikalludeyum senhitan enu ningall parrayunu .
42007035	njanamo tante ellamakyllalum niitiikarikyppedtirikyunu .
42007036	pariishanmarill oruttn tannodukoode bhakshannam kajhyippan avane kshannichau ; avan pariishante viidtill chenu bhakshannttinnirunu .
42007037	apadtnnattile papiyayoru srtii , avan pariishante viidtill bhakshannattinnirikyunnatu arrinju oru venkkll bharanni parimalltailam konduvanu .
42007038	purrakill avante kalkyll karanjukondu ninu kannuniirkondu avante kall nanechautudangi ; talamudi kondu tudechau kall chumbichau tailam pooshi .
42007039	avane kshannichapariishan atu kandidtu : ivan prvachakan aayirunu ekkill , tanne todunnsrttii aarenum enganeyullallavall enum arriyumayirunu ; avall papiyalellenu ullallill parranju .
42007040	shimone , ninnodu onu parravan undu enu yeshu parranjtinu : guro parranjalum enu avan parranju .
42007041	kadam kodukyunnoruttnu randu kadakyar undayirunu ; oruttn anjoorru vellallikyashum mattvan ambatu vellallikyashum koduppanundayirunu .
42007042	viidtuvan avakyru vakayillaykayall avan iruvakyrum illechaukoduttu ; ennall avarill aar avane adhikam senhikyum ?
42007043	adhikam illechaukidtiyavan enu njan uhikyunu enu shimon parranju . avan avanodu : nii vidhichaatu shari enu parranju .
42007044	srtiiyude neretirinju shimonodu parranjtu : i srtiiye kannunuvo ? njan ninte viidtill vanu , nii ente kalinu vellallam tannilla ; ivallo kannuniirkondu kallnanechau talamudikondu tudechau .
42007045	nii enikyu chumbanam tannilla ; ivallo njan akattu vannatumutall idavidate ente kall chumbichau .
42007046	nii ente talayill tailam pooshiyilla ; ivallo parimalltailam kondu ente kall pooshi .
42007047	aakayall ivallude anekamaypapangall mochichairikyunu enu njan ninnodu parrayunu ; avall vallare senhichauvalela ; alpam mochichaukidtiyavan alpam senhikyunu .
42007048	pinne avan avallodu : ninte papangall mochichau tannirikyunu enu parranju .
42007049	avanodukoode pantiyill irunnavar : papamochanavum kodukyunnivan aar enu tammill parranjutudangi .
42007050	avano srtiyodu : ninte vishasam ninne rakshichairikyunu samadhanattode pokenu parranju .
42008001	anantaram avan daivarajaym prsamgichaum suvishekshichaum kondu padtnnamtorrum sanchrichau .
42008002	avanodukoode pantiruvarum avan duratmakylleyum vayadhikalleyum niikyi sekhaym varuttiychilsrtiikallum eejhyubhootangall vidtupoymagdalakyaratti marriyayum
42008003	herodavinte kayaarvicharakanaykoosayude bhayaaar yohannayum shooshannayum tangallude vasatuvakakondu avakyur shushrookshcheyatuponnmattu palsrtiikallum undayirunu .
42008004	pinne valiyoru puruksharavum oaro padtnnattillninu avante adukyll vannavarum orumichau koodiyappoll avan upamayayi parranjtu : vitekyunnavan vittu viteppan purrappedtu .
42008005	vitekyuboll chilatu vajhyiyarike viinnidtu chavidtippokayum aakashattile parravajati atine tinu kallakayum cheyatu .
42008006	mattuchilatu parramell viinnu mullechau nanavillaykayall unnangippoyi .
42008007	mattuchilatu mullallinidayill viinnu ; mullallumkoode mullechau atine njerukyikyllanju .
42008008	mattuchilatu nallnilattu viinnu mullechau noorrumeni phalam koduttu . itu parranjidtu : kellppan cheviyullallavan kellkydte enu villichau parranju .
42008009	avante shikshaynmar avanodu i upamentu enu chodichaatinu avan parranjtu :
42008010	daivarajayttinte mammrngalle arrivan ningallkyu varam labhichairikyunu ; shekshamullallavakyerkandidtum kannatirippanum , kedtidtum grhikyatirippanum upamakallilareta .
42008011	upamayude porullo : vittu daivavachanam ;
42008012	vajhyiyarikeyullallavar kellkyunnavar ekkilum avar vishsichau rakshikyppedatirippan pishachu vanu avarude hradayangallillninu vachanam eduttu kallayunu .
42008013	parramelullallavaro kellkyuboll vachanam santokshattode kaikyollallunnavar ekkilum avakyru verill ; avar talkyalam vishsikyyum pariikshasamyattu pinvangippokayum cheyaunu .
42008014	mullallinnidayill viinnato kellkyunnavar ekkilum poyi chintakallalum dhanattalum samsarabhogangallalum njerungi poonnrmayi phalam kodukyattvarareta .
42008015	nallmannilullallato vachanam kedtu gunnamullallnallhradayattill samgrhichau kshamayode phalam kodukyunnavar tanne .
42008016	villakyu kolluttiidtu aarum atine patrmkondu moodukayo kadtilkiijhye vekyyo cheyaate akattu varunnavar vellichaam kannendatinu tandinmell aretvekyunnatu .
42008017	vellippedate gooddhamayatu onumilla ; prsiddhmayi vellichaattu varate marravayirikyunnatum onumilla .
42008018	aakayall ningall engane kellkyunu enu sookshichau kollvin . ullallavanu kidtum ; illattvanodo undu enu tonunnatumkoode eduttukallayum .
42008019	avante ammyum sahodaranmarum avante adukyll vanu , puruksharam nimittm avanodu aduppan kajhyinjilla .
42008020	ninte ammyum sahodaranmarum ninne kanman ichchichau kondu purrattunilkyunu enu chilar avanodu arriyichau .
42008021	avarodu avan : ente ammyum sahodaranmarum daivvachanamkedtu cheyaunnavararetenu uttram parranju .
42008022	orudivasam avan shikshaynmarumayi padakill kayarri ; nam tadakattinte akyre pokenu avarodu parranju .
42008023	avar niikyi oaduboll avan urrangippoyi . tadakattill oru chujhyalikyattu undayi padakill vellallam nirranjidtu
42008024	avar prannabhayattilayi adukye chenu : natha , natha , njangall nashichaupokunu enu parranju avane unnattri ; avan ejhyunnettu kattineyum vellallattinte kopatteyum shasichau ; avamanur shantatundayi .
42008025	pinne avarodu ningallude vishasam evide enu parranju ; avaro bhayappedtu : ivan aar ? avan kattinodum vellallattodum kalpikyyum avanusarikyyum cheyaunu enu tammill parranju ayaarppedtu .
42008026	avar galiilekyu nereyullallgerasenay deshattu annanju .
42008027	avan karekyu irrangiyappoll bahukalamayi bhootangall badhicheearu manukshayn padtnnattillninu vanu etirpedtu : avan bahukalamayi vasrtm dharikyateyum viidtill pakyrateyum shavakyllarrakallill aretaayirunu .
42008028	avan yeshuvine kandidtu nilavillichau avane namaskyrichau : yeshuve , mahonnatanaydaivattinte putra , enikyum ninakyum tammill entu ? enne upadrvikyrute enu njan apekshikyunu enu urrakye parranju .
42008029	avan ashuddhatmavinodu amanukshayne vidtupoku van kalpichairunu . atu vallare kalamayi avane badhichairunu ; avane changalayum vilangum idtu bandichau sookshichairunnidtum avan bandnangalle takakyryum bhootam avane kadukallilekyu oadikyyum cheyaum .
42008030	yeshu avanodu : ninte per entu enu chodichau . anekam bhootangall avane badhichairunnatukondu ; legeyan enu avan parranju .
42008031	patallattilekyu pokuvan kalpikyrutu enu avavanodu apekshichau .
42008032	avide malayill valiyoru pannikyoodtm menjukondirunu . avayill kadappan anuvadam tarennam enu avanodu apekshichau ; avan anuvadam koduttu .
42008033	bhootangall amanukshayne vidtu pannikallill kadannappoll koodtm kaduntookyttoode tadakattilekyu panju viippur mudti chattu .
42008034	i sambhavichaatu meykyunnavar kandidtu oadippoyi padtnnattilum nadtilum arriyichau .
42008035	sambhavichaatu kanman avar purrappedtu yeshuvinte adukyll vanu , bhootangall vidtupoymanukshayn vasrtm dharichaum subodham poondum yeshuvinte kalkyll irikyunnatu kandu bhayappedtu .
42008036	bhootagrsatnu sekhaym vannatu engane enu kandavar avarodu arriyichau .
42008037	gerasenaydeshattile janasamooham ellam bhayaparavasharayi tangalle vidtupokennam enu avanodu apekshichau ; angane avar padakukayarri madangipponu .
42008038	bhootangall vidtupoyaall avanodukoode irippan anuvadam chodichau .
42008039	atinu avan : nii viidtill madangicheenu daivam ninakyu cheyattu okyeyum arriyiky enu parranju avane ayachau . avan poyi yeshu tanikyu cheyattu okyeyum padtnnattill elladavum arriyichau .
42008040	yeshu madangivannappoll puruksharam avane santokshttode kaikyondu ; avar ellavarum avannayidtu kattirikyyayirunu .
42008041	appoll pallalliprmanniyayyayiirros enu perullellaru manukshayn vanu yeshuvinte kalkyll viinnu .
42008042	avanu eekadesham pantrndu vayassullalleekajatayayoru makall undayirunu ; avall maripparrayatukondu tante viidtill varennam enu avanodu apekshichau ; avan pokuboll puruksharam avane tikyikyondirunu .
42008043	anu pantrndu samvramayi rtasravamullallavallum mutall ellam vaidaynmakyru koduttidtum aaralum sekhaym varuttuvan kajhyiyanjvallumayullellaru
42008044	srtii purrakill aduttuchenu avante vasrtttinte tongall todtu udane avallude rtasrvam ninupoyi .
42008045	enne todttu aar enu yeshu chodichau . ellavarum njanalla , njanallenu parranjppoll : guro puruksharam ninne tikyittirakyunu enu paretasum koodeyullallavarum parranju .
42008046	yeshuvo : orall enne todtu ; ekkllninu shtipurrppedttu njan arrinju enu parranju .
42008047	tan marranjirikyunnillenu srtii kandu virrechaumkondu vanu avante mumbill viinnu , avane todt samgatiyum tallkshannam sekhaymayatum sakalajanavum kellkye arriyichau .
42008048	avan avallodu : makalle , ninte vishasam ninne rakshichairikyunu ; samadhanattode pokenu parranju .
42008049	avan samsarichaukondirikyuboll tanne pallalliprmanni yude orall vanu : ninte makall marichaupoyi ; guruvine pryasappeduttendenu parranju .
42008050	yeshu atukedtarre : bhayappedenda , vishsikymatrm cheyka ; ennall avall rakshappedum enu avanodu uttram parranju .
42008051	viidtill ettiyarre paretas , yohannan , yakyob ennavareyum balayude appneyum ammyeyum allate aareyum avan tannodukoode akattu varuvan sammtichailla .
42008052	ellavarum avallecholli karakayum murrayidukayum cheyau boll : karayenda , avall marichailla , urrangunnaretenu avan parranju .
42008053	avaro avall marichaupoyi enu arrikakondu avane parihasichau .
42008054	ennall avan avallude kaikyu pidichau ; bale , ejhyunnelky enu avallodu urrakye parranju .
42008055	avallude aatmavu madangivanu , avall udane ejhyunnettu ; avallkyu bhakshannam koduppan avan kalpichau .
42008056	avallude ammyappnmar visyichau . sambhavichaatu aarodum parrayarutu enu avan avarodu kalpichau .
42009001	avan pantiruvare adukyll villichau , sakalabhootangallude melum vayadhikalle sekhaymakyuvanum avakyru shtiyum adhikaravum koduttu ;
42009002	daivarajaym prsamgippanum rogikallkyu sekhaym varuttuvanum avare ayachau parranjtu :
42009003	vajhyikyu vadiyum pokynnavum appvum pannavum onum edukyrutu ; randu uduppum arutu .
42009004	ningall eetu viidtill ekkilum chennall avidam vidtupokum vare avidettnne papprin .
42009005	aarekkilum ningalle kaikyollallatirunnall apadtnnam vidtu avarude nere sakshayttinnayi ningallude kalill ninu podi tadtikyllavin .
42009006	avar purrappedtu engum suvishekshichaum rogikalle sekhaymakyiyumkondu urtorrum sanchrichau .
42009007	sambhavikyunnatu ellam idaprbhuvayherodavu kedtu .
42009008	yohannan marichaavarillninu uyitterjhyunnettu enu chilarum eeliiyavu prtaykshanayi enu chilarum puratanprvachakanmarill oruttn uyitterjhyunnettu enu mattu chilarum parrakakondu herodavu chanchlichau :
42009009	yohannane tan shirachedam cheyatu ; ennall njan inganeyullallatu kellkyunnivan aar enu parranju avane kanman shrmichau .
42009010	apposatlanmar madangivannidtu tangall cheyattu okyeyum avanodu arriyichau . avan avare koodtikyondu betsayidennpadtnnattilekyu tanichau vangippoyi .
42009011	atu puruksharam arrinju avane pintudanur . avan avare kaikyondu daivarajayttekyurrichau avarodu samsarikyyum rogashantivendiyavare sekhaymakyukayum cheyatu .
42009012	pakall kajhyivarrayappoll pantiruvar aduttuvanu avanodu : ivide nam marubhoomiyill aayirikykondu puruksharam chuttumullallurukallilum kudikallilum poyi ratri pappranum aaharam vanguvanum vendi avare parranjyakyennam enu parranju .
42009013	avan avarodu : ningall tanne avakyru bhakshippan koduppin enu parranjtinu : anchppvum randumiinum allate adhikam njangallude pakyll illa ; njangall poyi i sakalajanattinum vendi bhojayngall kollellannamo enu avar parranju .
42009014	eekadesham ayaayiram purukshanmar undayirunu . pinne avan tante shikshaynmarodu : avare ambatuviitam panti pantiyayi iruttuvin enu parranju
42009015	avar angane cheyatu ellavareyum irutti .
42009016	avan anchu appvum randumiinum eduttukondu sggrttekyu nokyi avaye anugrhichau nurrukyi puruksharattinu villambuvan shikshaynmarude kayaill koduttu .
42009017	ellavarum tinu trapatrayi , shekshichakakshannam pantrndu kodt eduttu .
42009018	avan tanichau pratthrichaukondirikyuboll shikshaynmar koode undayirunu ; avan avarodu : puruksharam enne aarenu parrayunu enu chodichau .
42009019	yohannansapakan enum chilar eeliiyavu enum mattu chilar puratanaprvachakanmarill oruttn uyitterjhyunnettu enum parrayunu enu avar uttram parranju .
42009020	avan avarodu : ennall ningall enne aarenu parrayunu enu chodichaatinu : esignaidavattinte krisatu enu paretas uttram parranju .
42009021	itu aarodum parrayarutenu avan avarodu amachaaaryayi kalpichau .
42009022	manukshayputrn palatum sahikyyum mooppnmar mahapuro hitanmar shasrtikall ennivar avane tallallikyllanju kollukayum avan moonnamnall uyitterjhyunnelkyyum vennam enu parranju .
42009023	pinne avan ellavarodum parranjtu : enne anugamippan oruttn ichchichaall avan tannettan nikshedhichau nalltorrum tante kroosh eduttumkondu enne anugamikydte .
42009024	aarekkilum tante jiivane rakshippan ichchichaall atine kallayum ; ente nimittm aarekkilum tante jiivane kallanjalo atine rakshikyum .
42009025	oru manukshayn savaarlokavum nediidtu tannettan nashtamakyikyllakayo chetam varuttukayo cheyatall avanu entu pryojanam ?
42009026	aarekkilum enneyum ente vachanangalleyum kurrichau nannichaall avanekyurrichau manukshayputrn tanteyum pitavinteyum vishuddhdootanmarudeyum mahatttill varuboll nannikyum .
42009027	ennall daivarajaym kannuvollam marannam aasdikyattvar chilar ivide nilkyunnavarill undu sataym enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42009028	i vakyukall parranjidtu eekadesham edtunall kajhyinjppoll avan paretasineyum yohannaneyum yakyobineyum koodtikondu pratthrippan malayill kayarrippoyi .
42009029	avan pratthrikyuboll mukhattinte bhavam marri , uduppu minnunnvellallayayum tiinur .
42009030	randu purukshanmar avanodu sambhakshichau ; mosheyum eeliiyavum tanne .
42009031	avar tejassill prtayksharayi avan yerooshalemill prapippanullallniyarrrannattekyurrichau samsarichau .
42009032	paretasum koodeyullallavarum urrakyttall bharappedtirunu ; unnannarsheksham avante tejassineyum avanodukoode nilkyunnrandu purukshanmareyum kandu .
42009033	avar avane vidtupiriyuboll paretas yeshuvinodu : guro , nam ivide iriukyunnatu nallatu ; njangall moonu kudill undakydte , onu ninakyum onu moshekyum onu eeliiyavinum enu tan parrayunnatu innatu enu arriyate parranju .
42009034	itu parrayuboll orumegham vanu avatudemell nijhyalidtu . avar meghattill aayappoll pedichau .
42009035	meghattillninu : ivan ente priyaputrn , ivanu chevikoduppin enu oru shabdam undayi .
42009036	shabdam undaynerattu yeshuvine taniye kandu ; avar kandatu onum anallukallill aarodum arriyikyate menamayirunu .
42009037	pittennall avar malayillninu irrangivannappoll bahu puruksharam avane etirettu .
42009038	koodtttillninu orall nilavillichau : guro , ente makane kadakshikyennamenu njan ninnodu apekshikyunu ; avan enikyu eekajatan aakunu .
42009039	oratmavu avane pidichaidtu avan podunnanave nilvillikyunu ; atu avane nurechau pideppikyunu ; pinne avane njerichaidtu pryasattode vidtumarrunu .
42009040	atine purrattakyuvan ninte shikshaynmarodu apekshichau ekkilum avakyru kajhyinjillenu parranju
42009041	atinu yeshu : avishasavum kodtvumullalltalamurraye , etrttollam njan ningallodukoode irunu ningalle sahikyum ? ninte makane ivide konduvarikenu uttram parranju ;
42009042	avan varuboll tanne bhootam avane tallalliyidtu pideppichau . yeshu ashuddhatmavine shasichau balane sekhaymakyi , appne eelpichau .
42009043	ellavarum daivattinte mahimayikkll visyichau . yeshu cheyaunnatill okyeyum ellavarum ayaaappeduboll avan tante shikshaynmarodu :
42009044	ningall i vakyu shrddhichau kedtukollvin : manukshayputrn manukshayrude kayaill eelpikyppeduvan pokunu enu parranju .
42009045	avakyu avar grhichailla ; atu tirichaarriyatavannm avakyru marranjirunu ; avakyu sambandichau avanodu chodippan avar shakkichau .
42009046	avarillvechau aar valiyavan enu oru vadam avarude idayill nadanu .
42009047	yeshu avarude hradayavicharam kandu oru shishuvine eduttu arike nirrutti :
42009048	i shishuvine ente namattill aarekkilum kaikyo ndall enne kaikyollallunu ; enne kaikyollallunnvano enne ayachaavane kaikyollallunu ; ningallellvarilum cherriyavanayavan aret valiyavanakum enu avarodu parranju .
42009049	natha , oruttn ninte namattill bhootangalle purrattakyunnatu njangall kandu ; njangallodukoode ninne anugamikyaykayall avane virodhichau enu yohannan parranjtinu
42009050	yeshu avanodu : virodhikyrutu ; ningallkyu prtikoolmallattvan ningallkyu anukoolamalelenu parranju .
42009051	avante aarohannattinullallkalam tikayarrayappoll , avan yerooshalemilekyu yatryavan manassu urrappichau tanikyu mumbayi dootanmare ayachau .
42009052	avar poyi avannayi vadtmkoodtendatinu shamayaaarkyarude oru gramattill chenu .
42009053	ennall avan yerooshalemilekyu pokuvan bhavichairi kyyall avar avane kaikyondillal .
42009054	atu avante shikshaynmarayyakyobum yohannanum kandidtu : kattrave , ( eeliiyavu cheyattupole ) aakashattuninu tii irrangi avare nashippippan njangall parrayunnatu ninakyu sammtamo enu chodichau .
42009055	avan tirinju avare shasichau : ( ningall eetu aatmavinu adhiinar ennu ningall arriyunnilla ;
42009056	manukshayputrn manukshayrude prannangalle nashippippanallrakshippanaretvannatu enu parranju . ) avar verroru gramattilekyu poyi .
42009057	avar vajhyipokuboll oruttn avanodu : nii evide poyalum njan ninne anugamikyam enu parranju .
42009058	yeshu avanodu kurrunarikallkyu kujhyiyum aakashattile parravajatikyu koodum undu ; manukshayputrnno talachayippan sthlamillenu parranju .
42009059	verroruttnodu : enne anugamiky enu parranjarre avan : njan mube poyi ente appne kujhyichaiduvan anuvadam tarennam enu parranju .
42009060	avan avane : marichaavar tangallude marichaavare kujhyichaidadte : niiyo poyi daivarajaym arriyiky enu parranju .
42009061	mattoruttn : kattrave , njan ninne anugamikyam ; aadaym ente viidtilullallavarodu yatr parravan anuvadam tarennam enu parranju .
42009062	yeshu avanodu : kalappekyu kai vechaasheksham purrakodtu nokyunnavan aarum daivarajayttinu kollallakunnavanallenu parranju .
42010001	anantaram kattravu verre ejhyupatu pere niyamichau , tan chelluvanullalloaro padtnnattilekyum sthlattile kyum avare tanikyumumbayi irandayi ayachau , avarodu parranjtu :
42010002	koyttu vallare undu sataym ; velakyaro churukym ; aakayall koyttinte yajamananodu tante koyttinu velakyare ayakyendatinu apekshippin .
42010003	pokuvin ; chennakyllude naduvill kunjadukalleppole njan ningalle ayakyunu .
42010004	sanchiyum pokynnavum cherippum edukyrutu ; vajhyiyill vechau aareyu vandnam cheykayumarutu ;
42010005	eetu viidtill ekkilum chennall : i viidtinu samadhanam enu aadaym parravin .
42010006	avide oru samadhanaputrn undekkill ningallude samadhanam avanmell vasikyum ; ilelnu varikilo ningallilekyu madangipporum .
42010007	avar tarunnatu tinum kudichaumkondu aviidtilltanne papprin ; velakyaran tante koolikyu yogaynalela ; viidtillninu viidtilekyu marrippokarutu .
42010008	eetu padtnnattilekkilum chennall avar ningalle kai kyollallunu ekkill ningallude mumbill vekyunnatu bhakshippin .
42010009	atile rogikalle sekhaymakyi , daivarajaym ningallkyu samiipichau vannirikyunu enu avarodu parravin .
42010010	eetu padtnnattilekkilum chennall avar ningalle kaikyollallunnilelkkill atinte terukyllillpoyi :
42010011	ningallude padtnnattillninu njangallude kalinu pattiypodiyum njangall ningallkyu kudanjechau pokunu ; ennall daivarajaym samiipichau vannirikyunu enu arrinjukollvin enu parravin .
42010012	apadtnnattekyall sodomaykyru anajhyikayill sahikyavatavum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42010013	korasiine , ninakyu ayeekashtam ! betsayide , ninakyu ayeekashtam ! ningallill nadannviiyaarprvrattikall sorilum siidonilum nadannirunu ekkill avar pandutanne radtilum venniirrilum irunu manasantarappedumayirunu .
42010014	ennall nayayavidhiyill ningallekyall sorinum siidonum sahikyavatakum .
42010015	niiyo kaphannarhoome , sggrttollam uyannaririkyumo ? nii patallattollam tannupokum .
42010016	ningallude vakyu kellkyunnavan ente vakyu kellkyunu ; ningalle tallallunnavan enne tallallunu ; enne tallallunnavan enne ayachaavane tallallunu .
42010017	aejhyupatuper santokshattode madangivanu : kattrave ninte namattill bhootangallum njangallkyu kiijhyadangunu enu parranju ;
42010018	avan avarodu : sattan minnallpole aakashattu ninu viijhyunnatu njan kandu .
42010019	pambukalleyum tellukalleyum shatruvinte sakalabalatteyum chavidtuvan njan ningallkyu adhikaram tarunu ; onum ningallkyu oru dokshavum varuttukayum illal .
42010020	ekkilum bhootangall ningallkyu kijhyadangunnatilall , ningallude per sggrttill ejhyutiyirikyunnatilaretsantokshippin .
42010021	anajhyikayill avan parishuddhatmavill aanandichau parranjtu : pitave , sggrttinum bhoomikyum kattravayu llellave , nii ivnjanikallkyum vivekikallkyum marrechau shishukyllkyu vellippeduttiyatu kondu njan ninne vajhyttunu . ate , pitave , ingane ninakyu prsadam tonniyalela .
42010022	ente pitavu sakalavum ekkll bharamelpichairikyunu . putrn innavan enu pitavallate aarum arriyunnilla ; pitavu innavan enu putrnum putrn vellippedutti kyoduppan ichchikyunnavanum allate aarum arriyunnatumilla .
42010023	pinne shikshaynmarude nere tirinju : ningall kannunntine kannunnkannu bhagaymullallatu .
42010024	ningall kannunnatine kanman eerriyprvachakanmarum rajakynmarum ichchichaidtum kandilla ; ningall kellkyunnatine kellppan ichchichaidtum kedtillenu njan ningallodu prteykam parranju .
42010025	anantaram oru nayayashasrti ejhyunnettu : guro , njan nitayjiivanu avakashi aayittiiruvan entu cheyeennam enu avane pariikshichau chodichau .
42010026	avan avanodu : nayayaprmannattill entu ejhyutiyirikyunu ; nii engane vayikyunu enu chodichaatinu avan :
42010027	ninte daivamaykattravine nii poonnrhradayattodum poonnratmavodum poonnrshtiyodum poonnrmanassodum koode senhikyennam enum koodtukarane ninneppole tanne senhikyennam enum tanne enu uttram parranju .
42010028	avan avarodu : nii parranj uttram shari ; angane cheyka ; ennall nii jiivikyum enu parranju .
42010029	avan tannettan niitiikarippan ichchichaidtu yeshuvinodu : ente koodtukaran aar enu chodichaatinu yeshu uttram parranjtu :
42010030	oru manukshayn yerooshalemillninu yeriihovilekyu pokuboll kallallanmarude kayaill akappedtu ; avar avane vasrtm ajhyichau murrivelpichau addhrprannanayi vidtechaupoyi .
42010031	avajhyiyayi yadryoru purohitan vanu avane kandidtu marri kadanupoyi .
42010032	angane tanne oru levaynum asthlattill etti avane kandidtu marri kadanupoyi .
42010033	oru shamayaarkyarano vajhyipokayill avante adukyll etti avane kandidtu manasslinju arike chenu
42010034	ennyum viinjum pakanur avante murrivukalle kedti avane tante vahanattill kayatti vajhyiyambalattilekyu kondupoyi rakshcheyatu .
42010035	pittennall avan purrappeduboll randuvellallikyash eduttu vajhyiyambalakyaranu koduttu : ivane rakshacheyee nnam ; adhikam vallatum chilavidtall njan madangi varuboll tanu kollallam enu avanodu parranju .
42010036	kallallanmarude kayaill akappedtvanu i moovarill eevan koodtukaranayi ttiinur enu ninakyu tonunu ) ?
42010037	avanodu karunnkannichaavan enu avan parranju . yeshu avanodu niiyum poyi angane tanne cheykenu parranju .
42010038	pinne avar yatr pokayill avan oru gramattill etti ; mattrenu perullalloru srtii avane viidtill kaikyondu .
42010039	avallkyu marriyennoru sahodari undayirunu . avall kattravinte kalkyll irunu avante vachanam kedtukondirunu .
42010040	mattryo vallare shushrookshayall kujhyangiidtu adukye vanu : kattrave , ente sahodari shushrookshekyu enne tanichau vidtirikyunnatill ninakyu vicharamillayo ? enne sahayi ppan avallodu kalpichaalum enu parranju .
42010041	kattravu avallodu : mattrye , mattrye , nii palatinecheealli vicharappedtum kalangiyumirikyunu .
42010042	ennall alpame vendu ; alla , onu mati . marriynallamsham tiranjeduttirikyunu ; atu aarum avallodu apaharikyyumilla .
42011001	avan oru sthlattu pratthrichaukondirunu ; tiinnarsheksham shikshaynmarill oruttn avanodu : kattave , yohannan tante shikshaynmare patthippichaatupole njangalleyum pratthrippan patthippikyenname enu parranju .
42011002	avan avaroduparranjtu : ningall pratthrikyuboll cholelndiyatu : ( sggrsthnaynjangallude ) pitave , ninte namam vishuddhiikarikyppedenname ; ninte rajaym varenname ; ( ninte ishtam sggrttileppole bhoomiyilum aakenname ; )
42011003	njangallkyu aavashaymullallaaharam dinamprti tarenname .

42011005	pinne avan avarodu parranjtu : ningallill aakyerkkilum oru senhitan undu ennirikydte ; avan addhrratrikyu avante adukyll chenu : senhita , enikyu moonu appm vayptarennam ;
42011006	ente oru senhitan vajhyiyatryill entodukyll vanu ; avanu villambikyoduppan ente pakyll eetum illenu avanodu parranjall :
42011007	enne pryasappeduttrutu ; kataku adechairikyunu ; paitangallum ennodukoode kidakyunu ; ejhyunnettu taruvan enikyu kajhyikayillenu akattuninu uttram parranjalum
42011008	avan senhitanakakondu ejhyunnettu avanu kodukyyilelkkilum avan lkoodate mudtikynimittm ejhyunnettu avanu vendunnedattollam kodukyum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42011009	yachippin , ennall ningallkyu kidtum ; anevkshippin ennall ningall kandettum ; mudtuvin ennall ningallkyu turrekyum .
42011010	yachikyunnavanu eevanum labhikyunu ; anevkshikyunnavan kandettunu ; mudtunnavanu turrakyum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42011011	ennall ningallill oru appnodu makan appm chodichaall avanu kallu kodukyumo ? allmiin chodichaall miininu pakaram pambine kodukyumo ?
42011012	mudt chodichaall telline kodukyumo ?

42011025	atu adichauvariyum alakkrichaum kannunu .

42013002	atinu avan uttram parranjtu : agaliilakyar itu anubhavikyyall ellgaliilakyarilum papikall aayirunu enu ningallkyu tonunuvo ?
42013003	allalla , manasantarappedanjall ningall ellavarum angane tanne nashichau pokum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42013004	alla , shiilohamile gopuram viinnu marichau poyapatinedtu per yerooshalemill pakyrunnsakalamanukshayrilum kuttkyar aayirunu enu tonunuvo ?
42013005	allalla , manasantarappedanjall ningall ellavarum anganetanne nashichau pokum enu njan ningallodu parrayunu .
42013006	avan oru upamayum parranju : oruttnu tante muntiri ttodtttill nadtirunnoru attivraksham undayirunu ; avan atill phalam tiranjuvanu kandilltanum .
42013007	avan todtkyaranodu : njan ippoll moonu samvrmayi i attiyill phalam tiranjuvarunu kannunnilltanum ; atine vedtikyllakatu nilatte nikshphalamkyunnatu entinu enu parranju .

42013009	melall kayicheekkilo - ilelkkill vedtikyllayam enu uttram parranju .
42013010	oru shabaattill avan pallalliyill upadeshichau kondirunu .
42013011	avide patinedtu samvramayi oru rogatmavu badhichaidtu odtum nivaruvan kajhyiyate kooniyayoru srtii undayirunu .
42013012	yeshu avalle kandu adukye villichau : srtiiye , ninte rogabandnam ajhyinjirikyunu enu parranju avallude mell kaivechau .
42013013	avall kshannattill nivanur daivatte mahatppedutti .
42013014	yeshu shabaattill sekhaymakyiyatukondu pallalliprmanni niirasappedtu puruksharattodu : velacheyvan aarrudivasamundalel ; atinnakam vanu sekhaym varutti chaukollvin ; shabaattill arutu enu parranju .
42013015	kattravu avanodu : kapadabhatikyare , ningallill oruttn shabaattill tante kallayeyo kajhyutayeyo todtiyill ninu ajhyichau kondupoyi vellallam kudippikyunnillayo ?

43003029	mannavadti ullallavan mannavallan aakunu ; mannavallante senhitano ninu mannavallante sram kedtidtu atayntam santokshikyunu : i ente santoksham poottriyayirikyunu .
43003030	avan vallarennam njano kurrayennam enu uttram parranju .

43003032	avante sakshaym aarum esignaikakyollallunnilla .

43004001	yeshu yohannanekyall adhikam shikshaynmare chettru sanam kajhyippikyunnu enu pariishanmar kedtu enu kattravu arrinjppoll -
43004002	shikshaynmar allate , yeshutanne sanam kajhyippichai llatanum -
43004003	avan yehoodaydesham vidtu pinneyum galiilekyu yatryayi .
43004004	avan shamayaaryillkoodi kadanupokendivanu .

43004006	avide yakyobinte urravu undayirunu . yeshu vajhyinadannu kshiinnichaidtu urravinnarike irunu ; appoll eekadesham aarrammannineram aayirunu .

43004010	atinu yeshu : nii daivattinte danavum ninnodu kudippan chodikyunnavan aarenum arrinju ekkill nii avanodu chodikyyum avan jiivanullallvellallam ninakyu tarikayum cheyaumayirunu enu uttram parranju .
43004011	srtii avanodu yajamanane , ninakyu koruvan patrm illalela ; kinnarru aajhyamullallatakunu ; pinne jiivanullallvellallam ninakyu evideninu ?

43005024	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : ente vachanamkedtu enne ayachaavane vishsikyunnavanu nitay jiivan undu ; avan nayayavidhiyill aakate marannattill ninu jiivakklekyu kadannirikyunu .
43005025	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : marichaavar daivaputrnte shabdam kellkyyum kellkyunnavar jiivikyyum cheyaunnnajhyikvarunu ; ippoll vannumirikyunu .
43005026	pitavinu tannilltanne jiivanullallatupole avan putrnum tannilltanne jiivanullallavan aakumarru varam nalkiyirikyunu .
43005027	avan manukshayputrn aakayall nayayavidhi nadattuvan avanu adhikaravum nalkiyirikyunu .

43005031	njan ennekyurrichautanne sakshaym parranjall ente sakshaym sataymalla .

43006044	enne ayachapitavu aakaksharichaidtllate aakyrum ente adukyll varuvan kajhyikayilla ; njan odukytte nallill avane uyitterjhyunnelpikyum .
43006045	ellavarum daivattall upadeshikyppedtvar aakum enu prvachakpusatkangallill ejhyutiyirikyunu . pitavinodu kedtu patthichaavan ellam ente adukyll varum .
43006046	pitavine aarekkilum kandidtundu ennalla , daivattinte adukyllninu vannavan matrme pitavine kandidtullallu .
43006047	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : vishsikyunnavanu nitayjiivan undu .
43006048	njan jiivante appm aakunu .
43006049	ningallude pitakynmar marubhoomiyill manntinnidtum marichauvalela .
43006050	ito tinunnavan marikyatirikyendatinu sggrttill ninu irrungunnappm aakunu .
43006051	sggrttillninu irrangiyjiivanullallappm njan aakunu ; i appm tinunnavan ellam ennekyum jiivikyum ; njan koduppanirikyunnappmo lokattinte jiivanu vendi njan kodukyunnente mamsam aakunu .
43006052	aakayall yehoodanmar : namukyu tante mamsam tinnendatinu taruvan ivanu engane kajhyiyum enu parranju tammill vadichau .
43006053	yeshu avaroduparranjtu : aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : ningall manukshayputrnte mamsam tinnateyum avante rtam kudikyateyum irunnall ningallkyu ullallill jiivan illa .
43006054	ente mamsam tinukayum ente rtam kudikyyum cheyyunnavanu nitayjiivan undu ; njan odukyttenallill avane uyirttejhyunnelpikyum .
43006055	ente mamsam sakshall bhakshannavum ente rtam sakshall paniiyavum aakunu .
43006056	ente mamsam tinnukayum ente rtam kudikyyum cheyyunnavan ennilum njan avanilum vasikyunu .
43006057	jiivanullallpitavu enne ayachaidtu njan pitavinmoolam jiivikyunnatupole enne tinnunnavan enmoolam jiivikyum .
43006058	sgggrttillninu irrangivannappm itu aakunu ; pitakynmar tinukayum marikyyum cheyattupele alla ; i appm tinunnavan ennekyum jiivikyum .
43006059	avan kaphannarhoomill upadeshikyuboll pallalliyillvechau itu parranju .
43006060	avante shikshaynmar palarum atukedtidtu : itu katthinavakyu , itu aakyru kellppan kajhyiyum enu parranju .
43006061	shikshaynmar atinecholli pirrupirrukyunnatu yeshu tannill tanne arrinju avarodu : itu ningallkyu idachaar aakunuvo ?
43006062	manukshayputrn mube irunnedattekyu kayarrippokunnatu ningall kandalo ?
43006063	jiivippikyunnatu aatmavu aakunu ; mamsam onninum upakrikyunnilla ; njan ningallodu samsarichavachanangall aatmavum jiivanum aakunu .
43006064	ekkilum vishsikyattvar ningallude idayill undu enu parranju . - vishsikyattvar innavar enum tanne kannichaukodukyunnavan innavan enum yeshu aadimutall arrinjirunu . -
43006065	itu hetuvayidtretnjan ningallodu : pitavu krapnalkiidtllate aakyrum ente adukyll varuvan kajhyikayillenu parranjtu enum avan parranju .
43006066	anumutall avante shikshaynmarill palarum pinvangippoyi , pinne avanodukude sanchrichhill .
43006067	aakayall yeshu pantiruvarodu : ningallkyum poykollvan manassundo enu chodichhu .
43006068	shimon paretas avanodu : karttave njangall aarude adukyll pokum ? nitayjiivante vachanangall ninte pakyll undu .
43006069	nii daivattinte parishuddhn enu njangall vishsichaum arrinjum irikyunu enu uttram parranju .
43006070	yeshu avarodu : ningalle pantrndupere njan tiranjeduttillayo ? ekkilum ningallill oruttn oru pishachu aakunu enu uttram parranju . itu avan shimon iskyyeerattavinte makanayyoodayekyurrichau parranju .
43006071	ivan pantiruvarill oruttn ekkilum avane kannichau koduppanullallavan aayirunu .
43007001	atinte sheksham yeshu galiilayill sanchrichau ; yehoodanmar avane kolluvan anevkshichaatukondu yehoodayyill sanchrippan avanu manassillayirunu .

43007009	ingane avarodu parranjidtu galiilayill tanne pattru .
43007010	avante sahodaranmar perunallinu poyasheksham avanum parasaymayidtllrahasayttill ennapole poyi .
43007011	ennall yehoodanmar perunallill : avan evide enu chodichau avane anevkshichau .
43007012	puruksharattill avanekyurrichau vallare kashukashuppu undayi : avan nallavan enu chilarum alla , avan puruksharatte vanchikyunu ennu mattu chilarum parranju .
43007013	ekkilum yehoodanmare pedichaidtu aarum prsiddhmayi avanekyurrichau samsarichaillal .

43007015	vidayabhayasam cheyaatt ivan shasrtm arriyunnatu engane enu yehoodanmar parranju ayarrppedtu .
43007016	yeshu avarodu uttram parranjtu : ente upadesham entetalla , enne ayachaavantetareta .
43007017	avante ishtam cheyvan ichchikyunnavan i upadesham daivattill ninullato njan syamayi prsatavikyunnato enu arriyum .
43007018	syamayi prsatavikyunnavan sntamahatm anevkshikyunu ; tanne ayachaavante mahatm anevkshikyunnavan satayvan aakunu ; niitikedu avanill illal .
43007019	moshe ningallkyu nayayaprmannam tannidtillayo ? ekkilum ningallill aarum nayayaprmannam aacharikyunnilla . ningall enne kolluvan anevkshikyunnatu entu ?
43007020	atinu puruksharam : ninakyu oru bhootam undu ; aar ninne kolluvan anevkshikyunu enu uttram parranju .

43007022	moshe ningallkyu pariedanniyamichairikyyall - atu mosheyude kalattllpitakynmarude kalattrettudangiyatu - ningall shabaaattill manukshayne pariedankajhyikyunu .
43007023	mosheyude nayayaprmannattinu niikym varatirippan shabaattilum manukshayn pariedaneelkyunu ekkill njan shabaattill oru manukshayne mujhyuvanum sekhaymakyi yatinall ennodu iksharyppedunuvo ?
43007024	kprkaram vidhikyrutu ; niitiyullvidhi vidhippin .

43007028	aakayall yeshu daivalayattill upadeshikyuboll : ningall enne arriyunu ; njan syamayidtu vannavanalla , enne ayachaavan satayvan aakunu ; avane ningall arriyunnillal .
43007029	njan avante adukyll ninu vannatukondum avan enne ayachaatukondum njan avane arriyunu enu villichau parranju .

43008035	dasan ennekyum viidtill vasikyunnilla ; putrno ennekyum vasikyunu .

43008039	avar avanodu : abraham aakunu njangallude pitavu enu uttram parranjtinu yeshu avarodu : ningall abrahaminte makyll ekkill abrahaminte prvrattikalle cheyaumayirunu .
43008040	ennall daivattodu kedtidtullsataym ningallodu samsarichairikyunnmanukshaynayenne ningall kolluvan nokyunu ; angane abraham cheyatillalela .
43008041	ningallude pitavinte prvrattikalle ningall cheyaunu enu parranju . avar avanodu : njangall parasamgattall janichaavaralla ; njangallkyu oru pitaveyulluu ; daivam tanne enu parranju .
43008042	yeshu avarodu parranjtu : daivam ningallude pitavu ekkill ningall enne senhikyumayirunu . njan daivattinte adukyll ninu vannirikyunu ; njan syamayivannatalla , avan enne ayachaatakunu .
43008043	ente bhakshannam ningall grhikyatttu entu ? ente vachanam kellppan ningallkyu manassillaykkondareta .
43008044	ningall pishachennpitavinte makyll ; ningallude pitavinte mohangalle cheyvanum ichchikyunu . avan aadi mutall kulapatakan aayirunu ; avanill sataym illaykakondu satayttill nilkyunnatumilla . avan bhokshkyu parrayuboll sntattill ninu eduttu parrayunu ; avan bhokshkyu parrayunnavanum atinte appnum aakunu .
43008045	njano sataym parrayunnatu kondu ningall enne vishsikyunnillal .
43008046	ningallill aar enne papattekyurrichau bodham varuttunu ? njan sataym parrayunu ekkill ningall enne vishsikyatttu entu ?

43008048	yehoodanmar avanodu : nii oru shamayaarn ; ninakyu bhootam undu enu njangall parrayunnatu shariyallayo enu parranju .
43008049	atinu yeshu : enikyu bhootamilla ; njan ente pitavine bahumaniky aretcheyaunnatu ; ningallo enne apamanikyunu .
43008050	njan ente mahatm anevkshikyunnilla ; anevkshikyyum vidhikyyum cheyaunnavan oruvan undu .
43008051	aamen , aamen njan ningallodu parrayunu : ente vachanam prmannikyunnavan orunallum marannam kannkayillenu uttram parranju .
43008052	yehoodanmar avanodu : ninakyu bhootam undu enu ippoll njangallkyu manassilayi ; abrahamum prvachakanmarum marichau ; niiyo ente vachanam prmannikyunnavan orunallum marannam aasdikyyillenu parrayunu .
43008053	njangallude pitavayabrahaminekyall nii valiyavano ? avan marichau , prvachakanmarum marichau ; ninnettnne nii aar aakyunu enu chodichaatinu yeshu :
43008054	njan ennettnne mahatppeduttiyall ente mahatm eetumilla ; enne mahatppeduttunnatu ente pitavu aakunu ; avane ningallude daivam enu ningall parrayunu .
43008055	ekkilum ningall avane arriyunnilla ; njano avane arriyunu ; avane arrayunnillenu njan parranjall ningalleppole bhokshkyu parrayunnavan aakum ; ennall njan avane arriyunu ; avante vachanam prmannikyyum cheyaunu .
43008056	ningallude pitavayabraham ente divasam kannum ennullatukondu ullasichau ; avan kandu santokshichaumirikyunu enu uttram parranju .

43008058	yeshu avarodu : aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : abraham janichhatinu mube njan undu enu parranju .
43008059	appoll avar avane errivan kallu eduttu , yeshuvo marranju daivalayam vidtupoyi .
43009001	avan kadanu pokuboll pirraviyile kurudanayoru manukshayne kandu .
43009002	avante shakshaynmar avanodu : rrabaii , ivan kurudanayi pirrakyttkyvannm aar papam cheyatu ? ivano ivante ammyappnmaro enu chodichau .
