43009005	njan lokattill irikyuboll lokattinte vellichaam aakunu ennu uttram parranju .
43009006	ingane parranjidtu avan nilattu tuppi tuppll kondu cherrundakyi cherru avante kanninmell pooshi
43009007	nii chenu shiloham kullattill kajhyukukenu avanodu parranju ; shiloham ennatinu ayakyppedtvan ennatthrm . avan poyi kajhyuki , kannu kannunnavanayi madangivanu .
43009008	ayalkyarum avane mube irakyunnavanayi kandavarum : ivanallayo avide irunnu bhikshyachichaavan enu parranju .
43009009	avan tanne enu chilarum alla , avaneppoleyullvan enu mattu chilarum parranju ; njan tanne enu avan parranju .
43009010	avar avanodu : ninte kannu turrannatu engane
43009011	enu chodichaatinu avan : yeshu enu perullmanukshayn cherrundakyi ente kanninmell pooshi : shiloham kullattill chenu kajhyukukenu ennodu parranju ; njan poyi kajhyuki k prapichau enu uttram parranju .
43009012	avan evide enu avar avanodu chodichaatinu : njan arriyunnillenu avan parranju .
43009013	kurudanayirunnavane avar pariishanmarude adukyll kondupoyi .
43009014	yeshu cherrundakyi avante kannu turrannatu shabaat nallill aayirunnu .
43009015	avan k prapichaatu engane enu pariishanmarum avanodu chodichau . avan avarodu : avan ente kanninmell cherru techau njan kajhyuki ; k prapichairikyunu enu parranju .
43009016	pariishanmarill chilar : i manukshayn shabaat prmannikyykakondu daivattinte adukyll ninu vannavanallenu parranju . mattu chilar : papiyayoru manukshaynu inganeyulladayallangall cheyvan engane kajhyiyum enu parranju ; angane avarude idayill oru bhinnatundayi .
43009017	avar pinneyum kurudanodu : ninte kannu turrannatu kondu nii avanekyurrichau entu parrayunu enu chodichaaninu : avan oru prvachakan enu avan parranju .
43009018	kprapichaavante ammyappnmare villichau chodikyuvollam avan kurudanayirunu enum k prapichau enum yehoodar vishsichaillal .
43009019	kurudanayi janichau enu ningall parrayunnningallude makan ivan tanneyo ? ennall avanu ippoll kannu kannunnatu engane enu avar avarodu chodichau .
43009020	avante ammyappnmar : ivan njangallude makan enum karudanayi janichaavan enum njangall arriyunnu .
43009021	ennall kannu kannunnatu engane enu arriyunnilla ; avante kannu aar tarrannu enum arriyunnilla ; avanodu chodippin ; avannu prayam undalela ; avan tanne parrayum enu uttram parranju .
43009022	yehoodanmare bhayappedukakondaretavante ammyappnmar ingane parranjtu ; avane krisatu enu ettuparrayunnavan pallibhrshtanakennam enu yehoodanmar tammill parranjo ttirunu .
43009023	atukondaretavante ammyappnmar : avanu prayam undalela ; avanodu chodippin enu parranjtu .
43009024	kurudanayirunnmanukshayne avar randamatum villichau : daivattinnu mahatm koduky ; amanukshayn papi enu njangall arriyunu enu parranju .
43009025	atinnu avan : avan papiyo allayo enu njan arriyunnilla ; onu arriyunu ; njan kurudanayirunu , ippoll kannu kannunu enu uttram parranju .
43009026	avar avanodu : avan ninakyu entu cheyatu ? ninte kannu engane turranu enu chodichau .
43009027	atinu avan : njan ningallodu parranjuvalela ; ningall shrddhichailla ; viindum kellppan ichchikyunnatu entu ? ningallkyum avante shikshaynmar aakuvan manassundo enu uttram parranju .
43009028	appoll avar avane shakarichau : nii avante shikshayn ; njangall mosheyude shikshaynmar .
43009029	mosheyodu daivam samsarichau enu njangall arriyunu ; ivano evide ninu enu arriyunnillenu parranju .
43009030	amanukshayn avarodu : ente kannu turrannidtum avan evideninu enu ningall arriyatttu ayarrm .
43009031	papikallude pratthrrndaivam kellkyunnillenum daivabhtanayirunu avante ishtam cheyaunnavante pratthrr nkellkyunu enum nam arriyunu .
43009032	kurudanayi pirrannavante kannu aarekkilum turrannaprkaram lokam undayatumutall kedtidtillal .
43009033	daivattinte adukyll ninu vannavan alelkkill avanu onum cheyvan kajhyikayillenu uttram parranju .
43009034	avar avanodu : nii mujhyuvanum papattill pirrannavan ; nii njangalle upadeshikyunnuvo enu parranju avane purrattakyikyllanju .
43009035	avane purrattakyi enu yeshu kedtu ; avane kandappoll : nii daivaputrnill vishsikyunnuvo enu chodichau .
43009036	atinnu avan : yajamanane , avan aar aakunnu ? njan avanill vishsikyam enu uttram parranju .
43009037	yeshu avanodu : nii avane kandidtundu ; ninnodu samsarikyunnavan avan tanne enu parranju .
43009038	udane avan : kattrave , njan vishsikyunu enu parranju avane namaskyrichau .
43009039	kannattvar kanmanum kannunnavar kurudar aavanum ingane nayayavidhikyayi njan ihalokattill vanu enu yeshu parranju .
43009040	avanodu koodeyullchilpariishanmar itu kedtidtu : njangallum kurudaro enu chodichau .
43009041	yeshu avarodu : ningall kurudar aayirunu ekkill ningallkyu papam illayirunu ; ennall : njangall kannunu enu ningall parrayunnatu kondu ningallude papam nilkyunu enu parranju .
43010001	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu , aadtin tojhyuttill vatiloode kadakyate verre vajhyiyayi kayarrunnavan kallanum kavachaarkyaranum aakunu .
43010002	vatiloode kadakyunnavano aadukallude idayan aakunu .
43010003	avanu vatill kavalkyaran tarranu kodukyunu ; aadukall avante shabdam kellkyunu ; tante aadukalle avan per cholli villichau purrattu kondu pokunu .
43010004	tanikyullavaye okyeyum purrattu kondupoyasheksham avan avekyu mumbayi nadakyunu ; aadukall avante shabdam arrinju avane anugamikyunu .
43010005	anaynmarude shabdam arriyaykakondu avanayne anugamikyate vidtu oadippokum .
43010006	i sadrashaym yeshu avarodu parranju ; ennall tangallodu parranjtu innatu ennu avar grhichaillal .
43010007	yeshu pinneyum avarodu parranjtu : aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : aadukallude vatill njan aakunu .
43010008	enikyu mube vannavar okyeyum kallanmarum kavacharrkyarum areta ; aadukallo avarude vakyu kedtillal .
43010009	njan vatill aakunu ; enniloode kadakyunnavan rakshappedum ; avan akattu varikayum purrattu pokayum mechaall kandettukayum cheyaum .
43010010	meshtippanum arruppanum mudippanum allate kallan varunnilla ; avakyru jiivan undukuvanum samraddhiyayidtu undakuvanum aretnjan vannirikyunnatu .
43010011	njan nallidayan aakunu ; nallidayan aadukallkyu vendi tante jiivane kodukyunu .
43010012	idayanum aadukallude udamasthnumallatt koolikyaran chennay varunnatu kandu aadukalle vidtu oadikyllayunu ; chennay avaye pidikyyum chinnichau kallakayum cheyaunu .
43010013	avan koolikyaranum aadukalle kyurrichau vicharamillattvanu malela .
43010014	njan nallidayan ; pitavu enne arrikayum njan pitavine arrikayum cheyaunnatu pole njan enikyullavaye arrikayum enikyullavenne arrikayum cheyaunu .
43010015	aadukallkyuvendi njan ente jiivane kodukyunu .
43010016	i tojhyuttill ullppedatt verre aadukall enikyu undu ; avayeyum njan nadattendatakunu ; avente shabdam kellkyum ; oradtin koodtvum oridayanum aakum .
43010017	ente jiivane viindum prapikyendatinu njan atine kodukyunnatukondu pitavu enne senhikyunu .
43010018	aarum atine ennodu eduttukallayunnilla ; njan tanne atine kodukyunu ; atine koduppan enikyu adhikaram undu ; viindum prapippanum adhikaram undu . i kalpanente pitavikkll ninu enikyu labhichairi kyunu .
43010019	i vachanam nimittm yehoodanmarude idayill pinneyum bhinnatundayi ,
43010020	avarill palarum ; avanu bhootam undu ; avan bhrantan aakunnu ; avante vakyu kellkyunnatu entinu enu parranju .
43010021	mattu chilar : itu bhootagrsatnte vakylla ; bhootattinu kurudanmarude kannu turrappan kajhyiyumo enu parranju .
43010022	anantaram yerooshalemill prtikshtthotsavam aacharichau ; anu shiitakalamayirunu .
43010023	yeshu daivalayattill shalomonte mandpattill nadanu kondirunu .
43010024	yehoodanmar avane vallanju : nii etrttollam njangalle aashippikyunu ? nii krisatu ekkill spashtamayi parrakenu avanodu parranju .
43010025	yeshu avarodu uttram parranjtu : njan ningallodu parranjidtundu ; ekkilum ningall vishsikyunnilla ; ente pitavinte namattill njan cheyaunnprvrattikall enikyu sakshaym aakunu .
43010026	ningallo ente aadukallude koodtttilullavarallaykayall vishsikyunnilla . ente aadukall ente shabdam kellkyunu ;
43010027	njan avaye arrikayum avenne anugamikyyum cheyaunu .
43010028	njan avekyu nitayjiivan kodukyunu ; avorunallum nashichau pokayilla ; aarum avaye ente kayaill ninu pidichau parrikyyum illal .
43010029	avaye tannirikyunnente pitavu ellavarilum valiyavan ; pitavinte kayaill ninu pidichhuparrippan aakyrum kajhyikayillal .
43010030	njanum pitavum onnakunu .
43010031	yehoodanmar avane errivan pinneyum kallu eduttu .
43010032	yeshu avarodu : pitavinte kalpanayall njan palnallprvrattikall ningalle kannichairikyunu ; avayill eetu prvratti nimittm ningall enne kalelrriyunu enu chodichau .
43010033	yehoodanmar avanodu : nallprvratti nimittmalla , daivadookshannam nimittvum nii manukshaynayirikye ninnettnne daivam aakyunnatu kondumaretnjangall ninne kalelrriyunnatu ennu uttram parranju .
43010034	yeshu avarodu : ningall devanmar aakunnu ennu njan parranju enu ningallude nayayaprmannattill ejhyutiyirikyunnillayo ?
43010035	daivattinte arullappadu undayidtullavare devanmar enu parranju ekkill - tiruvejhyuttinu niikym vannukoodayalel -

43010038	cheyaunnu ekkilo enne vashsikyatirunnalum pitavu ennilum njan pitavilum ennu ningall grhichau arriyendatinu prvrattiye vishsippin .
43010039	avar avane pinneyum pidippan nokyi ; avano avarude kayaill ninu ojhyinjupoyi .

43010042	avide palarum avanill vishsichau .

43012014	yeshu oru cherriykajhyutaye kandidtu atinmell kayarri .
43012015	" siiyon putrii , bhayappedenda ; ita , ninte rajavu kajhyutakyudti ppurrattu kayarri varunu " enu ejhyutiyirikyu nnatupole tanne .

43012020	perunallill namaskyrippan vannavarill chilyavananmar undayirunu .
43012021	ivar galiilayile betsayidakyaranayphilipposi nte adukyll chenu avanodu : yajamanane , njangallkyu yeshuvine kanman talpayarrmundu enu apekshichau .
43012022	philippos chenu arentayasinodu parranju . arentayasum philipposum koode chenu yeshuvinodu parranju .
43012023	yeshu avarodu uttram parranjtu : manukshay putrn tejaskyrikyppeduvanullnajhyikvannirikyunu .
43012024	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : kotambumanni nilattu viinnu chakunnillekkill atu taniye irikyum ; chattu ekkilo vallare villavundakum .
43012025	tante jiivane senhikyunnavan atine kallayum ; ihalokattill tante jiivane pakekyunnavan atine nitayjiivannayi sookshikyum .
43012026	enikyu shushrookshcheyaunnavan enne anugamikydte ; njan irikyunnedattu ente shushrookshakyaranum irikyum ; enikyu shushrookshcheyaunnavane pitavu manikyum .
43012027	ippoll ente ullam kalangiyirikyunu ; njan entu parrayendu ? pitave , i najhyikayill ninu enne rakshikyenname ; ekkilum itu nimittm njan i najhyikayilekyu vannirikyunu .
43012028	pitave , ninte namatte mahatppeduttenname . appoll sggrttill ninu ; njan mahatppedutti yirikyunu ; iniyum mahatppeduttum ennoru shabdam undayi .
43012029	atukedtidtu arike nilkyunnpuruksharam : idi undayi enu parranju ; mattuchilar : oru daivadootan avanodu samsarichau enu parranju .
43012030	atinnu yeshu : i shabdam ente nimittmalla , ningallude nimittm aretundayatu .
43012031	ippoll i lokattinte nayayavidhi aakunu ; ippoll i lokattinte prbhavine purrattu tallikyllayum .
43012032	njano bhoomiyill ninu uyattrppedtall ellavareyum ekklekyu aakaksharikyum enu uttram parranju .
43012033	itu tan marippanullmarannavidham soochippichau parranjtareta .
43012034	puruksharam avanodu : krisatu ennekyum irikyum enu njangall nayayaprmannattill vayichau kedtirikyunu ; pinne manukshayputrn uyattrppedendatenu nii parrayunnatu engane ? i manukshayputrn aar ennu chodichau .
43012035	atinu yeshu avarodu : ini kurrayakalam matrm vellichaam ningallude idayill irikyum ; irull ningalle pidakyatirippan ningallkyu vellichaam ulledattollam nadannukollvin . irullill nadakyunnavan tan evide pokunu enu arriyunnillalela .
43012036	ningall vellichaattinte makyll aakendatinu vellichaam ulledattollam vellichaattill vishsippin enu parranju .
43012037	itu samsarichaidtu yeshu vangippoyi avare vidtu marranju . avar kannke avan itr vallare adayallangalle cheyatidtum avar avanill vishsichaillal .
43012038	" kattrave , njangall kellppichaatu aar vishsichairikyunu ? kattavinte bhujam aakyru vellippedtirikyunu ? " enu yeshayaprvachakan parranj vachanam nivrattiyavan idavanu .
43012039	avakyru vishsippan kajhyinjilla ; atinte karannam yeshayaavu verre oredattuparrayunnatu :
43012040	" avar kannukondu kannukayo hradayam kondu grhikyyo manam tirikayo tan avare sekhaymakyukayo cheyaatirikyendatinu avarude kannu avan kurudakyi hradayam tadippichairikyunu . "
43012041	yeshayaavu avante tejassu kandu avanekyurrichau samsarichaatu kondakunu itu parranjtu .
43012042	ennidtum prmannikallill tanneyum anekar avanill vishsichau ; pallibhrshtar aakatirippan pariishanmar nimittm eettuparranjilltanum .
43012043	avar daivattalullmanattekyall manukshayralullmanatte adhikam senhichau .
43012044	yeshu villichauparranjtu : ennill vishsikyunnavan ennilallenne ayachaavanill tanne vishsikyunu .
43012045	enne kannunnavan enne ayachaavane kannunu .
43012046	ennill vishsikyunnavan aarum irullill vasikyatirippan njan vellichaamayi lokattill vannirikyunu .
43012047	ente vachanam kedtu prmannikyattvane njan vidhikyunnilla ; lokatte vidhippanalla , lokatte rakshippanaretnjan vannirikyunnatu .
43012048	ente vachanam kaikyollate enne tallikyllayunnavane nayayam vidhikyunnavan undu ; njan samsarichavachanam tanne odukytte nallill avane nayayam vidhikyum .
43012049	njan syamayi samsarichaidtilla ; enne ayachapitavu tanne njan innatu parrayennam enum innatu samsarikyennam enum kalpantannirikyunu .
43012050	avante kalpannitayjiivan enu njan arriyunu ; aakayall njan samsarikyunnatu pitavu ennodu arullicheeyattu pole tanne samsarikyunu .
43013001	pesahaperunallinu mube tan i lokam vidtu pitavinte adukyll pokuvanullnajhyikvanu enu yeshu arrinjidtu , lokattill tanikyullavare senhichaatupole avasanattollam avare senhichau .
43013002	attajhyam aayappoll pishachu , shimonte makanayyoodiskayerrattavinte hradayattill avane kannichaukoduppan tonnichairunu ;
43013003	pitavu sakalavum tante kayaill tannirikyunu enum tan daivattinte adukyll ninu vanu daivattinte adukyll pokunu enum yeshu arrinjirikye
43013004	attajhyattill ninu ejhyunnettu vasrtm urivechau oru tuvattru eduttu arayill chutti
43013005	oru patrttill vellam pakannaru shikshaynmarude kall kajhyukuvanum arayill chuttiyirunntunnikondu tuvattruvanum tudangi .
43013006	avan shimon paretasinte adukyll vannappoll avan avanodu : kattrave , nii ente kall kajhyukunuvo enu parranju .
43013007	yeshu avanodu : njan cheyaunnatu nii ippoll arriyunnilla ; pinne arriyum enu uttram parranju .
43013008	nii orunallum ente kall kajhyukukayillenu paretas parranju . atinu yeshu : njan ninne kajhyukanjall ninakyu ennodu koode pakkillenu uttram parranju . appoll shimon paretas :
43013009	kattrave , ente kall matrmallkayaum talayum koode kajhyukenname enu parranju .
43013010	kullichairikyunnavanu kall allate kajhyukuvan aavashaym illa ; avan mujhyuvanum shuddhiyullavan ; ningall shuddhiyullavar aakunu ; ellavarum allatanum enu parranju .
43013011	tanne kannichaukodukyunnavane arrinjirikykondaretellavarum shuddhiyullavarallenu parranjtu .
43013012	avan avarude kall kajhyakiidtu vasrtm dharichau viindum irunu avarodu parranjtu : njan ningallkyu cheyattu innatu enu arriyunuvo ?
43013013	ningall enne guruvenum kattravenum villikyunu ; njan angane aakakondu ningall parrayunnatu shari .
43013014	kattravum guruvumaynjan ningallude kall kajhyuki ekkill ningallum tammill tammill kall kajhyukendatakunu .
43013015	njan ningallkyu cheyattupole ningallum cheyeendatinu njan ningallkyu drashtantam tannirikyunu .
43013016	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : dasan yajamananekyall valiyavan alla ; dootan tanne ayachavanekyall valiyavanumallal .
43013017	itu ningall arriyunu ekkill cheyatall bhagayvanmar .
43013018	ningalle ellavareyum kurrichau parrayunnilla ; njan tiranjeduttvare njan arriyunu ; ennall " ente appm tinunnavan ente nere kutikall uyattriyirikyunu " enulltiruvejhyuttinu nivratti varendatakunu .
43013019	atu sambhavikyuboll njan tanne mashiihenu ningall vishsikyendatinu njan ippoll atu sambhavikyum mube ningallodu parrayunu .
43013020	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : njan ayakyunnavane kaikyollunnavan enne kaikyollunu ; enne kaikyollunnavan enne ayachaavane kaikyollunu .
43013021	itu parranjidtu yeshu ullam kalangi : aamen , aamen , njan tingallodu parrayunu : ningallill oruttn enne kannichaukodukyum enu sakshiikarichauparranju .
43013022	itu aarekyurrichau parrayunu enu shikshaynmar samshayichau tammill tammill nokyi .
43013023	shikshaynmarill vechau yeshu senhichoruttn yeshuvinte mavaaridattu charikyondirunu .
43013024	shimon paretas avanodu aamgaym kadti , avan parranjtu aarekyondu enu chodippan parranju .
43013025	avan yeshuvinte nenchodu chanju : kattrave , atu aar enu chodichau .
43013026	njan appkhandm mukyi kodukyunnavan tanne enu yeshu uttram parranju ; khandm mukyi shimon i skayerrattavinte makanayyoodekyu koduttu .
43013027	khandm vangiyudane sattan avanill kadannu . yeshu avanodu : nii cheyaunnatu vegattill cheykenu parranju .
43013028	ennall itu innatinekyurrichau parranjuvenu pantiyill irunnavarill aarum arrinjillal .
43013029	pannassnchi yoodayude pakyll aakayall perunallinu vendunnatu medippano daridrkyru vallatum koduppano yeshu avanodu kalpikyunu enu chilakyru tonni .
43013030	khandm vangiyudane avan ejhyunnettu poyi , appoll ratri aayirunu .
43013031	avan poysheksham yeshu parranjtu : ippoll manukshay putrn mahatppedtirikyunu ; daivavum avanill mahatppedtirikyunu ;
43013032	tanne mahatppeduttum ; kshannattill avane mahatppeduttum .
43013033	kunjungalle , njan ini kurranjonu matrm ningallodukoode irikyum ; ningall enne anevkshikyum ; njan pokunnidattu ningallkyu varuvan kajhyikayillenu njan yehoodanmarodu parranjtupole inu ningallodum parrayunu .
43013034	ningall tammill tammill senhikyennam enu putiyoru kalpannjan ningallkyu tarunu ; njan ningalle senhichaatupole ningallum tammill tammill senhikyennam enu tanne .
43013035	ningallkyu tammill tammill senham undekkill ningall ente shikshaynmar enu ellavarum arriyum .
43013036	shimon paretas avanodu : kattrave , nii evide pokunu enu chodichaatinu : njan pokunnidattekyu ninakyu ippoll enne anugamippan kajhyikayilla ; pinnattetill nii enne anugamikyum enu yeshu avanodu uttram parranju .
43013037	kattrave , ippoll enikyu ninne anugamippan kajhyiyatttu entu ? njan ente jiivane ninakyu vendi vechaukallayum enu parranju .
43013038	atinu yeshu : ninte jiivane enikyuvendi vechaukallayumo ? aamen , aamen , njan ninnodu parrayunu : nii moonu pravashaym enne tallipprrayuvollam kojhyi kookukayillenu uttram parranju .
43014001	ningallude hradayam kalangippokarutu ; daivattill vishsippin , ennilum vishsippin .
43014002	ente pitavinte bhavanattill anekam vasasthlangall undu ; ilelkkill njan ningalloadu parrayumayirunu . njan ningallkyu sthlam orukyuvan pokunu .
43014003	njan poyi ningallkyu sthlam orukyiyall , njan irikyunnidattu ningallum irikyendatinu pinneyum vanu ningalle ente adukyll chettru kollum .
43014004	njan pokunnidattekyullvajhyi ningall arriyunu .
43014005	tomas avanodu : kattrave , nii evide pokunu enu njangall arriyunnilla ; pinne vajhyi engane arriyum enu parranju .
43014006	yeshu avanodu : njan tanne vajhyiyum satayvum jiivanum aakunu ; njan mukhantaramallate aarum pitavinte adukyn ettunnillal .
43014007	ningall enne arrinju ekkill ente pitavineyum arriyumayirunu ; inu mutall ningall avane arriyunu ; avane kandumirikyunu enu parranju .
43014008	philippos avanodu : kattrave , pitavine njangallkyu kannichau tarennam ; ennall njangallkyu mati enu parranju .
43014009	yeshu avanodu parranjtu : njan itrkalam ningallodu koode irunnidtum nii enne arriyunnillayo philippose ? enne kandavan pitavine kandirikyunu ; pinne pitavine njangallkyu kannichau tarennam ennu nii parrayunnatu engane ?
43014010	njan pitavilum pitavu ennilum aakunu enu nii vishsikyunnillayo ? njan ningallodu parrayunnvachanam syamayidtllsamsarikyunnatu ; pitavu ennill vasichau kondu tante prvratti cheyaunu .
43014011	njan pitavilum pitavu ennilum enu enne vishsippin ; alelkkill prvratti nimittm enne vishsippin .
43014012	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu ; njan cheyaunnprvratti ennill vishsikyunnavanum cheyaum ; njan pitavinte adukyll pokunnatu kondu atill valiyatum avan cheyaum .
43014013	ningall ente namattill apekshikyunnatu okyeyum pitavu putrnill mahatppedendatinu njan cheyatutarum .
43014014	ningall ente namattill ennodu apekshikyunnatu okyeyum njan cheyatutarum .
43014015	ningall enne senhikyunnu ekkill ente kalpanakalle kattukollum .
43014016	ennall njan pitavinodu chodikyum ; avan satayttinte aatmavu ennmattoru kayarrsthne ennekyum ningallodu koode irikyendatinu ningallkyu tarum .
43014017	lokam avane kannukayo arrikayo cheyaaykayall atinu avane labhippan kajhyikayilla ; ningallo avan ningallodu koode vasikyyum ningallill irikyyum cheyaunnatu kondu avane arriyunu .
43014018	njan ningalle anatharayi vidukayilla ; njan ningallude adukyll varum .
43014019	kurranjonu kajhyinjall lokam enne kannukayilla ; ningallo enne kannum ; njan jiivikyunnatu kondu ningallum jiivikyum .
43014020	njan ente pitavilum ningall ennilum njan ningallilum enu ningall anu arriyum .
43014021	ente kalpanakall labhichau prmannikyunnavan enne senhikyunnavan akunu ; enne senhikyunnavane ente pitavu senhikyunu ; njanum avane senhichau avanu ennettnne vellippeduttum .
43014022	iskayerrattavallatt yoodavanodu : kattrave , entu sambhavichaidtakunu nii lokattinnallnjangallkyretninne vellippeduttuvan pokunnatu enu chodichau .
43014023	yeshu avanodu enne senhikyunnavan ente vachanam prmannikyum ; ente pitavu avane senhikyum ; njangall avante adukyll vanu avanodukoode vasam cheyaum .
43014024	enne senhikyattvan ente vachanam prmannikyunnilla ; ningall kellkyunnvachanam entetallenne ayachapitavintetaretenu uttram parranju .
43014025	njan ningallodukoode vasikyuboll itu ningallodu samsarichairikyunu .
43014026	ekkilum pitavu ente namattill ayappanullparishuddhatmavu ennkayarrsthn ningallkyu sakalavum upadeshichau tarikayum njan ningallodu parranjtu okyeyum ningalle oammrppeduttukayum cheyaum
43014027	samadhanam njan ningallkyu tannechaupokunu ; ente samadhanam njan ningallkyu tarunu ; lokam tarunnatupole allnjan ningallkyu tarunnatu . ningallude hradayam kalangarutu , bhrmikyyum arutu .
43014028	njan pokayum ningallude adukyll madangi varikayum cheyaum enu njan ningallodu parranjtu kedtuvalela ; ningall enne senhikyunu ekkill njan pitavinte adukyll pokunnatinall ningall santokshikyumayi runu ; pitavu ennekyall valiyavanalela .
43014029	atu sambhavikyuboll ningall vishsikyendatinu njan ippoll atu sambhavikyum mube ningallodu parranjiri kyunu .
43014030	njan ini ningallodu vallare samsarikyyilla ; lokattinte prbhu varunu ; avanu ennodu oru kayarrvumillal .
43014031	ekkilum njan pitavine senhikyunu enum pitavu ennodu kalpichaatupole njan cheyaunu enum lokam arriyadte . ejhyunnelpin : nam poka .
43015001	njan sakshall muntirivalliyum ente pitavu todtkyaranum aakunu .
43015002	ennill kaykyatt kombu okyeyum avan niikyikyllayunu ; kaykyunnatu okyeyum adhikam phalam kaykyendatinu chettivedippakyunu .
43015003	njan ningallodu samsarichavachanam nimittm ningall ippoll shuddhiyullavarakunu .
43015004	ennill vasippin ; njan ningallilum vasikyum ; kombinu muntirivalliyill vasichaidtllate syamayi kaypan kajhyiyatttu pole ennill vasichaidtllate ningallkyu kajhyikayillal .
43015005	njan muntirivalliyum ningall kombukallum aakunu ; oruttn ennilum njan avanilum vasikyunu ekkill avan vallare phalam kaykyum ; enne pirinju ningallkyu onum cheyvan kajhyikayillal .
43015006	ennill vasikyattvane oru kombupole purrattu kallanjidtu avan unnangippokunu ; avakchettru tiiyill idunu ; atu ventu pokum .
43015007	ningall ennilum ente vachanam ningallilum vasichaall ningall ichchikyunnatu entekkilum apekshippin ; atu ningallkyu kidtum .
43015008	ningall vallare phalam kaykyunnatinall ente pitavu mahatppedunu ; angane ningall ente shikshaynmar aakum .
43015009	pitavu enne senhikyunnatu pole njanum ningalle senhikyunu ; ente senhattill vasippin .
43015010	njan ente pitavinte kalpanakall prmannichau avante senhattill vasikyunnatu pole ningall ente kalpanakall prmannichaall ente senhattill vasikyum .
43015011	ente santoksham ningallill irippanum ningallude santoksham poonnrmakuvanum njan itu ningallodu samsarichairikyunu .
43015012	njan tingalle senhichairikyunnatupole ningallum tammill tammill senhikyennam ennakunu ente kalpana .
43015013	senhitanmakyru vendi jiivane kodukyunnatilum adhikamullsenham aakyrum illa .
43015014	njan ningallodu kalpikyunnatu cheyatall ningall ente senhitanmar tanne .
43015015	yajamanan cheyaunnatu dasan arriyaykakondu njan ningalle dasanmar enu ini parrayunnilla ; njan ente pitavinodu kedttu ellam ningallodu arriyichaatu kondu ningalle senhitanmar enu parranjirikyunu .
43015016	ningall enne tiranjeduttu ennalla , njan ningalle tiranjeduttu ningall poyi phalam kaykyndatinu ningallude phalam nilanilkyendatinum ningalle aakyivechaumirikyunu ; ningall ente namattill pitavinodu apekshikyunnatokyeyum avan ningallkyu taruvanayidtu tanne .
43015017	ningall tammill tammill senhikyendatinu njan itu ningallodu kalpikyunu .
43015018	lokam ningalle pakekyunu ekkill atu ningallkyu mube enne pakechairikyunu enu arrivin .
43015019	ningall lokakyar aayirunu ekkill lokam tanikyu sntamayatine senhikyumayirunu ; ennall ningall lokakyarayirikyate njan ningalle lokattill ninu tiranjedutttu kondu lokam ningalle pakekyunu .
43015020	dasan yajamananekyall valiyavanallenu njan ningallodu parranj vakyu oapprin . avar enne upadrvichau ekkill ningalleyum upadrvikyum ; ente vachanam prmannichau ekkill ningalludetum prmannikyum .
43015021	ekkilum enne ayachaavane avar arriyaykakondu ente namam nimittm itu okyeyum ningallodu cheyaum .
43015022	njan vanu avarodu samsarikyatirunnekkill avakyur papam illayirunu ; ippojhyo avarude papattinu ojhyikajhyivillal .
43015023	enne pakekyunnavan ente pitavineyum pakekyunu .
43015024	mattarum cheyatidtillatt prvrattikalle njan avarude idayill cheyatirunnillekkill avakyru papam illayirunu ; ippojhyo avar enneyum ente pitavineyum kannkayum pakekyukayum cheyatirikyunu .
43015025	" avar verrute enne pakechau " enu avarude nayayprmannattill ejhyutiyirikyunnvachanam nivratti yakendatinu tanne .
43015026	njan pitavinte adukyll ninu ningallkyu ayappanullkayarrsthnayi pitavinte adukyll ninu purrappedunnsatayatmavu varuboll avan ennekyurrichau sakshaym parrayum .
43015027	ningallum aadimutall ennodukoode irikykondu sakshaym parravin .
43016001	ningall idarrippokatirippan njan itu ningallodu samsarichairikyunu .
43016002	avar ningalle pallibhrshtar aakyum ; atryumallningalle kolalunnavan ellam daivattinu vajhyipadu kajhyikyunu enu vicharikyunnnajhyikvarunu .
43016003	avar pitavineyum enneyum arriyaykakondu ingane cheyaum .
43016004	atinte najhyikvaruboll njan atu ningallodu parranjidtundenu ningall oakyerndatinu itu ningallodu samsarichairikyunu ; aadiyill itu ningallodu parrayanjtu njan ningallodu koode irikykondareta .
43016005	ippojhyo njan enne ayachaavante adukyll pokunu : nii evide pokunu enu ningall aarum ennodu chodikyunnillal .
43016006	ekkilum itu ningallodu samsarikykondu ningallude hradayattill du : kham nirranjirikyunu .
43016007	ennall njan ningallodu sataym parrayunu ; njan pokunnatu ningallkyu pryojanam ; njan pokanjall kayarrsthn ningallude adukyll varikayilla ; njan poyall avane ningallude adukyll ayakyum .
43016008	avan vanu papattekyurrichaum niitiyekyurrichaum nayayavidhiyekyurrichaum lokattinu bodham varuttum .
43016009	avar ennill vishsikyaykakondu papatte kyurrichaum
43016010	njan pitavinte adukyll pokayum ningall ini enne kannatirikyyum cheyaunnatu kondu niitiye kyurrichaum
43016011	i lokattinte prbhu vidhikyppedtirikykondu nayayvidhiye kyurrichaum tanne .
43016012	iniyum vallare ningallodu parravan undu ; ennan ningallkyu ippoll vahippan kajhyivillal .
43016013	satayttinte aatmavu varubojhyo avan ningalle sakalsatayttilum vajhyi nadattum ; avan syamayi samsarikyate tan kellkyunnatu samsarikyyum varuvanullatu ningallkyu arriyichau tarikayum cheyaum .
43016014	avan enikyullatill ninu eduttu ningallkyu arriyichau tarunnatu kondu enne mahatppeduttum .
43016015	pitavinnullatu okyeyum enikyullatu ; atukondaretavan enikyullatill ninu eduttu ningallkyu arriyichau tarum enu njan parranjtu .
43016016	kurranjonnu kajhyinjidtu ningall enne kannukayilla ; pinneyum kurranjonnu kajhyinjidtu ningall enne kannum .
43016017	avante shikshaynmarill chilar : kurranjonu kajhyinjidtu ningall enne kannukayilla ; pinneyum kurranjonu kajhyinjidtu enne kannum enum pitavinte adukyll pokunu enum avan nammodu i parrayunnatu entu enu tammill chodichau .
43016018	kurranjonu enu i parrayunnatu entakunu ? avan entu samsarikyunu enu nam arriyunnillenum avar parranju .
43016019	avar tannodu chodippan aagrhikyunu enu arrinju yeshu avarodu parranjtu : kurranjonu kajhyinjidtu enne kannukayilla ; pinneyum kurranjonu kajhyinjidtu enne kannum enu njan parrakayall ningall tammill tammill chodikyunuvo ?
43016020	aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : ningall karanju vilapikyum ; lokamo santokshikyum ; ningall du : khikyum ; ennall ningallude du : kham santokshamayittiirum .
43016021	srtii prsavikyuboll tante najhyikvannatu kondu avallkyu du : kham undu , kunjine prsavichaashekshamo oru manukshayn lokattilekyu pirrannirikyunnsantoksham nimittm avall tante kashtam pinne okyrunnillal .
43016022	angane ningallkyum ippoll du : kham undu ekkilum njan pinneyum ningalle kannum ; ningallude hradayam santokshikyum ; ningallude santoksham aarum ningallill ninu eduttukallakayillal .
43016023	anu ningall ennodu onum chodikyyilla . aamen , aamen , njan ningallodu parrayunu : ningall pitavinodu apekshikyunnatokyeyum avan ente namattill ningallkyu tarum .
43016024	inuvare ningall ente namattill onum apekshichai dtilla ; apekshippin ; ennall ningallude santoksham poonnrmakumvannm ningallkyu labhikyum .
43016025	itu njan sadrashamayi ningallodu samsarichairikyunu ; ekkilum njan ini sadrashamayi ningallodu samsari kyate pitavine sambandichau spashtamayi ningallodu arriyikyunnnajhyikvarunu .
43016026	anu ningall ente namattill apekshikyum ; njan ningallkyu vendi pitavinodu apekshikyum enu njan parrayunnillal .
43016027	ningall enne senhichau , njan pitavinte adukyll ninu vannirikyunu enu vishsichairikykondu pitavu tanum ningalle senhakyunu .
43016028	njan pitavinte adukyll ninu purrappedtu lokattill vannirikyunu ; pinneyum lokatte vidtu pitavinte adukyll pokunu .
43016029	atinu avante shikshaynmar : ippoll nii sadrasham onum parrayate spashtamayi samsarikyunu .
43016030	nii sakalavum arriyunu enum aarum ninnodu chodippan ninakyu aavashaym illenum njangall ippoll arriyunu ; itinall nii daivattinte adukyll ninnu vannirikyunu enu njangall vishsikyunu enu parranju .
43016031	yeshu avarodu : ippoll ningall vishsikyunuvo ?
43016032	ningall oaroruttn tantante sntattilekyu chitarrippokayum enne eekanayi vidukayum cheyaunnnajhyikvarunu ; vanumirikyunu ; pitavu ennodukoode ullatu kondu njan eekanalltanum .
43016033	ningallkyu ennill samadhanam undakendatinu itu ningallodu samsarichairikyunu ; lokattill ningallkyu kashtam undu ; ekkilum dhaiyaarppeduvin ; njan lokatte jayichairikyunu enu parranju .
43017001	itu samsarichaidtu yeshu sggrttekyu nokyi parranjte ntennall : pitave , najhyikvannirikyunu ; ninte putrn ninne mahatppeduttendatinu putrne mahatppedu ttenname .
43017002	nii avannu nalkiidtullavakyerllavakyrum avan nitay jiivane kodukyendatinu nii sakaljaddattinmelum avanu adhikaram nalkiyirikyunuvalela .
43017003	eeksataydaivamayninneyum nii ayachairikyunnyeshukrisatuvineyum arriyunnatu tanne nitay jiivan aakunu .
43017004	njan bhoomiyill ninne mahatppedutti , nii enikyu cheyvan tannprvratti tikechairikyunu .
43017005	ippoll pitave , lokam undakum mube enikyu ninte adukyll undayirunnmahatttill enne ninte adukyll mahatppeduttenname .
43017006	nii lokattill ninu enikyu tannidtullmanikshaykyur njan ninte namam vellippeduttiyirikyunu . avar ninakyullvar aayirunu ; nii avare enikyu tanu ; avar ninte vachanam prmannichaumirikyunu .
43017007	nii enikyu tannatu ellam ninte pakyll ninu aakunu enu avar ippoll arrinjirikyunu .
43017008	nii enikyu tannvachanam njan avakyru koduttu ; avar atu kaikyondu . njan ninte adukyll ninu vannirikyunu enu sataymayidtu arrinjum nii enne ayachau enu vishsichau mirikyunu .
43017009	njan avakyru vendi apekshikyunu ; lokattinu vendi alla ; nii enikyu tannidtullavar ninakyullavar aakkondu avakyru vendiyaretnjan apekshikyunnatu .
43017010	entetu ellam nintetum nintetu entetum aakunu ; njan avarill mahatppedtumirikyunu .
43017011	ini njan lokattill irikyunnillivaro lokattill irikyunu ; njan ninte adukyll varunu . parishuddh pitave , avar nammeppole onnakendatinu nii enikyu tannirikyunnninte namattill avare kattu kollenname .
43017012	avarodukoode irunnappoll njan avare nii enikyu tannirikyunnninte namattill kattukondirunu ; njan avare sookshichau ; tiruvejhyuttinu nivratti varendatinu anashayogaynallate avarill aarum nashichau poyi dtillal .
43017013	ippojhyo njan ninte adukyll varunu ; ente santoksham avakyru ullill poonnrmakendatinu itu lokattill vechau samsarikyunu .
43017014	njan avakyru ninte vachanam koduttirikyunu ; njan lekikanallatttu pole avarum lekikanmarllaykkondu lokam avare pakechau .
43017015	avare lokattill ninu edukyennam ennalla , dushtante kayaill akappedatavannm avare kattukollennam ennaretnjan apekshikyunnatu .
43017016	njan lekikanallatttupole avarum lekiknmarallal .
43017017	satayttall avare vishuddhiikarikyenname ; ninte vachanam sataym aakunu .
43017018	nii enne lokattilekyu ayachaatupole njan avareyum lokattilekyu ayachairikyunu .
43017019	avarum sakshall vishuddhiikarikyppedtvar aakendatinu njan avakyru vendi ennettnne vishuddhiikarikyunu .
43017020	ivakyru vendimatrmalla , ivarude vachanattall ennill vishsippanirikyunnavakyru vendiyum njan apekshi kyunu .
43017021	nii enne ayachairikyunu enu lokam vishsippan avar ellavarum onnakendatinu , pitave , nii ennilum njan ninnilum aakunnatupole avarum nammill aakendatinu tanne .
43017022	nii enikyu tannidtullmahatm njan avakyru koduttirikyunu :
43017023	nii enne ayachairikyunu enum nii enne senhikyunnatu pole avareyum senhikyunu enum lokam arrivan , nam onnayirikyunnatu pole avarum onnakendatinu njan avarilum nii ennilumayi avar eekayttill tikenjvarayirikyendatinu tanne .
43017024	pitave , nii lokasthapanattinu mube enne senhichairikykondu enikyu nalkiymahatm nii enikyu tannidtullavar kannendatinu njan irikyunnidattu avarum ennodu koode irikyennam enu njan ichchikyunu .
43017025	niitiyullpitave , lokam ninne arrinjidtilla ; njano ninne arrinjirikyunu ; nii enne ayachairikyunu enu ivarum arranjirikyunu .
43017026	nii enne senhikyunnsenham avarill aakuvanum njan avarill aakuvanum njan ninte namam avakyru vellippeduttiyirikyunu ; iniyum vellippeduttum .
43018001	itu parranjidtu yeshu shikshaynmarumayi keredan todtinu akyrekyu poyi . avide oru todtm undayirunu ; atill avanum shikshaynmarum kadanu .
43018002	avide yeshu palappojhyum shikshaynmarodu koode poyiru nnatu kondu avane kannichau kodutt yoodayum asthlam arrinjirunu .
43018003	angane yoodpadtallatteyum mahapurohitanmarum pariishanmarum ayachachevakareyum koodtikyondu diipadti pantangallum aayudhangallumayi avide vanu .
43018004	yeshu tanikyu neriduvanullellam arrinju purrattu chenu : ningall aare tirayunu enu avarodu chodichau .
43018005	nasarrayanayyeshuvine enu avar uttram parranj ppoll : atu njan tanne enu yeshu parranju ; avane kannichau kodukyunnyoodayum avarodu koode ninnirunu .
43018006	njan tanne enu avarodu parranjppoll avar pinvangi nilattu viinnu .
43018007	ningall aare tirayunu enu avan pinneyum avarodu chodichaatinu avar : nasarrayanayyeshuvine enu parranju .
43018008	njan tanne enu ningallodu parranjuvalela ; enne aakunu tirayunnatekkill ivar poykyolladte enu yeshu uttram parranju .

43018010	shimon paretas tanikyullvall uri mahpurohitante dasane vedti avante valattu katu arruttukallanju ; adasannu malkyos enu per .
43018011	yeshu paretasinodu : vall urrayill iduka ; pitavu enikyu tannpanapatrm njan kudikyendayo enu parranju .
43018012	padtallavum sahasradhipanum yehoodanmarude chevakarum yeshuvine pidichau kedti .
43018013	onnamatu hannavinte adukyll kondu poyi ; avan asamvratte mahapurohitanaykayaaphavinte ammayappn aayirunu .

43018015	shimon paretasum mattoru shikshaynum yeshuvinte pinnale chenu ; ashikshayn mahapurohitanu parichayamullavan aakayall yeshuvinodu koode mahapurohitante nadumuttttu kadanu .
43018016	paretas vatilkyll purrattu nilkyuboll , mahapurohitanu parichayamullmatte shikshayn purrattu vanu vatilkyavallkyarattiyodu parranju paretasine akattu kayatti .
43018017	vatill kakyunnbalaykyaratti paretasinodu : niiyum i manukshaynte shikshaynmarill oruvano enu chodichau ; allenu avan parranju .
43018018	annu kullir aakakondu dasanmarum chevakarum kanall koodti tiikanju kondirunu ; paretasum avarodu koode tii kanjukondu ninu .
43018019	mahapurohitan yeshuvinodu avante shikshaynmareyum upadeshatteyum kurrichau chodichau .
43018020	atinnu yeshu : njan lokattodu parasaymayi samsarichairikyunu ; palliyilum ellyehoodanmarum koodunndaivalayattilum njan eppojhyum upadeshichau ; rahasaymayi onum samsarichaidtillal .
43018021	nii ennodu chodikyunnatu entu ? njan samsarichaatu entenu kedtvarodu chodiky ; njan parranjtu avar arriyunu enu uttram parranju .
43018022	avan ingane parrayuboll chevakarill arike ninnoruttn : mahapurohitanodu inganeyo uttram parrayunnatu enu parranju yeshuvinte kannattu onnadichau .
43018023	yeshu avanodu : njan dokshamayi samsarichau ekkill tellivu koduky ; alelkkill enne tallunnatu entu enu parranju .
43018024	hannavu avane kedtppedtvanayi mahapurohitanaykayaaphavinte adukyll ayachau .
43018025	shimon paretas tii kanjunilkyuboll : niiyum avante shikshaynmarill oruttnallayo enu chilar avanodu chodichau ; allenu avan marruttu parranju .
43018026	mahapurohitante dasanmarill vechau paretas katarruttvante chachaarkyaranayoruttn njan ninne avanodukoode todtttill kandillayo enu parranju .
43018027	paretas pinneyum marruttuparranju ; udane kojhyi kooki .
43018028	pulacherrkyu avar yeshuvine kayaaphavinte adukyll ninu aasthanattilekyu kondu poyi ; tangall ashuddhmakate pesahkajhyippantakyvannm aasthanttill kadannillal .
43018029	piilattos avarude adukyll purrattu vanu : i manukshaynte nere entu kuttm bodhippikyunu enu chodichau .
43018030	kuttkyaran allanju ekkill njangall avane ninte pakyll eelpikyyillayirunu enu avar avanodu uttram parranju .
43018031	piilattos avarodu : ningall avane kondu poyi ningallude nayayaprmannaprkaram vidhippin enu parranjtinu yehoodanmar avanodu : marannashikshekyulladhikaram njangallkyillalelenu parranju .
43018032	yeshu tan marippanullmarannavidham soochippichavakyinu itinall nivrattivanu .
43018033	piilattos pinneyum aasthanattill chenu yeshuvine villichau : nii yehoodanmarude rajavo enu chodichau .
43018034	atinnu uttramayi yeshu : itu nii syamayi parrayunnato mattullavar ennekyurrichau ninnodu parranjidto enu chodichau .
43018035	piilattos atinu uttramayi : njan yehoodano ? ninte janavum mahapurohitanmarum ninne ente pakyll eelpichairikyunu ; nii entu cheyatu enu chodichaatinu yeshu :
43018036	ente rajaym eehikamalla ; ente rajaym eehikam aayirunnu ekkill enne yehoodanmarude kayaill eelpikyatavannm ente chevakar poradumayirunu ; ennall ente rajaym eehikamallenu uttram parranju .
43018037	piilattos avanodu : ennall nii rajavu tanne yalelenu parranjtinu yeshu : nii parranjtupole njan rajavutanne ; satayttinu sakshi nilkyendtinu njan janichau atinnayi lokattill vanumiri kyunu ; sataytalparanayavan ellam ente vakyu kellkyunu enu uttram parranju .
43018038	piilattos avanodu : sataym ennall entu enu parranju pinneyum yehoodanmarude adukyll purrattu chenu avarodu : njan avanill oru kuttvum kannunnillal .
43018039	ennall pesahayill njan ningallkyu oruttne vidtutarikpativundalela ; yehoodanmarude rajavine vidtutarunnatu sammtamo enu chodichaatinu avar pinneyum :
43018040	ivane venda ; barrabaasine mati enu nilavillichau parranju ; barrabaaso kavachaarkyaran aayirunu .

43019005	angane yeshu mullkyiriidavum dhoomrvasrtvum dharichhu purrattu vanu . piilattos avarodu : amanukshayn itenu parranju .

43019007	njangallkyu oru nayayaprmannam undu ; avan tannettan daivaputrn aakyiyatukondu anayayaprmannaprkaram avan marikyendatakunu enu uttram parranju .
43019008	i vakyu kedtidtu piilattos errarravum bhayappedtu ,
43019009	pinneyum aasthanattill chenu : nii evideninu aakunu enu yeshuvinodu chodichhu . yeshu uttram parranjill .
43019010	piilattos avanodu : nii ennodu samsarikyunni llyo ? enikyu ninne krooshippan adhikaramundenum , ninne vidtyappan adhikaramundenum nii arriyunni llyo enu chodichhatinu yeshu avannodu :
43019011	melillninu ninakyu kidtiidtill ekkill ente mell ninakyu oradhikaravum undakayillayirunu ; atukondu enne ninte pakyll elpichhavanu adhikam papam undu enu uttram parranju .
43019012	itunimittm piiattos avane vidtyappan shrmichhu ; yehoodanmaro : nii ivane vidtyachhall kaisarude senhitan all ; tannettan rajavakyunnavan ellam kaisarodu mrikyunuvallo enu aattruparranju .
43019013	i vakyu kedtidtu piilattos yeshuvine purrattu konduvanu , kalttllamenum ebrayabhakshayill gabaathenum perullsthlattu nayayasanattill irunu .
43019014	appoll pesahayude orukyunall eekadesham aarrammannineram aayirunu . avan yehoodanmarodu itningallude rajavu enu parranju .
43019015	avaro : konukallaka , konukallaka ; avane krooshiky enu nilavillichhu . ningallude rajavine njan krooshikyennamo enu pilattos avarodu chodichhu ; atinu mahapurohitanmar : njangallkyu kaisarallate marrerraru rajavill enu uttram parranju .
43019016	appoll avan avane krooshikyendatinu avakyur eelpichhukoduttu .
43019017	avar yeshuvine kayyerrarru ; avan tantanne krooshine chumanukondu ebrayabhakshayill golgothenu perulltalayodidam ennsthlattekyu poyi .
43019018	avide avar avaneyum avanodukoode verre randu aallukalleyum oruttne appurrattum oruttne ippurrattum yeshuvine naduvilumayi krooshichhu .
43019019	piilattos oru melejhyuttum ejhyuti krooshinmell patippichhu ; atill : nasarrayanayyeshu yehoodanmarude rajavu enu ejhyutiyirunu .
43019020	yeshuvine krooshichhsthlam nagarattinu samiipam aakayall anekam yehoodanmar i melejhyuttu vayichhu . atu ebrayrromyavanbhakshakallill ejhyutiyirunu .
43019021	aakayall yehoodanmarude mahapurohitanmar piilattosinodu : yehoodanmarude rajavu ennalla , njan yehoodanmarude rajavu enuavan parranju ennaretejhyutendatu enuparranju .
43019022	atinupiilattos : njan ejhyutiyatu ejhyuti enu uttram parranju .
43019023	padayallikall yeshavine krooshichasheksham avante vasrtm eduttu oaro padayallikyu oaro pakkayidtu nalu pakkakyi ; akkiyum eduttu ; akkiyo tunnall illate melltodtu adiyollam mujhyuvanum neyattayirunu .
43019024	itu kiirrarutu ; aakyruvarum enu chiidtidukenu avar tammill parranju . ente vasrtm avar pakutteduttu ente akkikyayi chiidtidtu ennulltiruvejhyuttinu itinall nivratti vanu . padayallikall ingane okyeyum cheyatu .
43019025	yeshuvinte krooshinnarike avante ammyum ammyude sahodariyum kelyoppavinte bhayarr marriyayum magdalakyaratti marriyayum ninnirunu .
43019026	yeshu tante ammyum tan senhichashikshaynum nilkyunnatu kandidtu : srtiiye , ita , ninte makan enu ammyodu parranju .
43019027	panne shikshaynodu : ita , ninte amm enum parranju . anajhyikamutall ashikshayn avalle tante viidtill kai kyondu .
43019028	atinte sheksham sakalavum tikanjirikyunu enu yeshu arrinjidtu tiruvejhyuttu nivrattiyakumvannm : enikyu dahikyunu enu parranju .
43019029	avide pullichaviinju nirranjoru patrm vechaidtundyirunu ; avar oru sepangu pullichaviinju nirrechau isoppu tandinmell aakyi avante vayodu aduppichau .
43019030	yeshu pullichaviinju kudichasheksham : nivrattiyayi enu parranju talchaychau aatmavine eelpichau koduttu .
43019031	anu orukynallum ashabaatnall valiyatum aakakondu shariirangall shabaattill krooshinmell irikyrutu enu vechau avarude kall odichau eduppikyennam enu yehoodanmar piilattosinodu apekshichau .
43019032	aakayall padayallikall vanu onnamattvanteyum avanodukoode krooshikyppedt mattevanteyum kall odichau .
43019033	avar yeshuvinte adukyll vanu , avan marichau poyi enu kannkayall avante kall odichaillal .
43019034	ekkilum padayallikallill oruttn kuntam kondu avante vilappurrattu kutti ; udane rtavum vellavum purrppedtu .
43019035	itu kandavan sakshaym parranjirikyunu ; avante sakshaym sataym aakunu ; ningallum vishsikyendatinu tan sataym parrayunu enu avan arriyunu .
43019036	" avante oru asthiyum odinju pokayilla " enulltiruvejhyuttu nivrattiyakendatinu itu sambhavichau .
43019037	" avar kuttiyavakklekyu nokyum " enu mattoru tiruvejhyuttum parrayunu .
43019038	anantaram , yehoodanmare pedichaidtu rahasayttill yeshuvinte oru shikshaynayirunnarimatayyile yoseph yeshuvinte shariiram eduttu kondu pokuvan piilattosinodu anuvadam chodichau : piilattos anuvadikyyall avan vanu avante shariiram eduttu .
43019039	aadaym ratriyill avante adukyll vannnikyode mosum eekadesham noorru rrattll moorrum akilum kondulloru koodtu konduvanu .
43019040	avar yeshuvinte shariiram eduttu yehoodanmar shavam adakyunnmayarradprkaram atine sugandvaggrttodukoode shiilpotinju kedti .
43019041	avane krooshichasthlattutanne oru todtvum atodtttill mube aareyum vechaidtillatt putiyoru kallarrayum undayirunu .
43019042	akallarrsamiipam aakakondu avar yehoodanmarude orukynall nimittm yeshuvine avade vechau .
43020001	avadtttill onnam nall magdalakyaratti marriyravile irudtullappoll tanne kallarrekyll chenu kallarrvaykyll ninu kalalu niingiyirikyunnatu kandu .
43020002	avall oadi shimon paretasinteyum yeshuvinu priyanaymatte shikshaynteyum adukyll chenu ; kattravine kallarrayill ninu eduttu kondupoyi ; avane evide vechau enu njangall arriyunnillenu avarodu parranju .
43020003	atukondu paretasum matte shikshaynum purrappedtu kallarrekyll chenu .
43020004	iruvarum onnichau oadi ; matte shikshayn paretasinekyall vegattill oadi aadaym kallarrekyll etti ;
43020005	kuninju nokyi shiilakall kidakyunnatu kandu ; akattu kadannilltanum .
43020006	avante pinnale shimon paretasum vanu kallarrayill kadanu shiilakall kidakyunnatum
43020007	avante talayill chuttiyirunnrroomall shiilakallodu koode kidakyate verridtu oridattu churudti vechairikyunnatum kandu .
43020008	aadaym kallarrekyll ettiymatte shikshaynum appoll akattu chenu kandu vishsichau .
43020009	avan marichaavarill ninu uyitterjhyunnelkyendatakunu ennulltiruvejhyuttu avar atuvare arrinjillal .
43020010	angane shikshaynmar viidtilekyu madangippoyi .
43020011	ennall marriykallarrekyll purrattu karanju kondu ninu . karayunnidayill avall kallarrayill kuninju nokyi .
43020012	yeshuvinte shariiram kidannirunnidattu vellvasrtm dharicharandu dutanmar oruttn talekylum oruttn kalkylum irikyunnatu kandu .
43020013	avar avallodu : srtiiye , nii karayunnatu entu enu chodichau . ente kattravine eduttu kondu poyi ; avane evide vechau enu njan arriyunnillenu avall avarodu parranju .
43020014	itu parranjidtu avall pinnokym tirinju , yeshu nilkyunnatu kandu ; yeshu enu arrinjilltanum .
43020015	yeshu avallodu : srtiye , nii karayunnatu entu ? aare tirayunu enu chodichau . avan todtkyaran enu niroopichaidtu avall : yajamanane , nii avane evide vechau enu parranjutarika ; njan avane eduttu kondu poykyollam enu avanodu parranju .
43020016	yeshu avallodu : marriyaye , enu parranju . avall tirinju ebraybhakshayill : rrabaooni enu parranju ; atinu guru ennatthrm .
43020017	yeshu avallodu : enne todarutu ; njan ituvare pitavinte adukyll kayarrippoyilla ; ekkilum nii ente sahedaranmarude adukyll chenu : ente pitavum ningallude pitavum ente daivavum ningallude daivavu mayavante adukyll njan kayarri ppokunu enu avarodu parrakenu parranju .
43020018	magdalakyaratti marriyvanu tan kattravine kandu enum avan ingane tannodu parranju enum shikshaynmarodu arriyichau .
43020019	avadtttinte onnam nall aayadivasam , neram vaikiyappoll shikshaynmar irunnsthlattu yehoodanmare pedichau vatill adechairikye yeshu vanu naduvill ninukondu : ningallkyu samadhanam enu avarodu parranju .
43020020	itu parranjidtu avan kayaum vilappurravum avare kannichau ; kattravine kandidtu shikshaynmar santokshichau .
43020021	yeshu pinneyum avarodu : ningallkyu samadhanam ; pitavu enne ayachaatupole njanum ningalle ayakyunnu enu parranju .
43020022	ingane parranjsheksham avan avarude mell uti avarodu : parishuddhatmavine kaikyollvin .
43020023	aarude papangall ningall mochikyunuvo avakyru mochikyppedtirikyunu ; aarude papangall nitturnuvo avakyru nittriyirikyunu enu parranju .

44004005	pittennall avarude prmannikallum mooppnmarum shasrti marum yerooshalemill onnichau koodi ;
44004006	mahapurohitanayhannavum kayaaphavum yohannanum aleksantarum mahapurohitvamshattilullavar okyeyum undayirunu .

44004011	viidu panniyunnavarayningall tallikyllanjidtu konninte moolakyllayittiinnar kallu ivan tanne .
44004012	matteruttnilum rakshilla ; nam rakshikyppeduvan aakashattin kiijhyill manukshayrude idayill nalkappedt verroru namavum illal .

44004016	i manukshayre entu cheyeendu ? prtaykshamayoru adayallam avar cheyatirikyunu enu yerooshalemill pakyrunnellavakyrum prsiddhmalela ; nikshedhippan namukyu kajhyivillal .
44004017	ekkilum atu janattill adhikam parakyatirippan avar yatoru manukshaynodum i namattill ini samsarikyrutenu nam avare trnam cheyeennam enu parranju .

44004022	i atbhutattall sekhaym prapichamanukshaynu nalpatill adhikam vayassullavanayirunu .
44004023	vidtyachasheksham avar koodtallikallude adukyll chenu mahapurohitanmarum mooppnmarum tangallodu parranjtu ellam arriyichau .

44004028	sambhavikyennam enu ninte kayaum ninte aalochanayum munniyamichaatu okyeyum cheyatirikyunu sataym .

44007001	itu ullatu tanneyo enu mahapurohitan chodichatinu avan parranjtu :
44007002	sahodaranmarum pitakynmarumaypurukshanmare , kellppin , nammude pitavayabraham haranill vanu pakyrum mube mesoppottamayyill irikyubo ll , tanne tejomayanaydaivam avanu prtaykshanayi :
44007003	ninte deshatteyum ninte chachaarkyareyum vidtu njan ninakyu kannichau tarunndeshattilekyu chellukenu parranju . angane avan kaldayarude desham vidtu haranill vanu pattru

44007012	misryiimill dhanaym undu enu kedtidtu yakyob nammude pitakynmare onnam pravashaym ayachau .
44007013	randam pravashaym yoseph tante sahodaranmarodu tannettan arriyichaum yosephinte vamsham pharravonu vellivayvanu .

44007020	akalattu moshe janichau , divaysundranayirunu ; avane moonu masam appnte viidtill potti .
44007021	pinne avane purrattidtppoll pharravonte makall avane eduttu tante makanayi vallattri .
44007022	moshe misryiimayrude sakalnjanavum abhaysichau vakyilum prvrattiyilum samatthrnayi ttiinur .
44007023	avanu nalpatuvayassu tikayarrayappoll yisrayell makyllaytante sahodaranmare chenu kannennam enu manassill tonni .
44007024	avarill oruttn anayayam eelkyunnatu kandidtu avanu tunnninu , misryiimayne adichau konu , piidditanu vendi prtikriycheyatu .
44007025	daivam tanmukhantaram avakyru rakshnalkum enu sahodaranmar grhikyum enu avan niroopichau ; ekkilum avar grhichaillal .
44007026	pittennall avar kalahichau kondirikyuboll avan avarude adukyll vanu : purukshanmare , ningallsahodarnmaralela ; tammill anayayam cheyaunnatu entu enu parrnju avare samadhanappeduttuvan nokyi .
44007027	ennall koodtukaranodu anayayam cheyaunnavan avane untikyllanju : ninne njangallkyu adhikariyum nayayakattravum aakyiyatu aar ?
44007028	innale misryiimayne konnatu pole enneyum kolluvan bhavikyunnuvo enu parranju .
44007029	i vakyu kedtidtu moshe oadippoyi midayan deshattu chenu pattru , avide randu putrnmare janippichau .
44007030	nalpatandu kajhyinjppoll siinaylayude marubhoomiyill oru daivadootan mull padapprile ijalayill avanu prtaykshanayi .
44007031	moshe adasharnam kandu ayarrppedtu , sookshichau nokyu van aduttu chelluboll :
44007032	njan ninte pitakynmarude daivamayi abrahaminte yum yisahakyinteyum yakyobinteyum daivam aaku nu enu kattravinte shabdam kedtu . moshe virrechaidtu nokyuvan tuninjillal .
44007033	kattravu avanodu : nii nilkyunnsthlam vishuddh bhoomiyakayall kalill ninu cherippu urikyllaka .
44007034	misryiimill ente janattinte piiddnjan kandu , avarude njarakyvum kedtu , avare viduvippan irrangivannirikyunu ; ippoll varika ; njan ninne misryiimilekyu ayakyum enu parranju .
44007035	ninne adhikariyumnayayakattravum aakyiyatar enningane avar tallipprranj i mosheye daivam mullpadapprill prtaykshanaydootan mukhantaram adhikariyum viindeduppukaranum aakyi ayachau .
44007036	avan misryiimilum chekkdalilum nalpatu samvram marubhoomiyilum atishayangallum adayallangallum cheyatu avare nadattikyondu vanu .
44007037	daivam ningallude sahodaranmarill ninu enneppole oru prvachakane ningallkyu ejhyunnelpichautarum enu yisrayell makyllodu parranj moshe avan tanne .
44007038	siinaylayill tannodu samsarichadootanodum nammude pitakynmarodum koode marubhoomiyile sabhayill irunnavanum namukyu taruvan jiivanullarullappadu labhichaavanum avan tanne .
44007039	nammude pitakynmar avanu kiijhyppeduvan manassillate avane tallikyllanju hradayam kondu misryiimilekyu pintirinju , aharonodu :
44007040	njangallkyu mumbayi nadappan daivangalle undakyittrika ; njangalle misryiimill ninu nadatti kyondu vannamoshekyu entu sambhavichau enu njangall arriyunnillalelenu parranju .
44007041	anneram avar oru kallakyudtiye undakyi , abimbattinu bali kajhyichau tangallude kaippnniyill ullasichau kondirunu .
44007042	daivavum pintirinju , aakashattile sainaytte aaradhippan avare kaividtu . " yisrayell grahame , ningall marubhoomiyill enikyu nalpatu samvram hananayagangallum bhojanayagangallum apprichauvo ?
44007043	ningall namaskyrippan undakyiysroopangallaymolokyinte koodaravum rephan devante nakshatrvum ningall eduttu nadanuvalela ; ennall njan ningalle babilonnappurram prvasippikyum " enu pavachakanmrude pusatkattill ejhyutiyirikyunuvalela .
44007044	nii kandamatirikyottvannm atine tiikyernnam enu moshayodu arullicheeyatvan kalpichaatu pole nammude pitakynmakyru marubhoomiyill sakshaykoodaram undayirunu .
44007045	nammude pitakynmar atu eettu vangi daivam nammude pitakynmarude mumbill ninu niikyikyllanj jatikallude avakashattilekyu yoshuvayumayi kondu vanu daviidinte kalam vare vechairunu .
44007046	avan daivattinte mumbake krapalabhichau , yakyobinte daivattinu oru vasasthlam undakyuvan anuvadam apekshichau .
44007047	shalomon avanu oru aalayam pannitu .
44007048	atayunnatan kaippnniyayatill vasikyunnilltanum .
44007049	" sggrm enikyu simhasanavum bhoomi ente padapiitthavum aakunu ; ningall enikyu panniyunnaalayam eetu vidham ?
44007050	ente vishrmasthlavum eetu ? itokyeyum ente kaiyllayo ungakyiyatu ennu kattravu arullicheeyaunu " enu prvachakan parrayunuvalela .

44010034	appoll paretas vayi turrannu parranju tudangiyatu : daivattinnu mukhapakshamillennum

44010042	jiivikallkyum marichaavakyrum nayayadhipatiyayi daivattall niyamikyppedtvan avan tanne ennu janattodu prsamgi chau sakshiikarippan avan njangallodu kalpichau .
44010043	avanill vishsikyunneevannum avante namam moolam papamochanam labhikyum ennu sakalprvachakanmarum sakshaym parrayunnu .

44010045	avar anaybhakshakallill samsarikyunnatum daivatte mahatiikarikyunnatum
44010046	kellkyyall paretasinodu koode vannpariedanakyaryvishasikall parishuddhatmavu enndanam jatikallude melum pakannartu kandu visyichau .

44010048	paretas avare yeshukrisatuvinte namattill sanam kajhyippippan kalpichau . avan childivasam avide tamasikyennam ennu avar apekshichau .
44011001	jatikallum daivavachanam kaikyondu ennu apposatlnmarum yehoodayyilullsahodaranmarum kedtu .
44011002	paretas yerooshalemill ettiyappoll pariedanakyar avanodu vadichau :
44011003	nii agrchammrikallude adukyll chennu avarodukoode bhakshichau ennu parranju .
44011004	paretas kayarrm aadimutall krmamayi avarodu vivarichau parranjtu :
44011005	njan yoppapadtnnattill pratthrichau kondirikyuboll vivashatayill oru dasharnam kandu : aakashattill ninnu nalu konnum kedti irrakyiyvaliytuppdtipole oru patrm ente adukylollam vannu .
44011006	atill njan sookshichau nokyiyappoll bhoomiyile nalkyalikalleyum kadtu mragangalleyum ijhyajatikalleyum aakashattile parravakalleyum kandu :
44011007	ejhyunnettu arruttu tinnukennu ennodu parrayunnoru shabdavum kedtu .
44011008	atinnu njan : orikylum padilla , kattrave ; malinamo ashuddhmo aayatonnum orikylum ente vayill chenni dtillalelennu parranju .
44011009	ashabdam pinneyum aakashattill ninnu : daivam shuddhii karichaatu nii malinam ennu vicharikyrutu ennu uttram parranju .
44011010	itu moonnu pravashaym undayi ; pinne ellam tirike aakashattilekyu valicheeduttu .
44011011	appoll tanne kaisayarryill ninnu ente adukyll ayachairunnmoonnu purukshanmar njangall pattr viidtinte mumbill ninnirunnu ;
44011012	onnum samshayikyate avarodukoode pokuvan aatmavu ennodu kalpichau . i aarru sahodaranmarum ennodukoode ponnu ; njangall apurukshante viidtill chennu .
44011013	avan tante viidtill oru dootan nilkyunnatu kandu ennum nii yoppyilekyu aallayachau paretas ennu marruperullshimone varuttuka ;
44011014	niiyum ninte graham mujhyuvanum rakshikyppeduvanullvakyukalle avan ninnodu samsarikyum ennu dootan parranju ennu njangallodu arriyichau .
44011015	njan samsarichau tudangiyappojhyekyu parishuddhatmavu adiyill nammude mell ennpele avarude melum vannu .
44011016	appoll njan : yohannan vellam kondu sanam kajhyippichau ; ningallkyo parishuddhatmavukondu sanam labhikyum ennu kattravu parranj vakyu oattru .
44011017	aakayall kattravayyeshukrisatuvill vishsichaavaraynamukyu tannatu pole ate danatte avakyrum daivam koduttu ekkill daivatte taduppan takyvannm njan aar ?
44011018	avar itu kedtppoll mindatirunnu : angane aayall daivam jatikallkyum jiivaprapatikyayi manasantaram nalkiyalelennu parranju daivatte mahatppedutti .
44011019	setphanos nimittm undayupadrvam hetuvall chitarrippoyavar yehoodanmarodallate mattarodum vachanam samsarikyate phoynikay , kurepas , anteyakyy ennii prdeshangallollam sanchrichau .
44011020	avarill chilar kurepaskyarum kurrenakyarum aayirunnu ; avar anteyakyyyill ettiysheksham yavananmarodum kattravayyeshuvine kyurrichaullsuvisheksham arriyichau .
44011021	kattravinte kai avarodukoode undayirunnu ; valiyo ru koodtm vishsichau kattravikklekyu tirinju .
44011022	avarekyurrichaulli vattrmanam yerooshalemile sabhayu de cheviyill ettiyppoll avar bannarbasine nteyakyy yollam parranjyachau .
44011023	avan chennu daivakrapkandu santokshichau . ellavarum hradayninnryattode kattravinodu chennaru nilpantakyvnnm prbodhippichau .
44011024	avan nallmanukshaynum parishuddhatmavinalum vishasttalum nirranjvanum aayirunnu ; vallare puruksharam kattravinodu chennaru .
44011025	avan sheline tiravan taserasilekyu poyi , vane kandettiyarre anteyakyyyilekyu koodtikyondu vannu .
44011026	avar oru samvram mujhyuvanum sabhayogangallill koodukyum bahujanatte upadeshikyyum cheyatu ; aadaym anteykyyyill vechau shikshaynmakyru krisatyanikall ennu per undayi .
44011027	akalattu yerooshalemill ninnu prvachakanmar anteyakyyyilekyu vannu .
44011028	avarill agabos ennu perulloruvan ejhyunnettu lokattill okyeyum mahakshamam undakum ennu aatmavinall prvachichau ; atu keldeyasinte kalattu sambhavichau .
44011029	appoll yehoodayyill pakyrunnsahodaranmarude utavikyayi shikshaynmarill oaroruttn prapatipole koduttyappan nischayichau .
44011030	avar atu nadatti , bannarbasinteyum shelinteyum kayaill mooppnmakyru koduttyachau .
44012001	akalattu herodarajavu sabhayill chilare piiddippikyendatinnu kai niidti .
44012002	yohannante sahodaranayyakyobine avan vall kondu konnu .
44012003	atu yehoodanmakyru prsadamayi ennu kandu avan paretasineyum pidichau . appoll pullippillatt appttinte perunall aayirunnu .
44012004	avane pidichasheksham pesahkajhyinjidtu janattinte mumbill nirruttuvan bhavichau tadavilakyi avane kappn nannalu chevakar ullnalu koodtttinnu eelpichau .
44012005	ingane paretasine tadavill sookshichau varuboll sabhshrddhyode avannu vendi daivattodu pratthrnkajhyichau ponnu .
44012006	herodavu avane janattinte mumbill nirruttuvan bhvichaatinte taleratriyill paretas randu changalayall bandikyppedtvanayi randu padayallikallude naduvill urrangu kayayirunnu ; vatilinte mumbill kavalkyar karagraham kattu kondirunnu .
44012007	pedtennu kattravinte dootan avade prtaykshanayi , arrayill oru vellichaam prkashichau . avan paretasine vilappurrattu tadti : vegam ejhyunnelky ennu parranju avane unnattri ; udane avante changalkaimell ninnu viinnu poyi .
44012008	dootan avanodu : arkedti cherippu idtu murrukyukennu parranju . avan angane cheyatu : ninte vasrtm putechau ente pinnale varikennu parranju .
44012009	avan pinnale chennu , dootan mukhantaram sambhavichaatu vasatvam ennu arriyate tan oru dasharnam kannunnu ennu niroopichau .
44012010	avar onnam kavalum randamattetum kadannu padtnnattill chellunnirimbu vatilkyll etti . atu avakyru stave tarrannu ; avar purrattirrangi oru teruvu kadannu , udane dootan avane vidtu poyi .
44012011	paretasinnu subodham vannidtu kattravu tante dootane ayachau herodavinte kayaill ninnum yehoodajanattinte sakalprtiikshayill ninnum enne viduvichau ennu njan ippoll vasatvamayi arriyunnu ennu avan parranju .
44012012	ingane grhichasheksham avan makyeras ennu marruperu llyohannante amm marriyayude viidtill chennu . avide anekar orumichau koodi pratthrichau kondirunnu .
44012013	avan padippurvatilkyll mudtiyarre rodennoru balaykyaratti villi kellppan aduttu vannu .
44012014	paretasinte shabdam tirichaarrinju , santokshattall padivatill turrakyate akattekyu oadi , paretas padippurekyll nilkyunnu ennu arriyichau .
44012015	avar avallodu : ninakyu bhrantundu ennu parranju ; avallo : alla , ullatu tanne ennu urrappichau parrayuboll avante dootan aakunnu ennu avar parranju .
44012016	paretas mudtikyondirunnu ; avar turrannappoll avane kandu visyichau .
44012017	avar mindatirippan avan aamgaym kadti , kattravu tanne tadavill ninnu purrappeduvichavivaram parranju kellppichau ; itu yakyobinodum sheksham sahodaranmrodum arriyippin ennu parranju ; pinne avan purrppedtu verroru sthlattekyu poyi .
44012018	neram velluttppoll paretas evideppoyi ennu padayallikallkyu alpamallatt paribhrmam undayi .
44012019	herodavu avane anevkshichaidtu kannaykayall kavalkyare visatrichau avare kolluvan kalpichau ; pinne avan yehooday vidtu kaisayarryilekyu poyi avide pattru .
44012020	avan soyarrrudeyum sidonayrudeyum nere kruddhichai rikyuboll rajavinte deshattu ninnu tangallude deshatti nnu aaharam kidtivarikayall avar eekamanassode avnte adukyll chennu , rajavinte palliyarrakyaranaylbasetasine vashattakyi sandikyayi apekshichau .
44012021	nischayichadivasattill herodavu rajavasrtm dharichau bhadrasanattill irunnu avarodu prsamgam kajhyichau .
44012022	itu manukshaynte shabdamalloru devante shabdam aretennu janam aattru .
44012023	avan daivattinnu mahatm kodukyaykayall kattrravinte dootan udane avane adichau , avan kramikyu irayayi prannane vidtu .
44012024	ennall daivavachanam melkyumell parannu kondirunnu .
44012025	bannarbasum shelum shushrookshnivattrichasheksham makyeras ennu marruperullyohannaneyum koodti kyondu yerooshalem vidtu madangipponnu .
44013001	anteyakyyyile sabhayill bannarbas , niigar ennu perullshimon , kurrenakyaranaylookeyas , idaprbhuvayherodavodukoode vallannar manayen , shell ennii prvachakanmarum upadeshtakynmarum undayirunnu .
44013002	avar kattravine aaradhichaum upavasichaum kondirikyu boll : njan bannarbasineyum shelineyum villichai rikyunnvelekyayidtu avare enikyu vertirippin ennu parishuddhatmavu parranju .
44013003	angane avar upavasichau pratthrichau avarude mell kaivechau avare parranjyachau .
44013004	parishuddhatmavu avare parranjyachaidtu avar selookayyi lekyu chennu ; avide ninnu kappll kayarri kurepas diipilekyu poyi ,
44013005	salamiisill chennu yehoodanmarude palliyill daivavachanam arriyichau . yohannan avakyru bhrataynayidtu undayirunnu .
44013006	avar diipillkoodi paphos vare chennappoll baryeshu ennu perullyehoodanayi kallaprvachaknayoru vidane kandu .
44013007	avan buddhimanayseggerys pelos enndeshadhipatiyodu koode aayirunnu ; avan bannarbasi neyum shelineyum varutti daivavachanam kellppan aagrhichau .
44013008	ennall eliimas ennvidan - itakunnu avante perinte atthrm - avarodu etittru ninnu deshadhipatiyude vishasam taduttukallavan shrmichau .
44013009	appoll pelos ennum perullshell parishuddhatm poonnrnayi avane uttunokyi :
44013010	he sakalkapadavum sakaldhoottrum nirranjvane , pishachinte makane , savarr niitiyudeyum shatruve , kattravinte nevarrjhyikalle marrichaukallayunnatu nii matiyakyukayillayo ?
44013011	ippoll kattravinte kai ninte mell viijhyum ; nii oru samayattekyu sooyarrne kannate kurudanayirikyum ennu parranju . udane oru timiravum irudtum avante mell viinnu ; kaipidichau nadattunnavare tiranju kondu avan tappi nadannu .
44013012	i undayatu deshadhipati kandidtu kattravinte upadeshattill visyichau vishsichau .
44013013	pelosum koodeyullavarum paphosill ninnu kappll niikyi , pamphulayadeshattile peggerkyu chennu . avide vechau yohannan avare vidtu pirinju yerooshalemi lekyu madangippoyi .
44013014	avaro peggryill ninnu purrappedtu pisidayadeshattile anteyakyyyill etti shabaat nallill palliyill chennu irunnu .
44013015	nayayaprmannavum prvachakangallum vayichau tiinnarppoll palli prmannikall avarude adukyll aallayachau : sahodaranmare , ningallkyu janattodu prbodhanam vallatum undakkill parravin ennu parrayichau .
44013016	pelos ejhyunnettu aamgaym kadti parranjtu : yisrayell purukshanmarum daivabhtanmarum aayullore , kellppin .
44013017	yisrayell janattinte daivam nammude pitakynmare tiranjeduttu , misryiim deshattile prvasakalattu janatte vaddhrippichau , bhujaviiyarrm kondu avide ninnu purrappeduvichau ,
44013018	marubhoomiyill nalpatu samvrakalattollam avarude sbhavam sahichau ,
44013019	kanan deshattile eejhyu jatikalle odukyi , avarude desham avakyru avakashamayi vibhagichau koduttu . angane eekadesham nanoottmbatu samvram kajhyinju .
44013020	atinte sheksham avan avakyru shamoovell prvachakan vare nayadhipatimare koduttu .
44013021	anantaram avar oru rajavine chodichau ; daivam avakyru benayamiin gotrkyaranaykiishinte makan sheline nalpatandekyu koduttu .
44013022	avane niikyiidtu daviidine avakyru rajavayi vajhyichau : njan yishshayiyude makanaydaviidine enikyu bodhichapurukshanayi kandu ; avan ente hitam ellam cheyaum ennu avanekyurrichau sakshaym parranju .
44013023	avante santatiyill ninnu daivam vagdattm cheyattu pole yisrayelinnu yeshu ennrakshitavine koduttu .
44013024	avante varavinnu mube yohannan yisrayell janattinnu okyeyum manasantarattinte sanam prsamgichau .
44013025	yohannan jiivakalam tikavarrayappoll : ningall enne aar ennu niroopikyunnu ? njan mashiihayalla ; avan ente pinnale varunnu ; avante kalile cherippu ajhyippan njan yogaynallennu parranju .
44013026	sahodaranmare , abraham vamshattile makyllum avarodu chennar daivabhtanmarumayullore , namukyakunnu i rakshavachanam ayachairikyunnatu .
44013027	yerooshalem nivasikallum avarude prmannikallum avaneyo shabaattutorrum vayichau varunnprvachakanmarude vachanangalleyo tirichaarriyate avane shikshekyu vidhikyyall avekyu nivrattivarutti .
44013028	marannattinnu oru hetuvum kannanjidtum avane kolelnnam ennu avar piilattosinodu apekshichau .
44013029	avanekyurrichau ejhyutiyirikyunnatu okyeyum tikechasheksham avar avane marattill ninnu irrakyi oru kallarrayill vechau .
44013030	daivamo avane marichaavarill ninnu uyitterjhyunnelpichau ;
44013031	avan tannodukoode galiilayill ninnu yerooshalemilekyu vannavakyru eerriydivasam prtaykshanayi ; avar ippoll janattinte mumbake avante sakshikall aakunnu .
44013032	daivam pitakynmarodu cheyat vagdattm yeshuvine uyatterjhyunnelpichaatinnall makyllkyu nivattrichairikyunnu ennu njangall ningallodu suvishekshikyunnu .
44013033	nii ente putrn ; innu njan tinne janippichau ennu randam sakkiittrnattill ejhyutiyirikyunnuvalela .
44013034	ini drvatttilekyu tiriyatavannm avan avane marichaavarill ninnu ejhyunnelpichaatinekyurrichau avan : daviidinte sthiramayullvishuddh krapakalle njan ningallkyu nalkum ennu parranjirikyunnu .
44013035	mattoru sakkiittrnattilum : ninte parishuddhne drvatm kanman nii vidtukodukyyillennu parrayunnu .
44013036	daviid tante talamurrayill daivattinte aalochanekyu shushrookshcheyat sheksham nidr prapichau tante pitakynmarodu chennaru drvatm kandu .
44013037	daivam uyitterjhyunnelpichaavano drvatm kandilla .
44013038	aakayall sahodaranmare , ivan moolam ningallodu papamochanam arriyikyunnu ennum
44013039	mosheyude nayayaprmannattall ningallkyu niitiikarannam varuvan kajhyiyatt sakalattill ninnum vishsikyunneevanum ivanall niitiikarikyppedunnu ennum ningall arrinju kollvin .
44013040	aakayall , " he nindkyare , nokyuvin ; ayarrppedtu nashichau pokuvin . ningallude kalattu njan oru prvratti cheyaunnu ; ningallodu vivarichaall ningall vishsikyatt prvratti tanne "
44013041	ennu prvachakapusatkangallill arullicheeyatirikyunnatu ningallkyu bhavikyatirippan sookshichau kollvin .
44013042	avar palli vidtu pokuboll pitte shabaattill i vachanam tangallodu parrayennam ennu avar apekshichau .
44013043	palli pirinjsheksham yehoodanmarilum bhtiyullyehoodmatanusarikallilum palar pelosineyum bannarbasineyum anugamichau : avar avarodu samsarichau daivakrapayill nilanilkyendatinnu avare utsahippichau .
44013044	pitte shabaattill eekadesham padtnnam mujhyuvanum daivvachanam kellppan vannu koodi .
44013045	yehoodanmaro puruksharatte kandu asooynirranjvarayi dukshichau kondu pelos samsarikyunnatinnu etir parranju .
44013046	appoll pelosum bannarbasum dhaiyarrm poondu : daivavachanam aadaym ningalloadu parrayunnatu aavashaymayirunnu ; ennall ningall atine talli ningalle ttnne nitayjiivannu ayogayr ennu vidhichau kallayunnatinall ita , njangall jatikallilekyu tiriyunnu .
44013047	" nii bhoomiyude attttollavum rakshaakendatinnu njan ninne jatikallude vellichaamakyi vechairikyunnu . " ennu kattravu njangallodu kalpichaidtundu ennu parranju .
44013048	jatikall itu kedtu santokshichau daivavachanatte mahatppedutti , nitayjiivannayi niyamikyppedtvar ellavarum vishsichau .
44013049	kattravinte vachanam anadtill engum vayapichau .
44013050	yehoodanmaro bhtiyullmanaysrtiikalleyum padtnnattile prdhanikalleyum illakyi pelosinteyum bannarbasinteyum nere uvadrvamundakyi avare tangallude atirukallill ninnu purrattakyikyllanju .
44013051	ennall avar tangallude kalile podi avarude nere tadtikyllanju ikyonayyilekyu poyi .
44013052	shikshaynmar santokshavum parishuddhatmavum nirranjvarayi ttiinnaru .
44014001	ikyonayyill avar orumichau yehoodanmarude palliyill chennu yehoodanmarilum yavananmarilum valiyoru puruksharam vishsippan takyvannm samsarichau .
44014002	vishsikyatt yehoodanmaro jatikallude manassu sahodaranmarude nere illakyi vakshallakyi .
44014003	ennall avar vallarekyalam avade pattru , kattravill aashryichau pragatdyttode prsamgichau kondirunnu ; avan tante krapayude vachanattinnu sakshininnu , avarude kayaall adayallangallum atdutangallum undakuvan varam nalki .
44014004	ennall padtnnattile janasamooham bhinnichau chilar yehoodanmarude pakshattilum chilar apposatlanmarude pakshattilum aayi .
44014005	avare avamanipparum kalelrrivanum jatikallum yehoodanmarum avidatte prmannikallodukoodi oru aakrmam bhavichaappoll
44014006	avar atu grhichau lusrt , debarr ennlukyvonay padtnnangallilekyum chuttumulldeshattilekyum oadippoyi
44014007	avide suvisheksham arriyichau ponnu .
44014008	lusrtyill ammyude gabharm mutall mudantanayi orikylum nadannidtillateyum kalinnu shtiyillateyum ulloru purukshan irunnirunnu .
44014009	avan pelos samsarikyunnatu kedtu ; avan avane uttu nokyi , sekhaym prapippan avannu vishasamundu ennu kandidtu :
44014010	nii ejhyunnettu kaloonni nivinnaru nilky ennu urrakye parranju ; avan kuticheejhyunnettu nadannu .
44014011	pelos cheyattu puruksharam kandidtu : devanmar manukshay roopattill nammude adukyll irrangi vannirikyunnu ennu lukyvonay bhakshayill nilavillichau parranju .
44014012	bannarbasinnu indrn ennum pelos mukhay prsamgiyakayall avannu budhan ennum per villichau .
44014013	padtnnattinte mumbilullindrkshetrttile purohitan kallakalleyum poomalakalleyum gopurattikkll kondu vannu puruksharattodukoode yagam kajhyippan bhavichau .
44014014	itu apposatlanmaraybannarbasum pelosum kedtidtu vasrtm kiirrikyondu puruksharattinte idayilekyu oadicheennu nilavillichau parranjtu :
44014015	purukshanmare , ningall i cheyaunnatu entu ? njangall ningallodu samas bhavamullmanukshayr aret ningall i vaytthr kayarrngalle vidtu , aakashavum bhoomiyum samudrvum avayilullsakalavum undakyiyjiivanulldaivatti kklekyu tiriyennam ennullsuvisheksham njangall ningallodu arriyikyunnu .
44014016	kajhyinj kalangallill avan sakaljatikalleyum sntavajhyikallill nadappan sammtichau .
44014017	ekkilum avan nanmcheykayum aakashattu ninnu majhyayum phalapushtiyullkalangallum ningallkyu tarikayum aaharavum santokshavum nalki ningalle trapatrakyukayum cheyatu ponnatinall tannekyurrichau sakshaym taratirunnidtillal .
44014018	avan ingane parranju tangallkyu yagam kajhyikyatavannm puruksharatte pryasattode taduttu .
44014019	ennall anteyakyyyill ninnum ikyonayyill ninnum yehoodanmar vannu koodi puruksharatte vashattakyi pelosine kalelrrinju ; avan marichau ennu vicharichaidtu avane padtnnattinnu purrattekyu ijhyechau kallanju .
44014020	ennall shikshaynmar avane chuttinilkyyill avan ejhyunnettu padtnnattill chennu ; pittennall bannarbasi nodu koode deberrkyu poyi .
44014021	apadtnnattilum suvisheksham arriyichau palareyum shikshayrakyiysheksham avar lusrt , ikyonay , anteyakay ennpadtnnangallilekyu madangicheennu ,
44014022	vishasattill nilanillkyennam ennum nam anekam kashtangallillkoodi daivarajayttill kadakyendatakunnu ennum prbodhippichau shikshaynmarude manassu urrappichau ponnu .
44014023	avar sabhatorrum avakyru mooppnmare niyamikyyum upavasichaum pratthrichaum kondu tangall vishsichakattravikkll avare bharamelpikyyum cheyatu .
44014024	avar pisidayyill koodi kadannu pamphulayyill etti ,
44014025	peggryill vachanam prsamgichasheksham attleykyu poyi
44014026	avide ninnu kappll kayarri anteyakyyyilekyu poyi ; tangall nivattrichavelakyayi daivakrapayill avare bharamelpichaayachaatu avide ninnu aayirunnuvalela .
44014027	avide ettiyasheksham sabhaye orumichau koodti , daivam tangallodukoode irunnu cheyattokyeyum jatikallkyu vishasattinte vatill turrannu kodutttum arriyichau .
44014028	pinne avan shikshaynmarodukoode kurrekyalam avide pattru .
44015001	yehoodayyill ninnu chilar vannu : ningall moshe kalpichaaacharam anusarichau pariedaneelkyanjall rakshprapippan kajhyikayillennu sahodaranmare upadeshichau .
44015002	pelosinnum bannarbasinnum avarodu alpamallatt vadavum takyrvum undayidtu pelosum bannarbasum avarill mattu chilarum i takyrsamgatiyepptti yerooshalemill apposatlanmarudeyum mooppnmarudeyum adukyll pokennam ennu nischayichau .
44015003	sabhavare yatr ayachaidtu avar phoyniikyyyilum shamayarryilum koodi kadannu jatikallude manasantaravivaram arriyichau sahodaranmakyru mahasantoksham varutti .
44015004	avar yerooshalemill ettiyarre sabhayum apposatlanmarum mooppnmarum avare kaikyendu ; daivam tangallodukoode irunnu cheyattokyeyum avar arriyichau .
44015005	ennall pariishapakshattill ninnu vishsichaavar chilar ejhyunnettu avare pariedankajhyippikyyum mosheyude nayayaprmannam aacharippan kalpikyyum vennam ennu parranju .
44015006	i samgatiyekyurrichau vicharippan apposatlanmarum mooppnmarum vannukoodi ,
44015007	vallare takyrm undayasheksham paretas ejhyunnettu avarodu parranjtu : sahodaranmare , kurre nall mube daivam ningallill vechau njan mukhantaram jatikall suvishekshavachanam kedtu vishsikyennam ennu nischayichaatu ningall arriyunnuvalela .

44015010	aakayall nammude pitakynmakyrum namukyum chumappan kajhyinjidtillatt nukam shikshaynmarude kajhyuttill veppan ningall ippoll daivatte pariikshikyunnatu entu ?
44015011	kattravayyeshuvinte krapayall rakshprapikyum ennu nam vishsikyunnatu pole avarum vishsikyunnu .
44015012	janasamooham ellam mindate bannarbasum pelosum daivam tangalle kyondu jatikallude idayill cheyaichadayallangallum atdutangallum ellam vivarikyunnatu kedtu kondirunnu .

44015014	daivam tante namattinnayi jatikallill ninnu oru janatte eduttu kollvan aadaymayidtu kadakshichaatu shimon vivarichauvalela .

44015019	aakayall jatikallill ninnu daivattikklekyu tiriyunnavare nam asahayppeduttate
44015020	avar vigrhamalinayngall , parasamgam , shsam mudtichaatttu , rtam ennivvrichairippan nam avakyru ejhyutennam ennu njan abhiprayappedunnu .
44015021	mosheyude nayayaprmannam shabaattutorrum pallikallill vayichau varunnatinall poovarrkalam mutall padtnnam torrum atu prsamgikyunnavar undalela .
44015022	appoll tangallill chilpurukshanmare tiranjeduttu pelosinodum bannarbasinodum koode anteyakyyyilekyu ayakyennam ennu apposatlanmarum ooeppnmarum savarrsabhayum ninnryichau , sahodaranmarill prmannappedt purukshanmaraybarshabas ennyoodayeyum shiilasineyum niyogichau .
44015023	avarude kaivasham ejhyuti ayachaatentennall : apposatlanmarum mooppnmaraysahodaranmarum anteyakyyyilum surriyayilum kilikyyyilum jatikallill ninnu chennar sahodaranmakyru vandnam .
44015024	njangall kalpankodukyate chilar njangallude idayill ninnu purrappedtu ningalle vakyukallall bhrmippichau ningallude hradayangalle kalakyikyllanju ennukellky kondu
