44016001	avan deberryilum lusrtyilum chennu . avide vishasamulloru yehoodasrtiiyude makanayi timotheyos ennu perulloru shikshayn undayirunnu . avante appn yavananayirunnu .
44016002	avan lusrtyilum ikyonayyilumullsahodaranmarall nallsakshaym kondavan aayirunnu .
44016003	avan tannodukoode porennam ennu pelos ichchichau ; avante appn yavayan ennu avidangallilullyehoodanmar ellavarum arrinjirunnatinall avare vicharichau avane pariedankajhyippichau .
44016004	avar padtnnam torrum chennu yerooshalemile apposatlnmarum mooppnmarum vidhichaninnryangall prmannikyendatinnu avakyru eelpichau koduttu .
44016005	angane sabhakall vishasattill urrekyyum ennttill divasenperukukayum cheyatu .
44016006	avar aasayyill vachanam prsamgikyrutennu parishuddhatmavu vilakyukayall phrugayyilum galatay deshattilum koodi sanchrichau ,
44016007	musayyill etti : bithuneykyu pokuvan shrmichau ; yeshuvinte aatmavo avare sammtichailla .
44016008	avar musay kadannu retavasill etti .
44016009	avide vechau pelos ratriyill makyedonay kyaranayoru purukshan arike ninnu : nii makyedoneykyu kadannu vannu njangalle sahayiky ennu tannodu apekshikyunnatayi oru dasharnam kandu .
44016010	i dasharnam kandidtu avarodu suvisheksham arriyippan daivam njangalle villichairikyunnu ennu nischayichau , njangall udane makyedoneykyu purrappeduvan shrmichau .
44016011	angane njangall retavasill ninnu kappll niikyi nere samotrakyeyilekyum pittennall navapolikyum avide ninnu phalippiyilekyum chennu .
44016012	itu makyedonayyude abhagatte oru prdhanapadtnnavum rromakyar kudiyerrippattrtum aakunnu . apadtnnattill njangall chiladivasam pattru .
44016013	shabaattu nallill njangall gopurattinnu purrattekyu poyi avide pratthrnasthlam undayirikyum ennu njangall vicharichau pujhyavakyttu irunnu ; avide koodi vannsrtiikallodu samsarichau .
44016014	tuyattairpadtnnakyarattiyum rtambaram vilkyunnvallumayi ludiyennu perulldaivabhtyayoru srtii kedtu kondirunnu . pelos samsarichaatu shrddhikyendatinnu kattravu avallude hradayam tarrannu .
44016015	avallum kudubavum sanam eettsheksham : ningall enne kattravill vishsat ennu enniyirikyunnu vekkill ente viidtill vannu papprin ennu apekshichau njangalle nibarrndichau .
44016016	njangall pratthrnasthlattekyu chelluboll vellichappadattiyayi lakshannam parranju yajamananmakyru vallare labham varuttunnoru balaykyaratti njangalle etirettu .
44016017	avall pelosinteyum njangalludeyum pinnale vannu : i manukshayr atayunnatanaydaivattinte dasanmar , rakshamaggrm ningallodu arriyikyunnavar ennu villichau parranju .
44016018	ingane avall palanall cheyatu vannu . pelo mukshinju tirinju nokyi avallilullbhootattodu : avalle vidtu pokuvan njan yeshukrisatu vinte namattill ninnodu kalpikyunnu ennu parranju . anajhyikayill tanne atu avalle vidtu poyi .
44016019	avallude yajamananmar tangallude labhattinte aashpoyepayatu kandidtu pelosineyum shiilasineyum pidichau , chantasthlattu prmannikallude adukylekyu valichau kondu poyi
44016020	adhipatikallude mumbill nirrutti : yehoodanmarayi manukshayr nammude padtnnatte kalakyi ,
44016021	rromakyaraynamukyu amgiikarippanum anusarippanum nayayamallatt aacharangalle prsamgikyunnu ennu parranju .
44016022	puruksharavum avarude nere illaki ; adhipatikall avarude vasrtm parrichaurinju koll kondu avare adippan kalpichau .
44016023	avare vallare adippichasheksham tadavill aakyi karagrahprmanniyodu avare sookshttode kappan kalpichau .
44016024	avan inganeyullkalpankidtukayall avare akatte tadavill aakyi avarude kall aamattill idtu poodti .
44016025	addhrratrikyu pelosum shiilasum pratthrichau daivatte padi satutichau : tadavukar shrddhichau kondirunnu .
44016026	pedtennu valiyoru bhookambam undayi , karagrahattinte adisthanam kulungi vatill okyeyum turrannu poyi , ellavarudeyum changalajhyinju viinnu .
44016027	karagrahaprmanni urrakyunnannaru karagrahattinte vatilukall tarrannirikyunnatu kandidtu changalakyar oadippoykyllanju ennu uhichau valloori tannettan kolluvan bhavichau .
44016028	appoll pelos : ninakyu oru dokshavum cheyaarutu ; njangall ellavarum ivide undalelennu urrakye villichau parranju .
44016029	avan vellichaam chodichau akattekyu chadi virrechaum kondu pelosinteyum shiilasinteyum mumbill viinnu .
44016030	avare purrattu kondu vannu : yajamananmare , rakshprapippan njan entu cheyeennam ennu chodichau .
44016031	kattravayyeshuvill vishsiky ; ennall niiyum ninte kudumbavum rakshaprapikyum ennu avar parranju .
44016032	pinne avar kattravinte vachanam avanodum avante viidtilullellavarodum prsamgichau .
44016033	avan ratriyill , anajhyikayill tanne , avare koodti kyondu poyi avarude murrivukalle kajhyuki ; tanum tanikyullavarellavarum tamasiyate sanam eettu .
44016034	pinne avare viidtill kaikyondu avakyru bhakshannam koduttu , daivattill vishsichaatill viidadakym aanandichau .
44016035	neram pulannarppoll adhipatikall kolkyare ayachau : amanukshayre vidtyakyennam ennu parrayichau .
44016036	karagrahprmanni i vakyu pelosinodu arriyichau : ningalle vidtyappan adhipatikall aallayachairikyunnu ; aakayall samadhanattode pokuvin ennu parranju .

44017002	pelos pativu pole avarude adukyll chennu moonnu shabaattill tiruvejhyuttukalle aadharamakyi avarodu vadichau .
44017003	krisatu kashtam anubhavikyyum marichaavarill ninnu uyitterjhyu nnelkyyum cheyeendatu ennum njan ningallodu arriyikyunni yeshu tanne krisatu ennum telliyichau vivarichau kondirunnu .

44017008	itu kedtidtu puruksharavum nagaradhipanmarum bhrmichau

44017018	eppikyooyarrrum setayikyrum aaytat njanikallill chilar avanodu vadichau . i viduvayan entu parravan pokunnu ennu chilarum avan yeshuvineyum punarutthanatteyum prsamgiky kondu : ivan anay devatakalle ghokshikyunnavan ennu tonnunnu ennu mattu chilarum parranju .
44017019	pinne avane pidichau arayopagakyunninmell kondu chennu : nii prsatavikyunni naviinopadesham innatu ennu njangallkyu arriyamo ?

44017021	ennall athenar okyeyum avide vannu pakyrunnparadeshikallum vallputumayum parrakayo kellkyyo cheyvanallate mattonninnum avasaramullavarallal .
44017022	pelos arayopagamaddhey ninnu kondu parranjtu : athenapurukshanmare , ningall ellattilum atibhtanmar ennu njan kannunnu .

44017025	tan ellavakyrum jiivanum shasavum sakalavum kodukyunnavan aakayall vallatinnum mudtullavan ennpole manukshakaikallall shushrookshaavashayppedunnilla .

44017028	avanilalelnam jiivikyyum charikyyum irikyyum cheyaunnatu . angane ningallude kavivaranmarilum chilar : " nam avante santanamalela " ennu parranjirikyunnu .
44017029	nam daivattinte santanam ennu varikayall daivam manukshaynte shilpavidayyum sakklpavum kondu kottittii kyrunnpon , velli , kallu ennivayodu sadrasham ennu niroopikyendatallal .

44017031	tan niyamichapurukshan mukhantaram lokatte niitiyill nayayam vidhippan avan oru divasatte nischayichau ; avane marichaavarill ninnu uyitterjhyunnelpichaatinall ellavakyrum atinte urrappu nalkiyumirikyunnu .
44017032	marichaavarude punarutthanattekyurrichau kedtidtu chilar parihasichau ; mattu chilar : njangall itinepptti pinneyum ninte prsamgam kellkyum ennu parranju .

44018001	anantaram avan athenvidtu korintill chennu .
44018002	yehoodanmar ellavarum rromanagaram vidtu pokennam ennu keldeyas kalpichaatu kondu ittlayyill ninnu idekyu vannavanayi pontoskaran akilas ennu perulloru yehoodaneyum avante bhayarr priskyillayeyum kandu avarude adukyll chennu .
44018003	tojhyill onnakakondu avan avarodukoode pattru velcheyatu ponnu ; tojhyilo koodarappnniyayirunnu .
44018004	ennall shabaattorrum avan palliyill samvadichau yehoodanmareyum yavayanmareyum sammtippichau .
44018005	shiilasum timotheyosum makyedonayyill ninnu vannarre pelos vachanghokshannattill shukshkyanti poondu yeshu tanne krisatu ennu yehoodanmakyru sakshiikrichau .
44018006	avar etir parrakayum dukshikyyum cheykayall avan vasrtm kudanju : ningallude nashattinnu ningall tanne uttravadikall ; njan nimmrlan : inimell njan jatikallude adukyll pokum ennu avarodu parranju .
44018007	avan avidam vidtu tiittos yusetas ennoru daivabhtante viidtill chennu ; avante viidu palliyodu todtirunnu .
44018008	palliprmanniyaykrisepas tante sakalkudubatto dum koode kattravill vishsichau ; korintayrill anekar vachanam kedtu vishsichau sanam eettu .
44018009	ratriyill kattravu dasharnattill pelosinodu : nii bhayappedate prsamgiky ; mindatirikyrutu ;
44018010	njan ninnodu koode undu ; aarum ninne kayeettm cheyatu dokshppeduttukayilla ; i padtnnattill enikyu vallare janam undu ennu arullicheeyatu .
44018011	angane avan orandum aarru masavum avarude idayill daivavachanam upadeshichau kondu tamasichau .
44018012	galliyon akhayayill deshadhipati yayi vajhyuboll yehoodanmar pelosinte nere orumanppedtu ejhyunnettu , avane nayasanattinte mumbake kondu chennu :
44018013	ivan nayayaprmannattinnu virodhamayi daivatte bhajippan manukshayre sammtippikyunnu ennu parranju .
44018014	pelos vayaturrappan bhavikyuboll galliyon yehoodanmarodu : yehoodanmare : vallanayayamo vallatt patakamo aayirunnekkill njan kshamayode ningallude sakkdam kellkyumayirunnu .
44018015	vachanatteyum namangalleyum ningallude nayayaprmanntteyum sambandichaulltakyr samgatikall ekkilo ningall tanne nokyi kyollvin ; i vakekyu nayayadhipati aakuvan enikyu manassillennu parranju
44018016	avare nayyasanattikkll ninnu purrattakyi .
44018017	ellavarum palli prmanniyaysosthnesine pidichau nayayasanattinte mumbill vechau adichau ; itu onnum galliyon koodtakyiyillal .
44018018	pelos pinneyum kurrenall pattrsheksham sahodaranmarodu yatr parranjidtu , tanikyu oru nechaar undayirunnatinall kemkryayill vechau talksheram cheyaichaidtu priskyillayodum akilasinodum koode kappll kayarri surriyayilekyu purrappedtu
44018019	ephesosill etti avare avide vidtu , avan palliyill chennu yehoodanmarodu sambhakshichau .
44018020	kurrekyoode tamasikyennam ennu avar apekshichaidtu avan sammtikyate :
44018021	daivahitamundekkill njan ningallude adukyll madangi varum ennu parranju vidavangi ephesosill ninnu kappll niikyi ,
44018022	kaisayarryill vannirrangi , yerooshalemilekyu chennu , sabhaye vandnam cheyatidtu antokyyyilekyu poyi .
44018023	avide kurrenall tamasichasheksham purrappedtu , krmattale galataydeshattilum phrugayyilum sanchrichau shikshaynmare okyeyum urrappichau .
44018024	alaksantriyakyaranayi vagaivbhavavum tiruvejhyuttu kallill samatthryvumullappolelas ennu perulloru yehoodan ephesosill etti .
44018025	avan kattravinte maggrttill upadesham labhichaavan aayirunnu ; yohannante sanattekyurrichau matrm arrinjirunnu ekkilum aatmavill erivullavanakayall avan yeshuvinte vasatutsookshmayi prsatavikyyum upadeshikyyum cheyatu .
44018026	avan palliyill pragatdyttode prsamgichau tudangi ; akilasum priskyillayum avante prsamgam kedtarre avane chettrukondu daivattinte maggrm adhikam spashtamayi avannu telliyichau koduttu .
44018027	avan akhayayilekyu pokuvan ichchichaappoll sahodaranmar avane utsahippikyyum avane kaikyellendatinnu shikshaynmakyru ejhyutukayum cheyatu ; avide ettiyarre avan daivakrapayill vishsichaavakyru pallare pryojanamayittiinnur .
44018028	yeshu tanne krisatu ennu avan tiruvejhyuttukallall telliyichau balattode yehoodanmare parasaymayi khandichau kallanju .
44019001	appolelas korintill irikyuboll pelos ullprdeshangallill koodi sanchrichau ephesosill etti chilshikshaynmare kandu :
44019002	ningall vishsichaidtu parishuddhatmavine prapichauvo ennu avarodu chodichaatinnu : parishuddhatmavu undennu polum njangall kedtidtillennu avar parranju .
44019003	ennall eetayirunnu ningallude sanam ennu avan avarodu chodichaatinnu : yohannante sanam ennu avar parranju .
44019004	atinnu pelos : yohannan manasantarasanmaretkajhyippichau tante pinnale varunnavanayyeshuvill vishsikyennam ennu janattodu parranju ennu parranju .
44019005	itu kedtarre avar kattravayyeshuvinte namattill sanam eettu .
44019006	pelos avarude mell kaivechaappoll parishuddhatmavu avarude mell vannu avar anaybhakshakallill samsarikyyum prvachikyyum cheyatu .
44019007	apurukshanmar ellam koodi pantrndollam aayirunnu .
44019008	pinne avan palliyill chennu daivarajayttekyurrichau samvadichaum sammtippichaum kondu moonnu masattollam pragatdyttode prsamgichau .
44019009	ennall chilar katthinappedtu anusarikyate puruksharatti nte mumbake i maggrtte dukshichaappoll avan avare vidtu shikshaynmare vertirichau , turrannosinte patthashalyill dinabrti samvadichau ponnu .
44019010	atu randu samvrattollam nadakyyall aasayyill pakyrunnyehoodanmarum yavananmarum ellam kattravinte vachanam kellppan idayayi .
44019011	daivam pelos mukhantaram asadharannayayviiyarr prvrattikalle cheyaikyyall
44019012	avante meyemll ninnu rroomalum uttriiyavum rogikallude mell kondu vannidukayum vayadhikall avare vidtu marrukayum duratmakyll purrappedukayum cheyatu .
44019013	ennall deshantarikallayi nadakyunnmantrvadikallaychilyehoodanmar : pelos prsamgikyunnyeshuvinte namattill njan ningallodu aannayidunnu ennu parranju yeshuvinte namam cholluvan tuninju .
44019014	ingane cheyatvar mahapurohitanayskyevennoru yehoodante eejhyu putrnmar aayirunnu .
44019015	duratmavu avarodu : yeshuvine njan arriyunnu ; pelosineyum parichayamundu ; ennall ningall aar ennu chodichau .
44019016	pinne duratmavullmanukshayn avarude mell chadi avare iruvareyum kiijhyadakyi jayiky yall avar nrum murrivettvaru mayi aviidtill ninnu oadippoyi .
44019017	itu ephesosill pakyrunnsakalyehoodanmarum yavananmarum arrinju : avakyru okyeyum bhayam tadti , kattravayyeshuvinte namam mahimappedtu .
44019018	vishsichaavarill anekarum vannu tangallude prvrattikalle eettu parranju arriyichau .
44019019	kshudrpryogam cheyatirunnpalarum tangallude pusatkangalle chudtukallanju ; avayude vilkannakyu koodtiyarre ambatinayiram vellikyashu ennu kandu .
44019020	ingane kattravinte vachanam shtiyode parannu prbalappedtu .
44019021	itu kajhyinjidtu pelos makyedonayyilum akhayayilum koodi kadannu yerooshalemilekyum pokennam ennu manassill nischayichau : njan avide chennasheksham rromayum kannennam ennu parranju .
44019022	tanikyu shushrookshcheyaunnavarill timotheyos , erasetas ennrandu pere makyedonayyilekyu ayachaidtu tan kurre kyalam aasayyill tamasichau .
44019023	akalattu i maggrtte cheealli valiykalaham undayi .

44019025	avan avareyum avakayill ullppedt velakyareyum koodti varutti : purukshanmare , nammude sambadaym i tojhyi ll kondu aakunnu ennu ningallkyu boddhy malela .
44019026	ennall i pelos ennavan kayaall tiittrtu devanmar allennu parranju kondu ephesosill matrmalla , mikyvarrum aasayyill okyeyum vallare janangalle sammtippichau marrichau kallanju ennu ningall kandum kedtum irikyunnu valela .
44019027	atinall nammude i kayarrm aakshepattill aakuvan aduttirikyunnatu mallate attermis mahadeviyude kshetrm eetumillennu varikayum aasay mujhyuvanum bhootalvum bhajichau porunnavallude mahatmym odungippokayum cheyaum ennu parranju .
44019028	avar itu kedtu rekadham nirranjvarayi : ephesayrude attermis mahadevi ennu aattru .
44019029	padtnnam mujhyuvanum kalaham kondu nirranju , avar pelosinte koodtu yatrkyaraygayos , arisatheras ennmakyedonayre pidichaukondu ramgasthlattekyu orumanappedtu panju chennu .
44019030	pelos janasamoohattill chelluvan bhavichaarre shikshaynmar avane vidtillal .
44019031	aasaydhipanmarill chilar avante senhitanmar aakayall ; ramgasthlattu chennu pokarutu ennu avarum avante adukyll aallayachau apekshichau .

44019033	yehoodanmar mubodtu untikyondu vannalaksantarine puruksharattill chilar samsarippan utsahippichau ; alaksantar aamgaym kadti janasamoohattodu prtivadi ppan bhavichau .
44019034	ennall avan yehoodan ennu arrinjppoll : ephesayrude attermis mahadevi ennu ellavarum koodi randumanni nerattollam eekshabdattode aattru kondirunnu .

44019036	itu etir mojhyiyillatttakayall ningall tidukymayi onnum cheyaate adangippakyerndatakunnu .
44019037	i purukshanmare ningall koodtikyondu vannu valela ; avar kshetrm kavachaar cheyaunnavaralla , nammude deviye dukshikyunnavarumalla .

44019039	verre kayarrm cholali aakunnu vadam ekkill dhammr sabhayill tiikyramalela .

44019041	ingane parranju avan sabhaye pirichau vidtu .
44020001	kalaham shamichasheksham pelos shikshaynmare koodtivarutti prbodhippichaidtu yatr parranju makyedoneykyu purrappedtu poyi .
44020002	aprdeshangallill koodi sanchrichau avare eerriyonnu prbodhippichaidtu yavanadeshattu etti .

44020005	avar mube poyi retavasill njangallkyayi kattirunnu .

44020007	avadtttinte onnam divasattill njangall appm nurrukyuvan koodivannappoll pelos pittennall purrappeduvan bhavichaatu kondu avarodu sambhakshichau patiravareyum prsamgam niidti .

44021022	aakayall entakunnu vendatu ? nii vannidtundu ennu avar kellkyum nischayam .

44021024	avare koodtikyondu avarodu koode ninne shuddhi varutti avarude talksheram cheyeendatinnu avakyru vendi chelavucheyka ; ennall ninne kyondu kedttu ullatallennum niiyum nayayaprmannatte aacharichau krmamayi nadakyunnavan ennum ellavarum arriyum .
44021025	vishsichairikyunnjatikalle sambandicheeavar vigrhappritavum rtavum shasammudtichaatttum parasamgavum matrm ojhyinjirikyennam ennu vidhichau ayachaidtundalela .
44021026	angane pelos apurukshanmare koodtikyondu pittennall avarodukoode tanne shuddhi varutti daivalayattill chennu ; avarill oaroruttnnu vendi vajhyipadu kajhyippanullshuddhiikarannakalam tikanju ennu bodhippichau .
44021027	aeejhyudivasam tiirarrayappoll aasayyill ninnu vannyehoodanmar avane daivalayattill kandidtu puruksharatte okyeyum illakyi avane pidichau ;
44021028	yisrayell purukshanmare , sahayippin ; ivan aakunnu janattinnum nayayprmannattinnum i sthlattinnum virodhamayi ellayidattum ellavareyum upadeshikyu nnavan ; avan yavananmareyum daivalayattill koodti kyonduvannu i vishuddh sthlam tiindichau kallanju ennu villichau kooki .
44021029	avar uebe ephesaynayretaphimosine avanodu koode nagarattill kandatinall pelos avane daivalayattill koodti kyondu vannu ennu niroopichau .

44021032	avan kshannattill padayallikalleyum shatadhipanmareyum koodtikyondu avarude nere panjuvannu ; avar sahasradhipaneyum padayallikalleyum kandappoll pelosine adikyunnatu nirrutti .
44021033	sahasradhipan aduttuvannu avane pidichau randu changalaveppan kalpichau ; aar ennum entu cheyatu ennum chodichau .

44021035	padikyedtinmell aayappoll : avane konnu kallakennu aattru kondu janasamooham pin chellukayall
44021036	puruksharattinte balalkyaram pedichaidtu padayallikall avane edukyendivannu .
44021037	kodtyill kadakyumarrayappoll pelos sahasradhipanodu : enikyu ninnodu oru vakyu parrayamo ennu chodichau . atinnu avan : ninakyu yavanabhaksharriyamo ?
44021038	kurre nall mube kalaham undakyi nalayiram kadtarakyare marubhoomiyilekyu koodtikyondu poymisryiimayn nii allayo ennu chodichau .
44021039	atinnu pelos : njan kilikayyill taseras ennprsiddh nagarattile peranayoru yehoodan aakunnu . janattodu samsarippan anuvadikyennam ennu apekshikyunnu ennu parranju .
44021040	avan anuvadichaappoll pelos padikyedtinmell ninnu kondu janattodu aamgaym kadti , vallare menamaysheksham ebrayabhakshayill villichau parranjtavitu :
44022001	sahodaranmarum pitakynmarumayullore , enikyu innu ningallodullprtivadam kedtu kollvin .
44022002	ennall ebraybhakshayill samsarikyunnatu kedtidtu avar adhikam menamayi ninnu . avan parranjte ntennall :
44022003	njan kilikayyile taserasill janichayehoodanum i nagarattill vallannaru gamaliyelinte kalkyll irunnu pitakynmarude nayayaprmannam sookshtayode abhaysichavanumakayall ningall ellavarum innu irikyunnatu pole daivasevayill erivullavanayirunnu .
44022004	njan purukshanmareyum srtiikalleyum pidichau kedti tadavill eelpichaum i maggrkyare kolluvanum madikyate upadrvichaum vannu .
44022005	atinnu mahapurohitanum mooppnmarude samgham okyeyum enikyu sakshikall ; avarodu sahodaranmkyrayi ejhyuttu vangikyondu damaskyosill pakyrunnvareyum pidichau kedti dandnattinnayi yerooshalemi lekyu kondu varendatinnu njan avidekyu yatr yayi .
44022006	angane pryannam cheyatu damaskyosinodu aduttppoll eekadesham ucheekyu pedtennu aakashattu ninnu valiyoru vellichaam ente chuttum minni .
44022007	njan nilattu viinnu : shele , shele , nii enne upadrvikyunnatu entu ennu ennodu parrayunnoru shabdam kedtu .
44022008	kattrave , nii aar ennu njan chodichaatinnu : nii upadrvikyunnnasarrayanayyeshu aakunnu njan ennu avan ennodu parranju .
44022009	ennodu koodeyullavar vellichaam kandu ekkilum ennodu samsarikyunnavante shabdam kedtillal .
44022010	kattrave njan entu cheyeennam ennu chodichaatinnu kattravu ennodu : ejhyunnettu damaskyosilekyu poka ; nii cheyeendatinnu vidhichairikyunnatellam avide ninnodu parrayum ennu kalpichau .
44022011	avellichaattinte tejassu hetuvayidtu kannu kannay kayall koodeyullavar enne kaikyu pidichau nadatti ; angane njan damaskyosill etti .

44026015	nii aarakunnu kattrave , ennu njan chodichaatinnu kattravu : nii uvadrvikyunnyeshu tanne njan ;
44026016	ekkilum ejhyunnettu nivinnaru nilky ; nii enne kandati nnum ini njan ninakyu prtaykshan aavanirikyunnatinnum ninne shushrookshakanum sakshiyumayi niyamippan njan ninakyu prtaykshanayi .
44026017	janattinteyum jatikalludeyum kayaill ninnu njan ninne rakshikyum .
44026018	avakyru papamochanavum ennilullvishasattall shuddhii karikyppedtvarude idayill avakashavum labhikyendatinnu avarude kannu turrappanum avare irullill ninnu vellichaattilekyum sattante adhikarattill ninnu daivattikklekyum tirippanum njan ippoll ninne avarude adukyll ayakyunnu ennu kalpichau .
44026019	atu kondu agripprajave , njan sggriiydasharnatti nnu anusarannakyedu kannikyate
44026020	aadaym damaskyosilum yerooshalemilum yehoodaydeshttengum ullavarodum pinne jatikallodum manasantarppedtu daivattikklekyu tirinju manasantarattinnu yogaymayprvrattikall cheyeennam ennu prsamgichau .
44026021	itu nimittm yehoodanmar daivalayattill vechau enne pidichau kolluvan shrmichau .
44026022	ennall daivattinte sahayam labhikyyall njan innu vare nilkyyum cherriyavarodum valiyavarodum sakshaym parranju porukayum cheyaunnu .
44026023	krusatu kashtam anubhavikyyum marichaavarude punarutthanttill aadaynayi janattodum jatikallodum vellichaam arriyikyyum cheyaum ennu prvachakanmarum mosheyum bhavikalatte kyurrichau prsatavichaatojhyike verreyo nnum njan parrayunnillal .
44026024	ingane prtivadikyyill phesetas : pelose , ninakyu bhrantundu ; vidayabahutttall ninakyu bhrantu pidichairikyunnu ennu urrakye parranju .
44026025	atinnu pelos : rajashrii phesetase , enikyu bhrantilla ; njan satayvum subodhavumayvakyretsamsarikyunnatu .
44026026	rajavinnu itinekyurrichau arrivullatu kondu avanodu njan pragatdyttode samsarikyunnu ; avannu itu onnum marravayirikyunnillennu enikyu nischayamundu ; atu oru konnill nadannatallal .
44026027	agripprajave , prvachakanmare vishsikyunnuvo ? vishsikyunnu ennu njan arriyunnu ennu parranju .
44026028	agripppelosinodu : njan krisatyaniyayi ttiiruvan nii enne alpam kondu sammtippikyunnu ennu parranju .
44026029	atinnu pelos : nii matrmalla , innu ente prsamgam kellkyunnavar ellavarum alpam kondakadte adhikam kondakadte i changalojhyike enne ppole aakennam ennu njan daivattodu aksheikyunnu ennu parranju .
44026030	appoll rajavum deshadhipatiyum bennariikyyum avarodukoode irunnavarum ejhyunnettu marrininnu :
44026031	i manukshayn marannattinno changalekyo yogaymayatu onnum cheyatidtillennu tammill parranju .
44026032	kaisare abhayam chollayirunnilelkkill avane vidtyappn kajhyiyumayirunnu ennu agrippavu phesetasinodu parranju .
44027001	njangall kappll kayarri italeykyu pokennam ennu kalpanyayappoll pelosineyum mattu chiltadavukareyum ogusaty padtallattile shatadhipanayyooliyosine eelpichau .
44027002	angane njangall aasaykyrpatti oaduvanulloru adrmutty kapplill kayarri niikyi ; tesslonikyyill ninnullmakyedonaykyaranayarisatherasum njangallodu koode undayirunnu .
44027003	pittennu njangall siidonill etti ; yooliyos pelosinodu daykannichau , senhitanmarude adukyll poyi salkyaram kaikyollvan anuvadichau .
44027004	avide ninnu njangall niikyi , kattu prtikoolamakayall kurepas diipinte marrapatti oadi ;
44027005	kilikay pamphulay kadall vajhyiyayi chennu lukyiyayile murrppdtnnattill etti .
44027006	avide shatadhipan italeykyu pokunnoru aleksantriyakyppll kandu njangalle atill kayatti .
44027007	pinne njangall bahudivasam patukye oadi , kiidos tookyill pryasattode etti , kattu sammtikyaykyall rekatt diipinte marrpatti shalemanekyu nere oadi ,
44027008	karapatti pryasattode lasayapadtnnattinte samiipattu shubhaturramukham ennu perullsthlattu etti .
44027009	ingane vallare nall chennsheksham nombum kajhyinjiri kye kapplodtm vaikshamaym aakkondu pelos :
44027010	purukshanmare , i yatryill charakyinnum kapplinnum matrmallnammude prannangallkyum eerriykashtanashtangall varum ennu njan kannunnu ennu avare prbodhippi chau .
44027011	shatadhipano pelos parranjtinekyall malumiyudeyum kappludamasthnteyum vakyu adhikam vishsichau .
44027012	aturramukham shiitakalam kajhyippan takytallaykayall avide ninnu niikyi tekyu padinjarrayum vadakyu padinjarrayum turrannu kidakyunnphoyiikay ennrekattturramukhattu kajhyivundekkill chennu shiitakalam kajhyikyennam ennu mikyperum aalochanparranju .
44027013	tekyn kattu mandmayi utukayall talpayaarm sadhichau ennu tonni , avar avide ninnu nakkooram eduttu rekatt diipinte marrpatti oadi .
44027014	kurre kajhyinjidtu atinnu virodhamayi ishatamoolan ennkodukkattu adichau .
44027015	kappll kattinte nere nilpan kajhyiyatvannm kudungukyall njangall kaividtu angane parrippoyi .
44027016	keldenncherriydiipinte marrpatti odiidtu pryasattode tonni kaivashamakyi .
44027017	atu valichau kayattiidtu avar kappll chuttikyedtiyum mattum urrappu varutti ; pinne mannattidtmell akappedum ennu pedichau payi irrakyi angane parrippoyi .
44027018	njangall kodukkattinall atayntam alayukkondu pittennu avar charakyu purrattu kallanju .
44027019	moonnam nall avar sntakayaall kappllkyoppum kadalill idtu kallanju .
44027020	vallare nallayidtu sooyaarneyo nakshatrngalleyo kannateyum vallatt kodukkattu adichau kondum irikyyall njangall rakshappedum ennullaashokyeyum attu poyi .
44027021	avar vallare padtinni kidannsheksham pelos avarude naduvill ninnu kondu parranjtu : purukshanmare , ente vakyu anusarichau rekattyill ninnu niikyateyum i kashtanashtangall sambadikyateyum irikyendatayirunnu .
44027022	ekkilum ippoll dhaiyaarttodirippan njan ningallodu apekshikyunnu ; kapplinnu allate ningallill aarudeyum prannannu hani varikayillal .

44027025	atu kondu purukshanmare , dhaiyaarttodirippin ; ennodu arullicheeyattu pole tanne sambhavikyum ennu njan daivatte vishsikyunnu .
44027026	ekkilum nam oru diipinmell mudti viijhyendatakunnu .

44027033	neram vellukyarrayappoll pelos ellavarodum bhakshannam kajhyikyendatinnu apekshichau : ningall onnum bhakshi kyate kattu kondu padtinni kidakyunnatu innu patinnalam divasam aakunnuvalela .
44027034	atu kondu aaharam kajhyikyennam ennu njan ningallodu apekshikyunnu ; atu ningallude rakshekyullatlela ; ningallill oruttnteyum talayile oru romam po lum nashtamakayillnischayam ennu parranju .

44028006	avan viikyrukayo pedtennu chattu viijhyukayo cheyaum ennu vechau avar kattuninnu ; vallare neram kattu ninnidtum avannu aapattu onnum bhavikyunnillennu kandu manassu marri avan oru devan ennu parranju .

44028014	avade sahodaranmare kandu tangallodu koode eejhyu nall tamasikyennam ennu avar apekshichau ; pinne njangall rromayill etti .
44028015	avidatte sahodaranmar njangallude vattrmanam kedtidtu apaypuravum trimandpavum vare njangalle etirettu vannu ; avare kandidtu pelos daivatte vajhytti dhaiyaarm prapichau .
44028016	rromayill ettiysheksham tanikyu kavalaypadayalliyodu koode verridtu pappran pelosinnu anuvadam kidti .
44028017	moonnu divasam kajhyinjidtu avan yehoodanmarill prdhanikallayavare villippichau . avar vannu koodiyappoll avarodu parranjtu : sahodaranmare , njan janattinno pitakynmarude aacharangallkyo virodhamonnum cheyatidti llatirikye enne yerooshalemill ninnu baddhnayi rromkyarude kayaill eelpichau .
44028018	avar visatrichaarre marannayogaymayatu onnum ennill kannaykayall enne vidtyappan avakyru manassundayi runnu .
44028019	ennall yehoodanmar etir parrakayall njan kaisare abhayam cholelndivannu ; ente jatiyude nere anayayam bodhippippan enikyu yatonnum undayidtlltanum .
44028020	itu hetuvayi ningalle kandu samsarikyennam ennu vechau njan ningalle villippichau . yisrayelinte prtayashnimittm aakunnu njan i changalchumakyunnatu .
44028021	avar avanodu : ninte samgatikyu yehoodayyill ninnu njangallkyu ejhyuttu varikayo sahodaranmarill aarum vannu ninnekyondu yatoru dokshavum parrakayo cheyatidtillal .
44028022	ekkilum i matabhedattinnu ellayidattum virodham parrayunnu ennu njangall arriyunnatinnall ninte matam innatu ennu nii tanne parranju kellppan aagrhikyunnu ennu parranju .
44028023	oru divasam nischayichaidtu palarum avante pappridattill avante adukyll vannu ; avarodu avan daivarajay ttinnu sakshaym parranju mosheyude nayayaprmannavum prvachakapusatkangallum aadharamakyi yeshuvinekyurrichau avakyru bodham varumarru ravile tudangi sandyvare vivarichau ;
44028024	avan parranjtu chilar sammtichau ; chilar vishsichaillal .

44028026	" ningall chevikondu kedtidtum grhikyatirikyum ; kannukondu kandidtum kannatirikyum ; kannu kondu kannateyum chevikondu kellkyateyum hradayam kondu grhichau manantiriyateyum

45001002	tante prvachakanmar mukhantaram mumbukoodti vagdattm cheyat suvishekshattinnayi vertirichau villikyppedt apposatlanum yeshukrisatuvinte dasanumaypelos
45001003	rromayill daivattinnu priyarum villikyppedt vishuddhnmarumayellavakyrum ejhyutunnatu :
45001004	nammude pitavaydaivattikkll ninnum kattravayyeshukrisatuvikkll ninnum ningallkyu krapayum samadhanavum undakadte .
45001005	jaddam sambandichau daviidinte santatiyill ninnu janikyyum marichaidtu uyitterjhyunnelkyyall vishuddhiyude aatmavu sambandichau daivaputrn ennu shtiyode ninnryikyppedukayum cheyatirikyunnavanalalel

45001007	avarill yeshukrisatuvinnayi villikyppedt ningallum ullppedtirikyunnu .

45001009	njan idavidate ningalle oattrukondu daiveshtttall eppoll ekkilum ningallude adukyll varuvan sadhikyendatinnu ente pratthrnayill eppojhyum yachikyunnu

45001011	ningallude sthiriikarannattinnayi aatmikavaram vallatum ningallkyu nalkendatinnu ,
45001012	atayatu ningallkyum enikyum ottorumichaullvishasttall ningallodukoode enikyum aashasam labhikyendtinnu njan ningalle kannman vanchikyunnu .
45001013	ennall sahodaranmare , enikyu sheksham jatikallill ennapole ningallilum vallphalavum undakendatinnu ningallude adukyll varuvan palappojhyum bhavichau ekkilum ituvare mudakym vannu ennu ningall arriyatirikyrutu ennu njan aagrhikyunnu .
45001014	yavananmakyrum babarranmakyrum njanikallkyum buddhihiinakyrum njan kadakyaran aakunnu .
45001015	angane rromilullningallodum suvisheksham arriyippan ennall aavollam njan orungiyirikyunnu .
45001016	suvishekshattekyurrichau enikyu lyilla ; vishsikyunneevannum aadaym yehoodannum pinne yavanannum atu rakshekyayi daivashtiyakunnuvalela .
45001017	atill daivattinte niiti vishasam hetuvayum vishasattinnayikyondum vellippedunnu . " niitiman vishasattall jiivikyum " ennu ejhyutiyirikyunnuvalela .
45001018	aniitikondu sataytte tadukyunnmanukshayrude sakalabhtikyum aniitikyum nere daivattinte kopam sggrttill ninnu vellippedunnu .
45001019	daivattekyurrichau arriyakunnatu avakyru vellivayiri kyunnu ; daivam avakyru vellivakyiyalela .
45001020	avante nitayshtiyum divaytvumayi avante adrashay lakshannangall lokasrashti mutall avante prvrattikallall buddhikyu vellivayi vellippedtu varunnu ; avakyru prtivdamillatirikyendatinnu tanne .
45001021	avar daivatte arrinjidtum avane daivamennu oattru mahatiikarikyyo nandi kannikyyo cheyaate tangallude niroopannangallill vaytthrrayittiinnaru , avarude vivekami llatt hradayam irundu poyi .
45001022	njanikall ennu parranju kondu avar mooddharayippoyi ;
45001023	akshayanaydaivattinte tejassine avar kshayamullmanukshayn , pakshi , nalkyali , ijhyajati ennivayude roopasadrashaymayi mattikyllanju .
45001024	atu kondu daivam avare tangallude hradayangallile mohangallill sntashariirangalle tammill tammill avamani kyendatinnu ashuddhiyill eelpichau .
45001025	daivattinte sataym avar vayajamakyi mattikyllanju , srashtichaavanekyall srashtiye bhajichau aaradhichau ; avan ennekyum vajhyttppedtvan , aamen .
45001026	atukondu daivam avare avamanaragangallill eelpichau ; avarude srtiikall sabhavikabhogatte sbhavaviruddhmkyikyllanju .
45001027	avaannm purukshanmarum sabhaviksrtiibhogamvidtu aneynaym kamam jlichau aannodu aan avalakshannamayatu prvattrichau . ingane avar tangallude vibhrmattinnu yogaymayprtiphalam tangallill tanne prapichau .
45001028	daivatte parinjanattill dharippan ishtamillanjtinnu takyvannm daivam avare uchitamallatttu cheyvan nikrashtabuddhiyill eelpichau .
45001029	avar sakalaniitiyum dushtatayum atayagrhavum dubaaru ddhiyum nirranjvar ; asooya , kula , pinnakym , kapadam , dushshiilam ennivtingiyavar ,
45001030	kurallakyar , eekshannikyar , daivadevkshikall , nikshtthooranmar , gavaarikshtthanmar , aatmprshamsakyar , putudoksham sakklpikyu nnavar , matapitakynmare anusarikyattvar , buddhihiinar ,
45001031	niyamalamghikall , vlaymillattvar , kanivattvar .
45001032	i vakprvrattikyunnavar marannayogayr ennulldaivanayayam avar arrinjidtum avaye prvattriky matrmallprvattrikyunnavarill prsadikyyumkoode cheyaunnu .
45002001	atukondu vidhikyunneetu manukshaynumayullove , ninakyu prtivadam parravan illa ; anayne vidhikyunnatill nii ninnettnne kuttm vidhikyunnu ; vidhikyunnnii atu tanne prvattrikyunnuvalela .
45002002	ennall aavakprvattrikyunnavarude nere daivattinte vidhi satayanusarannayayirikyunnu ennu nam arriyunnu .
45002003	aavakprvattrikyunnavare vidhikyyum atu tanne prvattrikyyum cheyaunnmanukshaya , nii daivattinte vidhiyill ninnu tetti ojhyiyum ennu ninekyunnuvo ?
45002004	alla , daivattinte dayninne manasantarattilekyu nadattunnu ennu arriyate nii avante daya , kshama , diigharkshanti ennivayude eeshyaarm nirasikyunnuvo ?
45002005	ennall ninte katthinayttalum anutapamillatt hradayattalum nii daivattinte niitiyullvidhi vellippedunnkopadivasattekyu ninakyu tanne kopam charatichau vekyunnu .
45002006	avan oaroruttnnu avanavante prvrattikyu taky pakaram cheyaum .
45002007	nallprvrattikyu vendunnsthiratpoondu tejassum manavum akshayatayum anevkshikyunnavakyru nitayjiivanum ,
45002008	shatthaym poondu sataym anusarikyate aniiti anusarikyunnavakyru kopavum rekadhavum kodukyum .
45002009	tinmprvattrikyunneetu manukshayatmavinnum kashtavum sakkdavum aadaym yehoodannum pinne yavanannum varum .
45002010	nanmprvattrikyunneevannum mahatvum manavum samadhanavum aadaym yehoodannum pinne yavanannum labhikyum .
45002011	daivattinte pakyll mukhapaksham illalela .
45002012	nayayaprmannam illate papam cheyatvar okyeyum nayayaprmannam koodate nashichau pokum ; nayayaprmannam undayidtu papam cheyatvar okyeyum nayayaprmannattall vidhikyppedum .
45002013	nayayaprmannam kellkyunnavaralldaivasannidhiyill niitimanmar ; nayayaprmannam aacharikyunnavararetniitiikarikyppedunnatu .

45007021	angane nanmcheyvan ichchikyunnnjan tinmente pakyll undu ennoru prmannam kannunnu .
45007022	ullam kondu njan daivattinte nayayaprmannattill rasikyunnu .

45007025	nammude kattravayyeshu krisatu mukhantaram njan daivattinnu setatrm cheyaunnu . ingane njan tanne buddhikondu daivattinte prmannatteyum jaddam kondu papattinte prmannatteyum sevikyunnu .

45012021	tinmayodu tolkyate nanmayall tinmaye jayikyuka .

46002005	ente vachanavum ente prsamgavum njanattinte vashiikarannvakyukallall alla , aatmavinteyum shtiyudeyum prdasharnattalaretaayirunnatu .
46002006	ennall tikanjvarude idayill njangall njanam samsarikyunnu ; i lokattinte njanamallnashichau pokunnavarayi lokattinte prbhukynmarude njanavumalla ;
46002007	daivam lokasrashtikyu mube nammude tejassinnayi munni yamichaatum marranjirunnatumaydaivattinte njanamaretmammrmayi njangall prsatavikyunnu .
46002008	atu i lokattinte prbhukynmar aarum arrinjilla ; arrinjirunnu ekkill avar tejassinte kattravine krooshikyyillayirunnu .
46002009	" daivam tanne senhikyunnavakyru orukyiidtullatu kannu kandidtilla , chevi kedtidtilla , oru manukshaynteyum hradayatti ll tonniidtumilla " ennu ejhyutiyirikyunnatu pole tanne .
46002010	namukyo daivam tante aatmavinall vellippeduttiyiri kyunnu ; aatmavu sakalatteyum daivattinte aajhyangalle yum aarayunnu .
46002011	manukshaynilullatu avanile manukshatmavallate manukshayri ll aar arriyum ? avaannmtanne daivattilullatu daivtmavallate aarum grhichaidtillal .
46002012	namo lokattinte aatmavine alla , daivam namukyu nalkiyatu arrivanayi daivattill ninnullaatmavi ne aretprapichaatu .
46002013	atu njangall manukshanam upadeshikyunnvachanangallall alla , aatmavu upadeshikyunnvachanangallall tanne prsatvichau kondu aatmikanmakyru aatmikamayatu telliyikyu nnu .
46002014	ennall prakratmanukshayn daivatmavinte upadesham kaikyellunnilla ; atu avannu bhokshatm aakunnu . aatmikamayi vivechikyendatakayall atu avannu grhippan kajhyiyunnatumallal .
46002015	aatmikano sakalatteyum vivechikyunnu ; tan aaralum vivechikyppedunnatumillal .
46002016	kattravinte manassu arrinju avane grhippikyakunnvan aar ? namo krisatuvinte manassullavar aakunnu .
46003001	ennall sahodaranmare , ningallodu enikyu aatmikanmrodu ennpole alla , jaddikanmarodu ennpole , krisatuvill shishukyllayavarodu ennpole aretsam sarippan kajhyinjullu .
46003002	bhakshannamalla , pall aretnjan ningallkyu tannatu ; bhakshi ppan ningallkyu kajhyivillayirunnu ; ippojhyum kajhyivayidti lla ; innum ningall jaddikanmaralela .
46003003	ningallude idayill iksharyyum pinnakyvum irikye , ningall jaddikanmarum sheksham manukshayreppole nadakyunnvarumallayo ?
46003004	oruttn : njan pelosinte pakshakyaran ennum mattoruttn : njan appolelasinte pakshakyaran ennum parrayuboll ningall sadharannamanukshayrallayo ?
46003005	appolelas aar ? pelos aar ? tangallkyu kattravu nalkiyatu pole ningall vishsippan karannamayittiinnar shushrookshakyarareta .
46003006	njan nadtu , appolelas nanechau , daivamaretvallarumrrakyiyatu .

46003008	nadunnavanum nanekyunnavanum oru pole ; oaroruttnnu tantante addhvanattinnu ottvannm kooli kidtum .
46003009	njangall daivattinte koodtu velakyar ; ningall daivatti nte krakshi , daivattinte grahanimmrannam .
46003010	enikyu labhichadaivakrapekyu ottvannm njan njanamu lloru prdhanshilpiyayi adisthanam idtirikyunnu ; mattoruttn miite panniyunnu ; tan engane panniyunnu ennu oaroruttnum nokyikyelladte .
46003011	yeshukrisatu ennidtirikyunnadisthanamallate mattonnu iduvan aakyrum kajhyikayillal .
46003012	adisthanattinmell aarekkilum ponnu , velli , vilayerriykallu , maram , pullu , vaikyoll ennivpanniyunnu ekkill avanavante prvratti vellippedtuvarum ;
46003013	adivasam atine tellivakyum ; atu tiiyode vellippedtuvarum ; ororuttnte prvratti innvidham ennu tii tanne shodhancheyaum .
46003014	oruttn pannitprvratti nilanilkyum ekkill avannu prtiphalam kidtum .
46003015	oruttnte prvratti ventu poyekkill avannu chetam varum ; tano rakshikyppedum ; ennall tiiyillkoodi ennpole areta .
46003016	ningall daivattinte mandiram ennum daivattinte aatmavu ningallill vasikyunnu ennum arriyunnillayo ?

46003018	aarum tannettan vanchikyrutu ; tan i lokattill njani ennu ningallill aakyerkkilum tonniyall avan njaniyakendatinnu bhokshanayittiiradte .

46003022	peloso , appolelaso , kephavo , lokamo , jiivano , marannamo , ippojhyullato , varuvanullato sakalavum ningallkyullatu .
46003023	ningallo krisatuvinnullavar ; krisatu daivattinnullavan .
46004001	njangalle krisatuvinte shushrookshakyarum daivamammrngallude grahavicharakanmarum enningane oaroruttn ennikyo lladte .
46004002	grahavicharakanmarill anevkshikyunnato avar vishsatryirikyennam ennareta .
46004003	ningallo manukshayr kajhyikyunnvallvisatarattilo enne vidhikyunnatu enikyu etryum laghukayaarm ; njan enne ttnne vidhikyunnatumillal .
46004004	enikyu yatoru kuttttekyurrichaum bodhamilelkkilum atinall njan niitiman ennu varikayilla ; enne vidhikyunnatu kattravu aakunnu .
46004005	aakayall kattravu varuvollam samayattinnu mube onnum vidhikyrutu ; avan irudtill marranjirikyunnatu vellichaattkyi hradayangallude aalochanakalle vellippeduttum ; annu ororuttnnu daivattikkll ninnu puk undakum .
46004006	sahodaranmare , itu njan ningall nimittm enneyum appolelasineyum udteshichau parranjirikyunnatu : ejhyutiyirikyunnatinnu appurram ( bhavikyatirippan ) njangallude drashtantam kandu patthikyendatinnum aarum oruttnnu anukoolamayum mattoruvannu prtikoolamayum chiittru pokatirikyendatinnum tanne .

46004008	itr kshannattill ningall sambannanmarayi ; njangalle koodte vajhyunnavarayi ; ayeea , ningallodu koode njangallum vajhyendatinnu ningall vannu ekkill kollayirunnu .

46005010	atu i lokattile dunnardappukarodo atayagrhikllodo pidichau parrikyarodo vigrharadhikallodo arutu ennallalela ; angane ekkill ningall lokam vidtu pokendivarum .
46005011	ennall sahodaran ennu per pedt oruvan dunnardappu karano atayagrhiyo vigrharadhiyo vavikshanannkyarano madaypano pidichau parrikyarano aakunnu ekki ll avanodu samsaggrm arutu ; anganeyullavanodukoode bhakshannam kajhyikypolum arutu ennaretnjan ningallkyu ejhyutiyatu .
46005012	purrattullavare vidhippan enikyu entu kayaarm ? ningall akattullavare allayo vidhikyunnatu ; purrattullavare daivam vidhikyunnu .
46005013	adushtane ningallude idayill ninnu niikyikyllavin .

46007008	vivaham kajhyiyattvarodum vidhavamarodum : avar enne ppole pattru kondall avakyru kollam ennu njan parrayunnu .

46007011	bhayaar bhattravine verrupiriyarutu ; pirinju ennu varikilo vivaham koodate pakyernnam ; alelnnu varikill bhattravodu nirannu kollennam ; bhattravu bhayaarye upekshikyyumarutu .

46007015	avishasi verrupiriyunnu ekkill piriyadte ; i vakyill sahodarano sahodariyo baddhrayirikyunnilla ; ennall samadhanattill jiivippan daivam namme villichai rikyunnu .
46007016	srtiiye , nii bhattravinnu rakshvaruttum ennu ninakyu engane arriyam ? puruksha , nii bhayeerkyu rakshvaruttum ennu ninakyu engane arriyam ?
46007017	ennall oaroruttnnu kattravu vibhagichau kodutttu poleyum oaroruttne daivam villichaatu poleyum avanavan nadakydte ; ingane aakunnu njan sabhakallilum apikyunnatu .
46007018	oruttn pariedanayode villikyppedtuvo ? agrchammrm varuttrutu ; oruttn agrchammrttode villikyppedtuvo ? pariedaneelkyrutu .
46007019	pariedanonnumilla , agrchammrvum onnumilla , daivakalpanprmannikyunnataretkayaarm .
46007020	oaroruttn villikyppedt sthitiyill tanne vasichau kolladte .

46007022	dasanayi kattravill villikyppedtvan kattravinte stantrn aakunnu . angane tanne stantrnayi villikyppedtvan krisatuvinte dasanakunnu .
46007023	ningalle vilekyu vangiyirikyunnu ; manukshaykyru dasanmarkarutu .
46007024	sahodaranmare , oaroruttn villikyppedt sthitiyill tanne daivasannidhiyill vasikydte .
46007025	kanaykamarekyurrichau enikyu kattravinte kalpanayilla ; ekkilum vishsatn aakuvantakyvannm kattravinte karunnlabhichaavanayi njan abhiprayam parrayunnu .
46007026	ippojhyatte kashtatnimittm njan parranjtu pole manukshayn angane tanne irikyunnatu avannu nannu ennu enikyu tonnunnu .

46007028	nii vivaham cheyatalum dokshamilla ; kanaykayum vivaham cheyatall dokshamilla ; ekkilum inganeyullavakyru jaddattill kashtatundakum ; atu ningallkyu vararutu ennu ente aagrham .

46007032	ningall chintakulamillattvarayirikyennam ennu njan ichchikyunnu . vivaham cheyaattvan kattravine engane prsadippikyum ennu vechau lokattinnullatu chintikyu nnu ;
46007033	vivaham cheyatvan bhayaarye engane prsadippikyum ennu vechau lokattinnullatu chintikyunnu .
46007034	atu pole bhayaaryayavallkyum kanaykekyum tammill vaytayasam undu . vivaham kajhyiyattvall shariirattilum aatmavilum vishuddhyakendatinnu kattravinnullatu chintikyunnu ; vivaham kajhyinjvall bhattravine engane prsadippikyum ennu vechau lokattinnullatu chinti kyunnu .
46007035	njan itu ningallkyu kudukyiduvanalla , yogaytvichari chaum ningall chapalaym koodate kattravikkll sthiramay vasikyendatinnum ningallude upakarattinnayidtretparrayu nnatu .

46007037	ekkilum nibaarndmillate tante ishtam nadattuvan adhi karamullavanum hradayattill sthiratayullavanumayoruvan tante kanaykaye sookshichau kollvan snthradayatti ll ninnryichau ekkill avan cheyaunnatu nannu .
46007038	angane oruttn tante kanaykaye vivaham kajhyippikyunntunannu ; vivaham kajhyippikyatirikyunnatu eerre nannu .
46007039	bhattravu jiivichairikyunnkalattollam srtii bandikyppedtiri kyunnu ; bhattravu marichau poyall tanikyu manassullavarumyi vivaham kajhyivan satantrm undu ; kattravill vish sikyunnavanumayi matrme aakavu .

46008001	vigrhappritangallude kayaarm parranjalo namukyellavakyrum arrivu undu ennu namukyu arriyam . arrivu chiipprikyunnu ; senhamo aatmikavaddhrnvaruttunnu .

46008003	oruttn daivatte senhikyunnu ekkilo avane daivam arrinjirikyunnu .
46008004	vigrhappritangalle tinnunnatinekyurricheea , lokattill vigrham eetumillennum eekadaivamallate daivamillennum nam arriyunnu . paldevanmarum palkattrakynmrum undu ennu parrayunnuvalela .
46008005	ennall aakashattilo bhoomiyilo devanmar ennu peru llavar undennu varikilum

46008007	ennall ellavarilum i arrivilla . chilar innuvare vigrhaparichayam hetuvayi vigrhappritam ennu vechau tinnunnu ;
46008008	avarude manassakshi balahiinamakayall malinamayittiiru nnu . ennall aaharam namme daivattodu aduppikyunni lla ; tinnanjall namukyu nashtamilla ; tinnall aadayavumillal .
46008009	ennall ningallude i satantrym balahiinanmakyru yatoru vidhattilum tadangall aayi varatirippan nokyuvin .
46008010	arrivullavanaynii kshetrttill bhakshannattinnirikyunnatu oruttn kandall , balahiinanekkill avante manassakshi vigrhappritangalle tinnuvan takyvannm urrekyyallayo ?
46008011	aakyruvendi krisatu marichauvo , abalahiinsahodaran ingane ninte arrivinall nashichau pokunnu .
46008012	ingane sahodaranmarude nere papam cheyatu , avarude balahiinmanassakshiye dandippikyuboll ningall krisatu vinodu papam cheyaunnu .
46008013	aakayall aaharam ente sahodarannu idachaaryayittiirum ekkill ente sahodarannu idachaar varuttatirikyendatinnu njan oru nallum mamsam tinnukayillal .
46009001	njan stantrn allayo ? njan apposatlan allayo ? nammude kattravayyeshuvine njan kandidtillayo ? kattravill njan cheyat prvrattiyude phalam ningall allayo ?

46009006	alla , velcheyaatirippan enikyum bannarbasinnum matrm adhikaramillennundo ?
46009007	sntchelavinmell yuddhsevcheyaunnavan aar ? muntari ttodtm undakyi atinte phalam tinnatirikyunnavan ar ? aadtinkoodttte meyichau koodtttinte pall kondu upajiivikyatirikyunnavan aar ?
46009008	njan itu manukshayrude mayaaradprkaramo parrayunnatu ? nayayaprmannavum ingane parrayunnillayo ?
46009009	" metikyunnkallekyu mukhakyodt kedtrutu " ennu mosheyude nayayaprmannattill ejhyutiyirikyunnuvalela ; daivam kallekyu vendiyo chintikyunnatu ?
46009010	alla , kevalam namukyu vendi parrayunnato ? ate , ujhyunnavan aashayode ujhyukayum metikyunnavan patam kidtum ennullaashayode metikyyum vendatakayall namukyu vendi ejhyutiyirikyunnatareta .
46009011	njangall aatmikamayatu ningallkyu vitechaidtu ningallude eehikamayatu koyatall valiykayaarmo ?
46009012	mattullavakyru ningallude mell i adhikaram undekkill njngallkyu etr adhikam ? ekkilum njangall i adhikaram pryogichaidtilla ; krisatuvinte suvishekshattinnu yatoru vighvum varuttatirippan sakalavum porrukyunnu .
46009013	daivalayakammrngall nadattunnavar daivalayam kondu upajiivikyunnu ennum yagapiitthattikkll shushrookshcheyaunnvar yagapiitthattile vajhyipadukallill oaharikyar aakunnu ennum ningall arriyunnillayo ?
46009014	atu pole kattravum suvisheksham arriyikyunnavar suvishekshattall upajiivikyennam ennu kalpichairikyunnu .
46009015	ekkilum itu onnum njan pryogichaidtilla ; ingane enikyu kidtennam ennu vechau njan itu ejhyutunnatum alla ; aarekkilum ente prshamsvrathavakyunnatine kyall mariky tanne enikyu nallatu .
46009016	njan suvisheksham arriyikyunnu ekkill enikyu prshamsi ppan onnumilla . nibaarndm ente mell kidakyunnu . njan suvisheksham arriyikyunnillekkill enikyu ayeekashtam !
46009017	njan atu manpoovaarm nadattunnu ekkill enikyu prtiphlam undu ; manpoovaarmalelkkilum kayaarm ekkll bharamelpichairi kyunnu .
46009018	ennall ente prtiphalam entu ? suvisheksham arriyi kyumboll suvishekshghokshannattilulladhikaram mujhyuvanum upayogikyate njan suvishekshaghokshannam chelavu koodate nadattunnatu tanne .
46009019	ingane njan kevalam stantrn ekkilum adhikam pere nedendatinnu njan ennettnne ellavakyrum dasanakyi .
46009020	yehoodanmare nedendatinnu njan yehoodanmakyru yehoodne ppole aayi ; nayayaprmannattin kiijhyullavare nede ndatinnu njan nayayaprmattin kiijhyullavan allekki lum nayayaprmannattin kiijhyullavakyru nayayaprmannattin kiijhyullavane ppole aayi .
46009021	daivattinnu nayayaprmannamillattvan aakate krisatuvi nnu nayayaprmannamullavanayirikye nayayaprmannamillatt vare nedendatinnu njan nayayaprmannamillattvakyru nayyaprmannamillattvaneppole aayi .

46009023	suvishekshattill oru pakkalliyakendatinnu njan sakalvum suvisheksham nimittm cheyaunnu .
46009024	oadtkyllattill oadunnavar ellavarum oadunnu ekkilum oruvane virutu prapikyunnullu ennu arriyunnillayo ? ningallum prapippantaky vannm oaduvin .

46010005	ekkilum avarill mikyperilum daivam prsadichailla , avare marubhoomiyill talliyidtu kallanju ennu ningall arriyatirikyrutu ennu njan aagrhikyunnu .
46010006	itu namukyu drashtantamayi sambhavichau ; avar mohichaatu pole namum dummerahikall aakatirikyendatinnu tanne .
46010007	" janam ninnuvanum kudippanum irunnu , kallippan ejhyunne ttu " ennu ejhyutiyirikyunnprkaram avarill chilare ppole ningall vigrharadhikall aakarutu .
46010008	avarill chilar parasamgam cheyatu oru divasattill irupattumoovayiram per viinnu poyatu pole nam parasamgam cheyaarutu .

46011027	atu kondu ayogaymayi appm tinnukayo kattravinte panapatrm kudikyyo cheyaunnavan ellam kattravinte shariiravum rtavum sambandichau kuttkyaran aakum .

46012019	sakalavum oru avayavam ekkill shariiram evide ?
46012020	ennall avayavangall palatekkilum shariiram onnu tanne .
46012021	kanninnu kayeeadu : ninne kyondu enikyu aavashaymillennum talekyu kalukallodu : ningallekyondu enikyu aavashaymillennum parranjukooda .

46012024	nammill ajhyakullavayavangallkyu atu aavashaymillalela .
46012025	shariirattill bhinnatvarate avayavangall aneyanaym oru pole karutendatinnayi daivam kurravullatinnu adhi kam manam koduttu kondu shariiratte koodticheettririkyu nnu .

46012028	daivam sabhayill onnamatu apposatlanmar , rangamatu prvachakanmar moonnamatu upadeshtakynmar ingane ororuttre niyamikyyum pinne viiyaarprvrattikall , rogashantikallude varam , sahayam cheyvanullvaram , paripalanavaram , vividhabhakshavaram ennivnalkukayum cheyatu .
46012029	ellavarum apposatlanmaro ? ellavarum prvachakanmro ? ellavarum upadeshtakynmaro ? ellavarum viiyaarpr vrattikall cheyaunnavaro ?

46012031	ellavarum vayakhayanikyunnuvo ? reshakshanvarangalle vanchippin ; ini atireshakshanmayoru maggrm njan ningallkyu kannichautaram .
46013001	njan manukshayrudeyum dootanmarudeyum bhakshakallill samsarichaalum enikyu senhamillekkill njan mujhyangunnchebo chilambunnkaittallamo areta .
46013002	enikyu prvachanavaram undayidtu sakalmammrngallum sakalnjanavum grhichaalum malakalle niikyuvan taky vishasam undayalum senhamillekkill njan eetumilla .
46013003	enikyullatellam annadanam cheyatalum ente shariiram chuduvan eelpichaalum ; senham illekkill enikyu oru pryojanavum illa .
46013004	senham diigharmayi kshamikyyum daykannikyyum cheyaunnu ; senham spaddhrikyunnillal .

46013010	poonnrmayatu varubojhyo amshamayatu niingippokum .

46013012	ippoll nam kannadiyill kadamojhyiyayi kannunnu ; ppoll mukhamukhamayi kannum ; ippoll njan amshamayi arriyunnu ; appojhyo njan arriyappedttu pole tnne arriyum ,
46013013	aakayall vishasam , prtayasha , senham i moonnum nilanilkyunnu ; ivayill valiyato senham tanne .
46014001	senham aacharippan utsahippin ! aatmikavarangallum vishekshall prvachanavaravum vanchippin .
46014002	anaybhakshayill samsarikyunnavan manukshayrodalldaivttodaretsamsarikyunnu ; aarum tirichaarriyunnillalela ; ekkilum avan aatmavill mammrngalle samsarikyunnu .
46014003	prvachikyunnavano aatmikavaddhrnekyum prbodhanattinnum aashasattinnumayi manukshayrodu samsarikyunnu .

47002002	njan ningalle du : khippichaall ennall du : khitanayavan allate enne santokshippikyunnatu aar ?

57001023	krisatuyeshuvill ente sahabaddhnayeppphrasum
57001024	ente koodtuvelakyaranaymakyerasum arisatkyerasum demasum lookyosum ninakyu vandnam chollunnu .
57001025	nammude kattravayyeshukrisatvinte krapningallude aatmavodukoode irikyumarrakadte . aamen .
58001001	daivam pandu bhagam bhagamayidtum vividhamayidtum prvachaknmar mukhantaram pitakynmarodu arullicheeyatidtu
58001002	i antaykalattu putrn mukhantaram nammodu arullichee yatirikyunnu . avane tan sakalattinnum avakashiyakyi vechau ; avan mukhantaram lokatteyum undakyi .
58001003	avan avante tejassinte prbhayum tatttinte mudryum sakalatteyum tante shtiyullvachanattall vahikyunnavnum aakakondu papangallkyu pariharam undakyiysheksham uyarattill mahimayude valattubhagattu irikyyum
58001004	avan daivadootanmarekyall vishishtamaynamattinnu avkashiyayatinnu ottvannm avarekyall reshakshannayittiiru kayum cheyatu .
58001005	" nii ente putrn ; njan innu ninne janippichairikyunnu " ennum " njan avannu pitavum avan enikyu putrnum aayirikyum " ennum dootanmarill aarodekkilum vallappo jhyum arullicheeyatidtundo ?
58001006	aadayjatane pinneyum bhootalattilekyu prveshippikyu boll : " daivattinte sakaldootanmarum avane namasky rikyennam " ennu tan arullicheeyaunnu .
58001007	" avan kattukalle tante dootanmarum ijalaye tante shushrookshakanmarum aakyunnu " ennu dootanmarekyurrichau parrayu nnu .
58001008	putrnodo : " daivame , ninte simhasanam ennum e nnekyumullatu ; ninte rajatttinte chekkoll nerullchekkoll .
58001009	nii niitiye ishtappedukayum dushtataye devkshikyyum cheyati rikyyall daivame , ninte daivam ninte koodtukarill pramayi ninne aanandtailam kondu abhikshekam cheyatiri kyunnu " ennum
58001010	" kattrave , nii poovaarkalattu bhoomikyu adisthanam idtu , aakashavum ninte kaikallude prvratti aakunnu .
58001011	avnashikyum ; niiyo nilanilkyum ; avellam vasrtm pole pajhyakippokum ;
58001012	uduppupole nii avaye churudtum ; vasrtmpole avmarrippokum ; niiyo ananayn ; ninte samvrangall avasanikyyumilla " ennum parrayunnu .
58001013	" njan ninte shatrukylle ninakyu padapiitthamakyuvollam nii ente valattu bhagattiriky " ennu dootanmarill aarode kkilum vallappojhyum arullicheeyatidtundo ?
58001014	avar okyeyum rakshprapippanullavarude shushrookshekyu ayakyppedunnsevakatmakyllallayo ?
58002001	atukondu nam vallappojhyum ojhyukippokatirikyendati nnu kedttu adhikam shrddhyode karutikyollvan aavshaymakunnu .
58002002	dootanmar mukhantaram arullicheeyat vachanam sthiramayirikyyum oaroro lamghanattinnu anusarannakyedinnum nayayamayprtiphalam labhikyyum cheyatu ekkill
58002003	kattravu tan parranjutudangiyatum daivam adayallangalllum atbhutangallalum vividhviiyaarprvrattikallalum tante ishtaprkaram parishuddhatmavine nalkikyondum sakshi ninnatum kedtvar namukyu urrappichau tannatumay
58002004	itr valiyrakshnam gannaymakyate poyall engane tetti ojhyiyum ?
58002005	nam prsatavikyunnbhavi lokatte avan dootanmakyrlllelkiijhyepduttiyatu .
58002006	ennall " manukshayne nii oakyerndatinnu avan entu ? manukshayputrne sandsharikyendatinnu avan entumatrm ?
58002007	nii avane dootanmarekyall alpam matrm tajhytti ; tejssum bahumanavum avane anniyichairikyunnu ; ninte kaikallude prvrattikallkyu nii avane adhipati aakyi ,
58002008	sakalavum avante kalkyiijhyakyiyirikyunnu " ennu oruvan oredattu sakshaym parrayunnu . sakalavum avannu kiijhyakyi yatill onnineyum kiijhyepduttate vidtidtilla ; ennall i ppoll sakalavum avannu kiijhyepdttayi kannunnilla .
58002009	ekkilum daivakrapayall ellavakyrum vendi marannam aasdippan dootanmarilum alpam oru tvannavanayyeshu marannam anubhavichaatukondu avane mahatvum bahumanavum anninjvanayi nam kannunnu .
58002010	sakalattinnu lakyum sakalattinnum karannabhootanumayavan anekam putrnmare tejassilekyu nadattuboll avaru de rakshanayakane kashtanubhavangallall tikanjvanakyunntu yuktam aayirunnu .
58002011	vishuddhiikarikyunnavannum vishuddhiikarikyppedunnavakyrum ellam oruvanalelpitavu ; atu hetuvayi avan avare sahodaranmar ennu villippan likyate :
58002012	" njan ninte namatte ente sahodaranmarodu kiittri kyum ; sabhamaddhey njan ninne satutikyum " ennum
58002013	" njan avanill aashryikyum " ennum " itnjanum dai vam enikyu tannmakyllum " ennum parrayunnu .

58002018	tan tanne pariikshitanayi kashtamanubhavichairikyyall parii kshikyppedunnavakyru sahayippan kajhyivullavan aakunnu .
58003001	atukondu vishuddh sahodaranmare , sggriiyvillikyu oaharikyarayullore , nam siikarichau parrayunnappo satlanum mahapurohitanumayyeshuvine shrddhichau no kyuvin .
58003002	moshe daivabhavanattill okyeyum vishsatnayirunnatu pole yeshuvum tanne niyamichaakyiyavannu vishsatn aakunnu .
58003003	bhavanattekyallum bhavanam chamechaavannu adhikam manamullatu pole yeshuvum mosheyekyall adhikam mahatttinnu yogayn ennu ennyirikyunnu .
58003004	eetu bhavanavum chameppan orall vennam ; savaarvum chamechaavn daivam tanne .
58003005	avante bhavanattill okyeyum moshe vishshatnayirunnatu arullicheeyvanirunnatinnu sakshaym parrayunnbhrataynayidt reta .
58003006	krisatuvo avante bhavanattinnu adhikariyayputrnyidtu tanne ; prtayashayude dhaiyaarvum prshamsayum nam avasanattollam murrukeppidichau kondall nam tanne avante bhavanam aakunnu .
58003007	atu kondu parishuddhatmavu arullicheeyaunnatu pole :
58003008	" innu ningall avante shabdam kellkyunnuvekkill marubhoomiyill vechau pariikshdivasattile mrattill ennapole ningallude hradayam katthinamakyrutu .

58003011	avar ente ssthtayill prveshikyyillennu njan ente rekadhattill sataym cheyatu . "
58003012	sahodaranmare , jiivanulldaivatte tayjichau kallayatiri kyendatinnu avishasamulldushtahradayam ningallill aakyrum undakatirippan nokyuvin .
58003013	ningall aarum papattinte chatiyall katthinappedatirikye ndatinnu " innu " ennu parrayunnedattollam nalltorrum aneyanaym prbodhippichau kollvin .
58003014	aadayvishasam avasanattollam murrukeppidichau ko ndall nam krisatuvill pakkallikallayittiinnaririkyunnuvalela .
58003015	" innu ningall avante shabdam kellkyunnuvekkill mrttill ennpole ningallude hradayangalle katthinamakyru tu "
58003016	ennu parrayunnatill aarakunnu kedtidtu mrichaavar ? misryiimill ninnu moshe mukhantaram purrappedtu vannavar ellavarumalela .
58003017	nalpatu aandu aarodum kruddhichau ? papam cheyatvarodallyo ? avarude shavangall marubhoomiyill viinnu poyi .
58003018	ente ssthtayill prveshikyyillennu aannayidttu anusarannam kedtvarodallate pinne aarodakunnu ?
58003019	ingane avishasam nimittm avakyru prveshippan kajhyinjillennu nam kannunnu .
58004001	avante ssthtayill prveshippanullvagdattm shekshi chairikyyall ningallill aakyerkkilum atu labhikyate po yi ennu varatirippan nam bhayappeduka .
58004002	avareppole namum oru sadttrmanam kedtvar aaku nnu ; ekkilum kedtvarill vishasamayi parinnamikyaykkondu kedt vachanam avakyru upakaramayi vannilla .
58004003	vishsichaavaraynamalelssthtayill prveshikyunnu ; loksthapanattikkll prvrattikall tiinnarupoyashekshvum : " avar ente ssthtayill prveshikyyillennu njan ente kopattill sataym cheyatu " ennu arullichee yatirikyunnuvalela .
58004004	" eejhyam nallill daivam tante sakalprvrattikallill ninnu nivrattnayi " ennu eejhyam nallinekyurrichau oredattu parrnjirikyunnu .
58004005	" ente ssthtayill avar prveshikyyilla " ennu ivide pinneyum arullicheeyaunnu .
58004006	atu kondu chilar atill prveshippan idshekshichairi kyyalum mube sadttrmanam kedtvar anusarannakyedu nimittm prveshikyate pokayalum

58004012	daivattinte vachanam jiivanum chaitanayvumullatayi iru vayttlayulleetu vallinekyallum moochaaryerriyatum prnnaneyum aatmavineyum sandimkalleyum verruviduvi kyum vare tullechau chellunnatum hradayattile chintananglleyum bhavangalleyum vivechikyunnatum aakunnu .

58006003	daivam anuvadikyunnpaksham nam atu cheyaum .

58006007	palappojhyum peyat majhyakudichaidtu bhoomi krakshi cheyaunnavakyru hitamaysasayadikalle villayikyunnu ekkill daivatti nte anugrham prapikyunnu .
58006008	mullum njerinjilum mulleppichaalo atu kollaruttttum shapattinnu adutttum aakunnu ; chudtukallakaretatinte avasanam .

58006010	daivam ningallude prvrattiyum vishuddhnmare shushrookshichaati nalum shushrookshikyunnatinalum tante namattodu kannichasenhavum marrannukallavan takyvannm aniitiyullavanalla .
58006011	ennall ningall oaroruttn prtayashayude poonnrnischyam prapippan avasanattollam orupole utsaham kannikyennamennu njangall aagrhikyunnu .

58006019	aprtayashnamukyu aatmavinte oru nakkooram tanne ; tu nischayavum sthiravum tirashiilekykattekyu kadakyunnatu makunnu .
58006020	avidekyu yeshu malkyiisedekyinte krmaprkaram enne kyum mahapurohitanayi mumbukoodti namukyu vendi prve shichairikyunnu .
58007001	shalemrajavum atayunnatanaydaivattinte purohi tanumayi malkyiisedek rajakynmare jayichau madngivarunnabrahamine etitteu anugrhichau ;
58007002	abraham avannu sakalattilum pattilonnu kodu ttu . avante perinnu aadaym niitiyude rajavennum pinne shalemrajavu ennu vechaall samadhanattinte rajavu ennum atthrm .
58007003	avannu pitavilla , matavilla , vamshavaliyilla , jiivarambhvum jiivavasanavum illa ; avan daivaputrnnu tulaynyi ennekyum purohitanayirikyunnu .
58007004	ivan etr mahan ennu nokyuvin ; gotrpitavayabraham koodeyum avannu kollayude vishekshasadhanngallill pattilonnu koduttuvalela .
58007005	leviputrnmarill perohitaym labhikyunnavakyru nayayprmannaprkaram janattodu dashamsham vanguvan kalpanundu ; atu abrahaminte kadiprdeshattill ninnu utbhvichasahodaranmarodu aakunnu vangunnatu .
58007006	ennall avarude vamshavaliyill ullppedattvan abrhaminodu tanne dashamsham vangiyum vagdattngall prpichaavane anugrhichaumirikyunnu .

58007010	avante pitavine malkyiisedekyu etirettppoll levi avante kadiprdeshattu undayirunnavalela .
58007011	levayperohitayttall samboonnrtvannekkill - ati nkiijhyaleljanam nayayaprmannam prapichaatu - aharo nte krmaprkaram ennu parrayate malkyiisedekyinte kr maprkaram verroru purohitan varuvan entoravshaym ?
58007012	perohitaym marrippokunnpaksham nayayaprmannatti nnumkoode mattm varuvan aavashaym .
58007013	ennall itu aarekyurrichau parranjirikyunnuvo avan verroru gotrttilullavan ; agotrttill aarum ygapiitthattikkll shushrookshcheyatidtilla .
58007014	yehoodayillninnu nammude kattravu udichau ennu spashtamlela ; agotrttodu moshe perohitaym sambndichau onnum kalpichaidtilla .
58007015	jaddasambandmaykalpanayude prmannattall alla , ajhyi njupokatt jiivanteshtiyall ullavayverre oru purohitan
58007016	malkyiisedekyinnu sadrashanayi udikyunnu ekkill atu eettvum adhikam telliyunnu .

58007018	mumbilatte kalpanekyu atinte balahiinatayum nikshrpyo janavum nimittm niikyvum -
58007019	nayayaprmannattall onnum poottriprapichaidtillalel - nam daivattodu adukyunnatinulleerre nallprtayashekyu sthapanavum vannirikyunnu .
58007020	avar aannkoodate purohitanmarayittiinnaru .
58007021	ivano " nii ennekyum purohitan ennu kattravu sataym cheyatu , anutapikyyumilla " ennu tannodu arullicheeyatvan idt aannayodu koode tanne .
58007022	aannkoodateyallennatinnu ottvannm vishekshamerriyniyamattinnu yeshu uttravadiyayi tiinnaririkyunnu .
58007023	marannamnimittm avakyru nilanilpan mudakym varikakondu purohitanmar aayittiinnarvar anekar aakunnu .
58007024	ivano , ennekyum irikyunnatukondu marratt pe rohitaym aakunnu prapichairikyunnatu .
58007025	atukondu tan mukhantaramayi daivattodu adukyu nnavakyru vendi pakshavadam cheyvan sadjiivikyunnavnakayall avare poonnrmayi rakshippan , avan prapat tnakunnu .
58007026	inganeyullmahapurohitanalelnamukyu vendiyatu : pavitrn , nidterakshan , nimmrlan , papikallodu verruvidtvn , sggrttekyall unnatanayittiinnarvan ;
58007027	amahapurohitanmareppole aadaym sntapapangall kyayum pinne janattinte papangallkyayum dinamprti yagam kajhyippan aavashaymillattvan tanne . atu avan tannettan apprichaukondu orikylayidtu cheyatuvalela .
58007028	nayayaprmannam balahiinamanukshayre mahapurohitanmarkyunnu ; nayayaprmannattinnu pimbullaannayude vachanamo ennekyum tikenjvanayittiinnar putrne purohatankyunnu .
58008001	nam i parrayunnatinte saram entennall . sggrttill mahimasanattinte valattu bhagattu irunnavanayi ,
58008002	vishuddhsthlattinteyum manukshaynallkattravu sthapichasataykoodarattinteyum shushrookshakanaymahapurohitan namukyundu .
58008003	eetu mahapurohitanum vajhyipadum yagavum apprippan niyamikyppedunnu ; aakayall apprippan ivannum vallatum vennam .
58008004	avan bhoomiyill aayirunnekkill purohitan aakayillyirunnu ; nayayaprmannaprkaram vajhyipadu apprikyunnavar undalela .
58008005	koodaram tiippran moshe aarambhichaappoll " pavaartattill ni nakyu kannichamatrakaprkaram nii sakalavum cheyvan nokyuka " ennu avanodu arullicheeyattupole avar sggriiyattinte drashtantavum nijhyalumayatill shushrookshcheyau nnu .
58008006	avano vishekshatayerriyvagdattngallinmell sthapiky ppedt niyamattinte maddhysthnakayall atinte vishekshtekyu ottvannm vishekshatayerriyshushrookshayum prapichai rikyunnu .
58008007	onnamatte niyamam kurravillatttayirunnu ekkill randamttetinnu idam anevkshikyyillayirunnu .
58008008	ennall avan avare aakshepichau kondu arullicheeyau nnatu : " njan yisrayellgrahattodum yehoodagrahttodum putiyoru niyamam cheyaunnkalam varum ennu kattravinte arullappadu .
58008009	njan avarude pitakynmare kaikyu pidichau misryiim deshattuninnu konduvannnallill njan avarodu che yat niyamampole alla ; avar ente niyamattill nilani nnilla ; njan avare aadarichaatumillennu kattravinte rullappadu .
58008010	i kalam kajhyinjsheksham njan yisrayell grahattodu cheyvanirikyunnniyamam ingane aakunnu : njan ente nayayaprmannam avarude ullilakyi avarude hradayangalli ll ejhyutum ; njan avakyru daivamayum avar enikyu jnamayum irikyum .
58008011	ini avarill aarum tante koodtukaraneyum tante saho daraneyum kattravine arrikennu upadeshikyyilla ; avr aabalavraddhm ellavarum enne arriyum .
58008012	njan avarude akratayngallekyurrichau karunnayullavan aakum ; avarude papangalle ini oakyryumillennu kattravinte arullappadu . "
58008013	putiyatu ennu parrayunnatinall aadayttetine pajhyayatkyiyirikyunnu ; ennall pajhyayatakunnatum jiinnrikyunnatum e llam niingippokuvan aduttirikyunnu .
58009001	ennall aaday niyamattinnum aaradhanekyullchadtngallum lekikamayvishuddhmandiravum undayirunnu .
58009002	oru koodaram chamechau ; atinte aadaybhagattu nilavillakyum meshayum kyappvum undayirunnu . atinnu vishuddhsth lam ennu per .
58009003	randam tirashiilekyu pinnilo ativishuddhm ennkoodaram undayirunnu .
58009004	atill ponnukondulldhoopakalashavum mujhyuvanum po nnu potinj niyamapedtkavum atinnakattu mannidtuve chapon patrvum aharonte tallittr vadiyum niyamttinte kalpalakakallum
58009005	atinnu miite krapasanatte moodunntejassinte keroobu kallum undayirunnu . atu ippoll oronnayi vivarippn kajhyivilla .
58009006	ivingane tiinnar sheksham purohitanmar nitaym mun koo darattillchennu shushrookshkajhyikyum .
58009007	randamattetilo aandill orikyll mahapurohitan mtrm chellum ; rtam koodate alla ; atu avan tanteyum janattinteyum abaddhngallkyu vendi apprikyum .
58009008	mukkoodaram nilkyunnedattollam vishuddhmandirattilekyullvajhyi vellippedtillennu parishuddhatmavu itinall soochi ppikyunnu .
58009009	akoodaram i kalattekyu oru sadrashaymareta . atinnu ottvannm aaradhanakyarannu manassakshiyill poonnrsamadhnam varuttuvan kajhyiyatt vajhyipadum yagavum apprichau porunnu .
58009010	avbhakshayngall , paniiyangall , vividhsanangall ennivyodu koode ganniikarannakalattollam chumattiyirunnjaddi kniyamangallareta .
58009011	krisatuvo varuvanullnanmakallude mahapurohitanayi vannidtu : kaippnniyallatttayi ennuvechaall i srashti yill ullppedatttayi valippvum tikavumerriyoru koodrattill koodi
58009012	aadtukottnmarudeyum pashukyidakylludeyum rtattalalla , sntartattall tanne orikylayidtu vishuddh mandirattill prveshichau ennekyumulloru viindeduppu sadhippichau .
58009013	aadtukottnmarudeyum kallakalludeyum rtavum malinappedt varude mell tallikyunnpashubhasvum jaddikashuddhi varuttu nnu ekkill
58009014	nitayatmavinall daivattinnu tannettan nikshkyllakknyi apprichakrisatuvinte rtam jiivanulldaivatte aardhippan ningallude manassakshiye nijjariivprvrattikalle pokyi etr adhikam shuddhiikarikyum ?
58009015	atu nimittm aadayniyamattile lamghanangallill ninnullviindeduppinnayi oru marannam undayidtu nitayavakashatti nte vagdattm villikyppedtvakyru labhikyendatinnu avan putiyniyamattinte maddhysthn aakunnu .
58009016	niyamam ulledattu niyamakattravinte marannam tellivan aavashaym .
58009017	marichashekshamalelniyamam sthiramakunnatu ; niyamakattravi nte jiivakalattollam atinnu urrappilla .
58009018	atukondu aadayniyamavum rtam koodate prtikshanichaatlla .
58009019	moshe nayayaprmannaprkaram kalpanokyeyum sakalajanttodum prsatavichasheksham pashukyidakylludeyum aadtuko ttnmarudeyum rtatte vellavum chuvannaadtu romavum isoppumayi eduttu pusatkattinmelum sakaljanttinmelum tallichau :
58009020	" itu daivam ningallodu kalpichaniyamattinte rtam " ennu parranju .
58009021	angane tanne avan koodarattinmelum aaradhanekyullupakarannangallinmelum ellam rtam tallichau .
58009022	nayayaprmannaprkaram eekadesham sakalavum rtattall shu ddhiikarikyppedunnu ; rtam chorinjidtllate vimochanami lla .
58009023	aakayall sggrttilullavayude prtibimbangalle ivakyall shuddhmakyunnatu aavashaym . sggriiyamayavekyo ivyekyall nallyagangall aavashaym .
58009024	krisatu vasatvamayatinte prtibimbamayi kaippnniyayvishuddh mandirattilekylla , ippoll namukyu vendi daivsannidhiyill prtaykshanavan sggrttilekyretprveshi chaatu .

58009026	anganeyayall lokasthapanam mutalkyu avan palppojhyum kashtamanubhavikyendiyirunnu . ennall avan lo kavasanattill sntyagamkondu papapariharam vruttuvan orikyll prtaykshanayi .
58009027	orikyll marikyyum pinne nayayavidhiyum manukshaykyru niymichairikyyall

58010001	nayayaprmannam varuvanullnanmakallude nijhyalallate kayaarrrrr rngallude sakshall sroopamallaykakondu aandutorrum idavidate kajhyichauvarunnate yagangallall aduttu varu nnavakyru sallgunnapoottri varuttuvan oru nallum kajhyivulltalla .

58010003	ippojhyo aandutorrum avayall papangallude oammr undakunnu .
58010004	kallakalludeyum aadtukottnmarudeyum rtattinnu papngalle niikyuvan kajhyiyunnatalla .
58010005	aakayall lokattill varuboll : " hananayagavum vajhyi padum nii ichchichailla ; ennall oru shariiram nii enikyu oru kyiyirikyunnu .
58010006	savaaramgahomangallilum papayagangallilum nii prsadichai lla .
58010007	appoll njan parranju : ita , njan varunnu ; pusatkachau rullill ennekyurrichau ejhyutiyirikyunnu ; daivame , ninte ishtam cheyvan njan varunnu " ennu avan parrayunnu .
58010008	nayayaprmannaprkaram kajhyichauvarunnyagangallum vajhyipadum savaaramgahomangallum papayagangallum nii ichchichaillavayi ll prsadichaatumillenningane parranjsheksham :
58010009	ita , njan ninte ishtam cheyvan varunnu ennu parrnjukondu avan randamattetine sthapippan onnamttetine niikyikyllayunnu .
58010010	ishtattill nam yeshukrisatu orikylayi kajhyichashariiryagattall vishuddhiikarikyppedtirikyunnu .
58010011	eetu purohitanum divasenshushrookshichaum papangalle priharippan orunallum kajhyiyatt ate yagangalle koodakyoo de kajhyichaaumkondu nilkyunnu .

58010015	atu parishuddhatmavum namukyu sakshiikarikyunnu .
58010016	" i kalam kajhyinjsheksham njan avarodu cheyvaniri kyunnniyamam inganeyakunnu : ente nayayaprmannam varude ullilakyi avarude hradayangallill ejhyutum ennu kattravinte arullappadu " ennu arullicheeyatsheksham :

58010018	ennall ivayude mochanam ulledattu inimell papangllkyu vendi oru yagavum aavashaymilla .

58010038	ennall " ente niitiman vishasattall jiivikyum ; pin marrunnu ekkill ente ullattinnu avanill prsadamilla " .
58010039	namo nashattilekyu pinmarrunnavarude koodtttilalla , vi shsichau jiivarakshprapikyunnavarude koodtttilaretaaku nnu .
58011001	vishasam ennato , aashikyunnatinte urrappum kannatt kayaarngallude nischayavum aakunnu .
58011002	atinalalelpoovaarnmakyru sakshaym labhichaatu .
58011003	i kannunnlokattinnu drashaymayatallkarannam ennu varumarru lokam daivattinte vachanattall nimmrikyppedtu ennu nam vishasattall arriyunnu .

58011019	marichaavarude idayill ninnu uyipprippan daivam shtan ennu ennukayum avarude idayill ninnu ejhyunnettvane ppole avane tirike prapikyyum cheyatu .

58012001	aakayall namum sakshikallude itr valiyoru samooham namukyu chuttum nilkyunnatu kondu sakalbharavum murru ke pattunnpapavum vidtu namukyu mumbill vechairikyunnoadtm sthiratayode oaduka .
58012002	vishsattinte nayakanum poottri varuttunnavanumayye shuvine nokyuka ; tante mumbill vechairunnsantoksham oattru avan apamanam alakshaymakyi krooshine sahiky yum daivasimhasanattinte valattubhagattu irikyyum cheyatu .

62005013	daivaputrnte namattill vishsikyunnningallkyu njan itu ejhyutiyirikyunnatu ningallkyu nitayjiivan undennu ningall arriyendatinnu tanne .
